author: Annette
title: Very good design!
content: This cover was a perfect fit for my older iPad Air.  The case fits very slim, but still offers a decent amount of protection for normal household use. It has just enough of a magnet to keep the screen cover in place.  I really like the satin feel cover.  The only negative might be that it only gives two angle options when using the stand feature.  One setting I found too upright and the other too flat, but I use mine in combination with an additional stand for table top use.  Overall, very well designed.

I returned mine and got this one instead: iPad Air 2 Case,ESR Yippee Color Series Smart Cover+Transparent Back Cover [Ultra Slim] [Light Weight] [Scratch-Resistant Lining] [Perfect Fit] [Auto Wake Up/Sleep Function] for[2014 Release] iPad Air 2 Cover (Silver Grey) I love it.

author: Dawn
title: Horrible and Idiotic design
content: Would give it 0 stars if I could. I had just replaced my IPad screen due to a clumsy accident on my part, and doing so was already a painful process. Since I shattered the plastic on my cheap older case, I decided, “Hey, you know what, I should get a new case while I’m at it.” So when searching around online, I saw this case and decided, based off reviews, that this would be a good replacement. Boy was I wrong. I slapped the new case on and thought, “Okay, Maybe not as functional as my old case, but still pretty good.” The folds on the cover seemed kind of useless to me, but I didn’t necessarily know what they were for so I wasn’t going to judge. Then I began to notice that my iPad started acting weird. I already saw a few glitches from the screen change, nothing I couldn’t handle, so I chalked the newer glitches up to the same thing. Basically, my iPad seemed to turn off at random now which was a big bummer. Fortunately, it didn’t always do this, so I just kind of rolled with it for a few days. Then one morning I sat down and realized that the CASE was the one randomly shutting my iPad off. It has some sort of magnet embedded in the cover, so when the cover is folded back it will mess with the on/off button on the iPad. Of course I was really annoyed, since I payed money for a simple case that was hardly protective and very much a nuisance. I decided I would go back to my slightly broken, but functional case instead. Little did I realize this case practically refuses to be removed once snapped on. I had to pry the thing away from my iPad as best I could, causing my screen, which had been set for over a week, to pop off at the corner. At that point I was fuming. Now only did this case only cause functional problems, but it has now broken my new screen which, as I said before, was a pain to install. When I finally got the iPad out of this horrid case, I tried using my screen which was now, to my dismay, unresponsive to my touch. Not only was this case horribly designed and a complete waste of money, but it now will cost me further down the line. 0/5 Stars

author: Will
title: Full review compared to Fintie iPad Air Case
content:
My dad passed me down his iPad Air when he got an iPad Air 2, and I first purchased a leather case for $30. The quality wasn't great, so I returned it and used the money to buy this case ($11.99) and the Fintie case ($10.99). These are the two most popular cases on Amazon, and I couldnt tell based on reviews and pictures which one is better. Now that I have them both.....I'm glad I have both! These cases are both great for being so cheap. Once one case wears out I will pop in the the other one and hardly notice a difference. Both cases are light and sleek, but I will point out the highlights of each case to help people that only want to purchase one

JETech:
-Smooth confortable shell back that adds Very little thickness to the iPad
-Sturdy but flexible cover that holds up very well in both typing positions
-a tiny bit thinner when compared to Fintie case, but barely noticeable when side to side

Note: the cover sticks out a little farther than the actual iPad. Some people might get bugged by this, but I dont think it is a problem and if anything adds more cushion when dropped

Fintie case:
-Plastic railing over the speaker at bottom of iPad for extra protection
-More of a leather look that gives the cheap case a more classy look

Overall, I really like both cases. Instead of buying an Apple case for $80, I feel confident with either case that I saved a bunch of money but im still protecting my iPad well. I will update if one of the cases starts to fall apart or not perform as expected, but I'm pleased with both purchases. hopes this helps people like me that spend way too much time researching cases

author: Hannah Sim
title: GREAT CASE!
content: Awesome case! It fits my iPad Air PERFECTLY! It's very firm too, definitely will protect your iPad as I have already accidentally dropped it twice...oops. It's light too so that's great. You really can't go wrong with this. GET IT

author: Keeyab
title: Great case. Would recommend to anyone.
content: This case is perfect for my iPad Air. It protects the iPad from scratches and scuffs. I throw it in my bag in the same pocket as my pens, spiralbound notebook and other various trinkets. It's a nice looking, functional case. There's really no point in looking elsewhere (unless you want a case that has a keyboard on it!)

author: Javier Chaves
title: Perfect!
content: Ideal if you want basic protection (on the back - with the traditional iPad smart cover (a generic version, not the real one) embedded into the case for protection in the front). Form factor is slim as advertised.

author: Vira
title: Fits well
content: Fits well my iPad. Arrived on time. Would give it 5 stars, but did not have it long enough. Hopefully it will last long enough to update to higher rating.

author: Herb Hirsch
title: Four Stars
content: Fits well and is eay to put on. Should have bought abrighter color!

author: Chloe Z.
title: the case itself worked great, but I didn't like the blue
content: The blue isn't as vibrant as it is in the picture. the case itself worked great, but I didn't like the blue. I returned it for a case with a keyboard.

author: Amazon Customer
title: Perfect price and nice color
content: I decided on this one from Amazon when I bought an iPad Air to protect it. Perfect price and nice color.

author: Terry Stover
title: iPad cover
content: Love this product, I bought three cases four years ago and just now needed a replacement. I was thrilled when I found they were still available. It's a comfortable case that isn't tricky or slippery to hold. Makes me want to buy more for the future just in case it changes.

author: Joellen L. Worley
title: Fits Well
content: I love the way I’m able to prop up my iPad in several ways.  What I don’t like is a slight odor left on my hands from handling the case.

author: Peggy Rowles
title: iPad fit nice.
content: Very sleek in the style.

author: Sarah
title: READ READ READ
content: AMAZING. EVEN BETTER THAN APPLE. This case is even better than the ones they sell for $80 in stores. It's thinner, and doesn't stain as easy as the original. I've had the original and it was ruined within weeks, compared to me still having this one months later. I LOVE THIS case.

author: JP
title: Short lifespan.
content: This case had the exact look I was going for, offered in a variety of great colors. I liked that there were no brands or logos embossed on the cover.  It's nearly identical in design to the Apple product. However in less that six months, the edges started to crack and break off.  Too late to return. I guess considering the price, you get what you pay for.

author: jchew
title: Gets the job done
content: Does its job, doesn't add much to the bulk or weight of the ipad, and the back portion has good grip. The cover doesn't really fold up that well and sometimes the ipad doesn't stand well because of that. Overall though for the price, I would recommend it.

author: j@vier
title: Great case at a great price.
content: Case fits perfectly on iPad Air 1st generation. Low profile and functions great as a stand.

author: Not Mark Twain
title: Nice product and smooth transaction
content: Shipping is fast. The case fits my iPad Air very well, and it feels smooth, look nice too. Thank you for the nice product, I highly recommend this product and the seller.

author: Gazelle
title: No problems
content: Good product that was delivered just as it was promised with good quality, I would purchase again from this company

author: Canuck216
title: Started chipping after a month.
content: Bought this 4-5 months ago and it first started cracking/chipping after a month. It continued to chip more and more until now I can no longer use it as the iPad falls out of the case. I don't travel with the iPad (maybe 5 times total) so it's not like I beat it up. Disappointed in this. In this case, you get what you paid for.

author: Christian H. A. Reis
title: Solid product
content: Cant say if it will last, but it feels like a solid product that protects well my ipad air.

author: david clingman
title: Size of the iPad
content: It's a good product. Price is appropriate. It did take 2 tries to get the right size. People at the manufacturer are very considerate and helpful.

author: hallison
title: Five Stars
content: Bought this cover for my 91 year old Mom. She loves her iPad and this cover.

author: Douglas A.
title: Better value than OEM cover and case
content: I purchased this when my OEM cover tore. The fit is perfect and functions as good or better than my other cover. It offers full protection and functionality. It is a great value.

author: Jelina Ennis
title: Protects but doesn't fit correctly
content:
I love this case and the minimalistic design.  I have had it for a few months and always though it was odd that I could press down on the bottom corners of my iPad and it seemed to move.  I recently looked at the bottom corners and the case doesn't fit my iPad Air the way it should.  The bottom corners have cracks in them, because the hard plastic that covers the back of the iPad is clearly too small.  It doesn't snap into place at all.  Now the "looseness" of the case makes sense.

All in all, it's protected my iPad on a day to day basis.  I carry it in my purse to work with me and it hasn't seen any damage.

author: Jim
title: IPad Air Case
content: Excellent fit for IPad Air. The cover works just like the higher priced version from Apple. In addition, this cover also protects the back and sides of the IPad. All of the ports, buttons, lens, are accessible. Excellent value!

author: Jerome F Van Kolken
title: Great case, Don't Leave in the car.
content:
This is a replacement case. I've been using this case since I got my Ipad and it is a very good case. Its durable, the reason I purchased this replacement is because I forgot the case in the car on a hot day for a couple of hours and it warped the cover pcs.

Otherwise the case will turn off the screen when it covers the screen. The tri-fold cover will provide a nice elevated stand in landscape mode.

author: Stuart Hartley
title: Wonky sleep wake action
content:
Case does what it says for the most part, but has a knack for triggering the magnetic sleep wake function inadvertently when the flap is flipped around behind the ipad. Not an issue when you're just using it as a stand, but it can get tedious when it keeps shutting down the screen when you're holding it up to read or something.

I wouldn't get it again, but it does keep it clean and secure while I look for a better one.

author: Gr8dork
title: Well worth the price
content: It is exactly as described and pictures show. I was a bit hesitant since I had an Apple brand cover before, but for the price this is the one to get

author: Vernon Daly
title: Nice case
content: I like this case. Bought it after my Apple case wore out.  iPad fits in this case tighter than the genuine Apple case.  If you’re looking for a new case you’ll like this one.

author: Amazon Customer
title: Great case!
content: I got one for my husband's iPad and it worked so well for him I got one for myself. I like that the iPad fits into the back of case snugly and protects it. Lightweight yet durable. Better than the Apple case and more affordable.

author: MCPRO
title: CASE COATING PEEING OFF.
content: THE CASE WAS NICE AT FIRST. THEN THE BACK STARTED TO PEEL. I HAD TO RETURN IT AND BOUGHT THE MOKO CASE INSTEAD.

author: Frank K.
title: What ipad you have
content: Fits my A1475 perfectly

author: Linda A. Szymanski
title: Great cover
content: I like this cover. It is not bulky and is easy to use.

author: Phill B.
title: Looks great too.
content: Much nicer than I expected. Looks great too.

author: calBear
title: This is a great case for my ipad air
content: This is a great case for my ipad air. I bought one for my Mom almost 2 years ago, and she loves it! And it feels really high quality, and also not adding a lot of weight to the ipad air. Then I got an ipad air this year, I immediately remembered this one!

author: Amazon Customer
title: Good quality
content: Fits as expected

author: Larry Schneider
title: As Expected
content: This is a nice quality product. Better quality than the cost. I bought to be used as a secondary case, but I may just use it full-time.

author: Robert Boehme
title: ... with an ipad for my grandaughter and it is excellent. very reasonable
content: purchased it with an ipad for my grandaughter and it is excellent. very reasonable price

author: Tracy
title: Fits perfectly
content: This iPad case fit nicely, is easy to hold and should protect the iPad well.

author: Ryan
title: Quality
content: Feels like an authentic Apple product at a fraction of the price.

author: GD-CO
title: Pleasant Surprise !
content:
This thing feels like the ones for the newer/current models from apple. it fits snuggly, closes well, and seem very good so far. I will update once I have been using it to append on how the case handles hand oils.
Right now happy as a clam and would recommend this case to a friend.

author: Robbie Johnson
title: Doesn’t fit as well as it should. The part ...
content: Doesn’t fit as well as it should. The part of the hinge between the magnet and the cover is to wide, so it has a sloppy fit, otherwise it works.

author: KC
title: As expected  18 words plus to complete this review As expected 18 words plus to complete this review...........11 more words ar
content: As expected 18 words plus to complete this review...........11 more words are expected and I'll not fill out another of these reviews

author: Megan
title: Great cover!
content: This cover has held up for almost a year now. It provides great protection. I  have never dropped it so I'm not sure in that aspect. The cover folds up so you can prop up the iPad, which is really convenient in class.

author: A. Jones
title: Really great.
content: I had bought a similar case for my mom for nearly $50 at Best Buy.  This one functions just as well and is lighter than the other.  This is the only one to get.

author: Kathryn
title: It broke shortly after
content: Right after I left a great review of this product, the piece between the volume buttons and the surface of the iPad broke. Not even one week with it. If you're going to buy know that it's not a long term investment and try looking elsewhere.

author: Beachbum11
title: Defective product? No!!
content:
As it turns out my iPad was defective, after buying the oem Apple case and having the same issue I had my iPad repaired and I actually like this case better than the apple case - which doesn't stay open/upright as well as this one.

The outer edge of the flap/cover will not lay flat.  This affects the auto sleep wake function.  I assume I received a defective product.  Thanks to Amazon for a quick resolution.

author: Jacqueline T
title: Great product. Works as advertised.
content: Sleek, works great because I wanted a case that would still fit in my Herschel sleeve. I think it's pretty sturdy. I'm giving it 4 stars because there are only a few times the cover locks my iPad right away, however, most times it takes about 5-10 seconds to lock my iPad when I close the cover. Not a complete deal breaker tho.

author: JANE DIETRICH
title: Really like this iPad case- very compact
content: Really easy to see- I had a black case that I was always losing on my car seat (seats are black,too). Fits my IPad Air perfectly- not at all bulky.

author: Amazon Customer
title: Similiar, but not the same as authentic Apple Ipad Air 1st Edition Case
content: I like the open access to volume controls and power cable input. However, it does not fold exactly the same for viewing. Also, the case does not shut down or go into sleep mode when you close the cover if you have any current programs running. The authentic Ipad case has a magnet on the cover that would help close any programs running when you closed the cover. You have to do this manually with the JETech case. The back side of the case has a harder plastic cover which seems to slide more on hard surfaces. Overall, it does it's job holding my Ipad and protecting it.

author: Samir B. Shah
title: Nice look and feel
content: I haven't used for long yet to judge the durability. But from the look and feel, it seems like a nice product.

author: Jason K.
title: Excellent product!
content: This cover is awesome! So perfect and you just can't get a better price on it! Fits perfect and is so slim, yet protects your iPad and stands great! Highly recommended!

author: S. DAngelo
title: Perfect fit
content: I was worried about how this would fit after reading reviews and questions about problems with proper fit.  However, this case fits like a glove on the models listed in the description. Very happy with the case.

author: Jamie Cline
title: Did not last
content: This case cracked after a few weeks of light use.  Would not buy again.

author: tophermonster
title: Good buy
content: Exactly what I expected. Fit perfectly arrived on time.

author: Julie
title: Nice Price for a Nice Cover !
content:
I'm satiated with this iPad cover.  : )
It would be nice if it could be propped at more than one angle.
I like the magnetism when it's in the triangle.

author: Rebecca H Rosenberger
title: Not a bad case overall
content: Not a bad case overall, but I'm only a weeks into owning this product and then thin piece of plastic between the screen and volume up/down buttons is broken.  My ipad spends 90% of it's time on a stand on my desk and I don't think I've taken it out of the house since the new case was put on.

author: Adventurous
title: Noce
content: It’s good for the table.

author: LMR
title: Perfect Fit!
content: This case fits like a glove. Exactly what was hoped for.

author: Aren
title: It worked but smelled so bad, had to leave it outside for dew hours ...
content: It worked but smelled so bad, had to leave it outside for dew hours to get rid of the smell.

author: Cody S.
title: Fits like a glove.
content: For the price, I’m amazed at the quality of this item.  It seals perfectly and fits perfectly.  Material is fingerprint resistant.  Case allows me to cover the nasty scratch on the back of my Amazon so-called refurbished iPad.  Highly recommended!

author: Jorge Vera
title: Very happy customer
content: Excellent!!!! I purchased this for my wife's new Ipad Air and did not want to spend too much money on the Apple branded or Logitech / Speck Products.  I was at work when this arrived and was pleasantly surprised that my 13 year old son had already fitted my wife's Ipad with the new cover.  It looks awesome and the magnetic clasp that enables the on/off is absolutely necessary in this busy family.

author: Christophor Wilson
title: Very cute
content: Bought for my daughter's iPad, she loves it and it seems like good quality, works great.  We've had it for about 2 months now and had no issues despite it being taken in and out of the cover repeatedly to play Osmo (which requires the iPad to be out of the cover).

author: Jason Melvin
title: good low-cost option
content: very good for the money. It protects the screen and the magnet has worked great for us so far. I wonder how much it will protect from drops, which is actually significant. I didn't buy a case until our kids dropped the iPad on concrete and shattered the screen. I replaced it but prefer not to go through that again (glass goes everywhere!). This case seems to fit the bill but if you want serious drop protection then you will have to pay more.

author: juan manuel tello
title: Four Stars
content: Good

author: mr_kix
title: Five Stars
content: Way better that I hoped for, especially as priced!  I highly recommend buying, even as a precaution.

author: Dustin
title: LOVE this case
content:
LOVE this case!  Not only does it fit perfectly on my iPad, the price point is just perfect!

Beware, though, you do get what you pay for.  If you're someone who likes to throw their iPad around and expects to drop it with no issues, do not buy this case!  However, if you're more of a cautious person (or don't have kids), then you'll love this case!

author: Nichole M
title: Nice and slim
content: My husband had a case like this for the past few years but had finally worn out. He wanted something similar to what he had and this is perfect! He loves that it is nice and slim. The cover protects the screen when not in use and forces it to "go to sleep". It fits perfectly to his iPad Air 1.

author: J. Ban
title: Great economy case!
content: Exactly what we wanted for our iPad. This is similar to the Apple ones, but quite a bit less. took it on a trip and it traveled well and protected the edges perfectly.

author: capnchaos
title: Did Not Last
content: Bought this Ordered on June 4, 2015 , dropped once last week and corner broke off. Also cover not holding up well. Need a new one but will not buy this one unless replaced by seller.

author: Little
title: Durable cover
content: The cover feels as good as the IPad original one (said to be designed by Jobs himself).  It is not as light weighted though, but to me it’s good enough.

author: Mimi
title: Well made iPad case.
content: Bought case for my husband’s iPad Air, 1sr edition. It fits perfectly and seems very sturdy. The back seems much stronger than the other brand we replaced which had a clear plastic back that cracked and broke within several months after purchase.

author: Gramasue64
title: Good Product!
content: This is a nice cover for the cost--it's not leather, but seems very durable.  Magnetic close works well, and color is nice!

author: Royal R Morse
title: Great Case
content: Fits great. Looks like great quality. Came right on time. Life couldn’t be better

author: Mac Daddy
title: Excellent Replacement for Original Case
content: I needed a new case to purchase my original case. This one fits my iPad perfectly. The back is much more durable than the original Apple case. I particularly like the opening for the headphone/speaker jack. The opening on the original Apple case was too small to accommodate the jack for my Bose computer speakers.  That’s not a problem for this case.

author: Carrie
title: Perfect!!
content: I ordered 2 of these - one for my iPad Air and one for my new iPad. Same size. They work beautifully!!

author: MUBARAK LEVERE
title: Amazing product
content:
Dear JETech,

  I would just like to start off saying what an amazing product you have bestowed. It's so creative, user friendly, and it's capable for standing up in its own. " 'How marvelous,' " I thought. To have such a product so simple to use and set up in such a short time frame. I highly recommend this case. 11/10 quality👌🏾

Sincerely,
A Customer of Yours😄

author: Dom
title: Five Stars
content: Perfect fit, minimal bulk. I am completely satisfied

author: Yogini Linda
title: It is what it says it is.
content: Simple, light weight, and functional.  Works as described, fits perfectly, and offers some protection to my iPad.  Worth the price.

author: dnk88
title: Great value, some peeling/damage after little use
content: For the cost, this is an excellent case. It looks and feels just like the Apple smart covers do. Only complaint is that in just about 2 months of ownership (without daily use), the matte/silky layer has begun to peel off on all the corners and random patches all over the case. It's just an aesthetic thing, and otherwise the case is wonderful. I've even dropped my iPad and the case did a great job of protecting it.

author: Prasad
title: Good cover, love it
content:
This is the second purchase for Ipad air, I like the case. It really protects well from ipad drops/falls, and it's not bulky.
Reason for 4 starts, instead of 5: Plastic back cover broke in the corner, so had to buy second one.

author: Sy
title: Ok but poor quality
content: If you like purple it's cool.  But the plastic around the power button broke and I had to file the sharp edges to keep from cutting myself.  It's OK if you are careful and don't plan on using harshly.  I will be getting a better quality one as soon as I get a chance.

author: Andrzej
title: Fast delivery fit
content: Fast  delivery fit perfectly

author: Kei Lau
title: Very good Ipad cover at reasonable cost. Received fast with Amazon Prime shipping.
content: Very good fit. The semi-hard plastic section seems to be more secure than hardened fiber type. It is very light weight too.

author: RA
title: Great Value - Holding up well
content: Great value, like the feel and texture and how it protects the entire iPad.  Only down side is the cover does not work as well as a real Apple iPad case for standing.  Have had the product for five months at this point and it is holding up great.

author: Beka P
title: 4 stars for the color of an otherwise 5 star case
content: My last iPad Air case lasted almost a year. This one is MUCH sturdier. Everything lines up well and I actually had trouble removing it from the case once it was snapped in so it's a very snug fit (a good thing). The color is not quite as bright as pictured. I was expecting more of a bright lime green color. Actual color is much more subdued. 4 stars instead of 5 for the color. 5 stars for the actual product. If you get the black one you can't go wrong.

author: Amazon Customer
title: Five Stars
content: very nice case for the money. I t will protect my ipad Air

author: thefredster
title: Great iPad air case
content: The case fits my iPad air perfectly.  The go to sleep cover protects the screen very well.  It is lightweight and not bulky.  I would highly recommend this product.  Great deal for the price.

author: Antonio Caballero
title: It is a perfect fit!
content: It is a perfect fit!... I thought it was going to be a texture in the foldable side, and another in the hard case, it was not. I feels the same both sides, even the hard case feels like leather at the touch.

author: Jpan7990
title: Recommended
content: Love the case and the smart feature of turning on when opened. Only reason I gave it 4 stars is because one of the corners have cracked and I am pretty sure I have not dropped it so I cannot say it is unbreakable. However it is a good case.

author: stan got7
title: nice
content: really nice case and it stands up really well.

author: Amazon Customer
title: Five Stars
content: excellent transaction. Item as promised, fits perfectly, shipped quickly.  A+++

author: Brodwyn
title: I LOVE THIS CASE,
content: This case is perfect .  It's the first one I've had that actually fits! Including ones that were much more expensive.  I love the texture.  Smooth and easy to clean on the outside, soft on the inside.

author: Stu VG
title: Exactly what I wanted
content: Pleasantly surprised to find the exact same cover that I needed to replace after almost three years of heavy use.

author: Dennis Bitvarda
title: 1st edition only
content: Nice 1st edition iPad Air case that covers, protects, and folds in to a stand for easy use. Really happy it’s still available. 👍

author: Alan R. BUCKNER
title: Already rated
content: Already rated this product.

author: Jeremy C.
title: Exactly as expected
content: Does the job.  Nothing fancy. Light weight. It does show grease marks if your hands are dirty from cooking in the kitchen.

author: Stephen Abowd
title: Support doesn't mean it actually does...
content: The case says it  "supports" sleep and wake functions.  However it doesn't ever put my unit to sleep.  Fits well, and protects but I have yet to find a case that actually does what an OEM cover does that is put the machine to sleep.

author: julius
title: Four Stars
content: sometimes, the magnet can't turn off my ipad air when i close the casing/flaps....

author: dale
title: nice cover
content: worked great

author: readingscrub
title: So far holds securely and protects the ipad
content: auto wake/sleep function does not seem to work.  possibly something wrong with my ipad. It only has  one position  seems possible with the cover folded  For the money the is a very good case.

author: Amazon Customer
title: Perfect fit, closes well, highly recommend it!
content: I wish I would have gotten this case cover sooner! I love the magnetic close feature. So far I love everything about this cover. Looks and feels great. Would buy it again and gladly give it 5 stars. Fits my iPad Air MF004LL/A perfectly. Great product - great price!

author: Bing Yang
title: A very good and reliable product
content: I was cautious about this cover. I bought a similar one from another place. It did not hold more than 3 months and started to break apart. This one is working well so far. A very good and reliable product.

author: Andrew Swirsky
title: Meh
content:
It's ok. Overall the quality seems good. I have the iPad air and the camera hole is not in the right place and covers up part of the lens. Also, the back is very hard with extremely little friction, so a lot of times when I try to pick it up it will slip and fall back down. Most annoying that I need two hands to pick it up off a wood surface.

Other than that the product works as advertised, just a bit annoying.

author: Regal Thoughts
title: live long and prosper
content: Bought it to protect my son AKA IPad Air...like what I did there!?! Eh? Well anyways it works well, having no problems thank Zeus. Sike I don't believe in Mythology, but honestly it's a good case if your looking for one, which you probably are since your reading this. Buy it, there might be something out in the abyss of Amazon that is better, but you're already here...might as well...right?

author: Whoa Whoa
title: Excellent case!
content: Great case, fits perfectly, looks stylish!

author: Jon T.
title: Junk
content: I cannot understand why there are any positive reviews of this. There are two main issues: 1. it will not remain in the standing  or "video watching" position. 2. It is made of a cheap synthetic suede like material which will obviously not stand up for any length of time.

author: Mary Ann H.
title: Disappointing
content: This is a basic case for iPad Air.  Nothing fancy.  It fit well, but after a few days of use, one corner of the hard plastic back started to crumble.  One small piece of plastic fell off, then another piece fell off the next day.  The cover still works, but that broken corner has a sharp edge.  The case didn”t cost much, but it is still disappointing when a product falls apart after only a few days.  I would not recommend this product.

author: Joanna G.
title: Cover did not hold up
content: I bought this and after 1 month two of the corners broke off. Now I have to buy a new cover because my iPad is not held securely by this one. Very dissapointed in the quality. I would not recommend this product..

author: J.R.
title: Five Stars
content: Pretty good for the price......

author: USABDASTEVE
title: Exactly what I was looking for...
content: Sleek and colorful, seems durable too. Considering how much I paid for my last one, this cover surpasses my expectations

author: Pam Metcalf
title: I like the fact that it puts the iPad to sleep
content: I like the fact that it puts the iPad to sleep. But pieces broke of the protected rim in about week.  I not using it.  Need to get another that puts the iPad to sleep but is better quality.

author: LKorb
title: Perfect fit for IPad Model# A1474
content: My mother-in-law loves it the iPad case. From the color (red) to the perfect fit. Price is reasonable. Suggestion: When looking for a case, make sure to have the model# of your iPad to find the perfect fit case. Cheers!

author: S. Sanzari
title: Ok for the price
content: Fits ok but the cover is warped and doesn't close completely. It works well enough for the screen to auto shut off. I also don't like the viewing angle for the stand. It's almost 90 degrees. I prefer closer to 60 degrees.

author: Amanda M.
title: Love, love, love!!!
content: I ordered this as a Christmas gift for my grandma. When I recieved it, I couldn't resist. I opened it and tried it on her iPad air. It fits really well, and the color blue looks just like the picture. Needless to say, she doesn't have a gift to open on Christmas now, but she's happy she has a case. I would definitely buy another one. :)

author: Raven
title: Great case for the price
content: Got this for my husband to use for work. It has a clean professional look as well as offers some protection. The case fits well and is easy to snap on.

author: Dani
content: Good for the price.  Fits well.

author: Amazon Customer
title: Three Stars
content: Doesn't match the original but it works

author: Dr. Detroit
title: Good quality.  Good price.
content: Bought for my husband.  Fits his model I pad perfectly.  He likes red color so he can find it.

author: Julien V
title: Get it!
content: I love this case. It's my second time buying since I tend to drop my iPad a lot and this case, though thin, still protects against the damages. I love it and will continue to buy this case once I break all of mine. Haha.

author: S. Corbitt
title: Great Buy
content: This cover is reasonably priced and it arrived in record time. It fits well and is sturdy and strong.. I highly recommend JETech as a great company to do business with.

author: AwardB
title: Fatal flaws
content: I have now purchased 3 of these cases. They seem well made, at least in the beginning. Within months, the plastic cracks in the exact same areas on all the cases, and the iPad becomes loose and will fall out if you are not careful. After the first one, I was willing to give them the benefit of the doubt, but now after having all 3 fail with the same problem, I'm done with these. Too bad, because other than this obviously fatal problem, they seem like good cases. But not really. Trying one of the Fintie cases next.

author: LA
title: Good protection
content: It fits! After many attempts by my mother to find a case that would protect her iPad Air and many fails and returns I stepped in and ordered this case. It is durable but at a cost. It definitely adds weight to the device. Also it is very plastic looking. But really, we are just happy we found an afordable solution.

author: Hypercussion
title: Spend the extra money and get the REAL Apple smart cover
content: This nothing but a cheap and flimsy imitation of the Apple smart cover. This is a little different as well as it actually has a back cover and that is part of the problem. The fit is horrible and my ipad is popping out of the case often. And if you use the cover as a stand (like it was designed) and fold it in various configurations... the cover doesn't revert back to flat when you close it (see picture) so it doesn't even do a good job of protecting your ipad which should be the first and foremost thing it does. Spent the extra $10 - 15 and buy the genuine Apple smart cover. I have one on another ipad and it works flawlessly.

author: Amazon Customer
title: It won’t last!

content: Nice case, and fits well.  Much more affordable than the offering from Apple, without any discernible major differences.  The magnetic catch works well, and also powers off the iPad, just like the original Apple cover.  I have an Apple cover for my older iPad, so can compare them side by side. title: The plastic loosened quickly and the ipad would not stay in
content:
This one became loose very quickly within just a couple of months. Loose enough for the ipad to slip out. It then cracked in a few places. I am replacing with a different style after less than 6 months.

So I have had issues with ipad air cases. The first magnetic one with no back I bought from Apple was perfect. It lasted me two years and then it was so irreparably dirty I had to change apple no longer sells that type.  The second case I bought  was similar to this but with a translucent back and lasted about a year before breaking.

author: 911jason
title: Could have been great, but broke in less than a week
content: At first, we were very impressed with the quality of this case. The outer shell has a very soft-touch finish that is comfortable to hold. Even more so than the OEM Apple cover. The red is exactly as pictured. My wife was a bit concerned that the inside of the case was hard plastic and not cushioned in any way, but I wasn't concerned. After a week of use, however, the very thin piece that surrounds the sleep button at the top of the iPad has cracked all the way through. This piece is approximately 1mm thick and in hindsight it's not very surprising that it broke. Don't think it's going to stay on the iPad as well without that piece in place though.

author: Richard H. Reitz
title: Downgrade rating to 3 stars. Plastic back is brittle and cracks upon small drop, is now useless. OK if you're VERY careful!
content:
Apple's smart cover for my original iPad Air frayed at the seams, so I ordered this as a replacement early in Dec, 2015. The case came in two days and fit the iPad Air perfectly with no problems. The smart cover functions perfectly, and the iPad seems much better protected that it was with Apple's smart cover only.

The case appears to be well made and durable, with openings cut in exactly the right place for camera, earphones, and speakers. Hopefully it will last longer than Apple's smart cover (which wore out in less than a year due to cover splitting and separating from magnets). Time will tell (I've only had it a couple of weeks), but so far I am very pleased and would definitely recommend it to others.

author: peekaboo
title: Great product. Great price.
content: I hardly ever write reviews and this product is so awesome I felt like I should write one. I bought this because the covers at the apple store was 80 bucks. This is a very good product for the price range. I looked at the covers at the apple store and compared them to this one. I find this cover to be no different and to me it even appears superior than the apple covers. I can't say this for a fact since I have never owned an apple i pad cover. But at the apple store they allowed me to see their covers without the packaging and I can say from that experience I feel like this product is superior. I love the case. it's light weight and protects my product from scratches. I great buy. I don't consider this to be cheap quality. I feel like i got a great product and a great deal on the price.

author: IMHO...
title: Nice case, but it doesn't last. Cracks on the back.
content:
This product fit quite nicely and served me pretty well, for about 6 weeks. After that, the back progressively started to crack for no apparent reason. It has developed cracks along three out of four of the corners, Granted, one of the times was when I dropped it on the corner which was my own fault, but the other cracks were not in response to droppage, they just sort of appeared on their own. Also, there is a very thin piece of plastic that goes around one of the buttons that just broke off on its own.
Once the corners develop cracks, the case won't fit nicely on the ipad, and it's likely to slip right out of the case on its own.
On the positive side; the magnetic closure works really well, and it offers both front and back protection.
I have yet to find a slim plastic back case for the ipad that does not crack. I understand that they have thick rubbery/silicone type cases that are literally uncrackable, but that adds so much bulk and heft to the ipad that it sort of defeats the purpose. So, I may have to repurchase an uncracked case.
