title: Apple iPad Air case by JETech
content: Great price and great replacement for the higher priced Apple iPad Air case. It's not leather, but the fact that the fit is excellent and doesn't add bulk, and the sleep closure magnetic feature works effectively make this a superior choice at a phenomenal price. I'm happy with this purchase!

author: Kimberly VanGoethem
title: Very nice...
content: Very nice I-pad air case. The fit is perfect. I have bought this case before. I needed a couple more, so I repurchased this one again. Lots of cool colors.

author: Gil S
title: 2 of them broke down
content: I have no idea how this product is ranked so high by so many people. I got my case and it literally broke after ~2 months. I got a 2nd one exactly the same as the old one, and it broke again. One can be a coincidence, 2 are not.

author: Balot
title: Excellent product!
content: Excellent product, light and easy to use. Although not as heavy duty compared to other brand, this offer reasonable protection and access to my IPad. Best of all it is affordable and reasonable price.

author: A. Ateeq
title: Nice and snug. Magnet could be stronger.
content: Overall happy with the product. Snaps over the corners of my iPad air quite correctly. The magnet isn't as strong as I've seen on some other covers. So the flap comes off sometimes if I hold the iPad face down while picking it up. Good price for great protection.

author: L. W. Noronha
title: It wins on form, function, and price
content:
I have more than 2 iPads and this is the best kind of case I like.

- It snaps on in a second,
- is very reasonably priced,
- is sleek and functional (no padding - which is the way I like it - when I travel I put it in a neoprene bag),
- the top cover juts out about 1/16 inches which makes it a breeze to open (I have another kind which I open with a magnet or my nails).

author: MM L.
title: So far so good
content: Have only had for 4 weeks.

author: Lorene Ballew
title: Buy it.
content: Love, this case I have purchased so many cases in the passed just to br disappointed this is what I have been looking for.

author: Twinkle Toes
title: Sturdy cover at a great price.
content: Great product.  Very sturdy and an extremely snug fit.  So much superior to the old Apple leather iPad case I had previously.  Great price too.

author: Jon
title: Not that great of material, plastic very brittle
content: Edges are breaking off already, and will not stay standing in the desktop position.

author: DT
title: Great product and great customer service
content: Great cover and great customer service. The first case I got was deformed around the edges and wouldn't stick to the case when I folded the case to stand. I sent an email with pictures to JETech and they were very responsive. For the price, very solid and works great. No regrets.

author: MCC PE
title: Easy to install
content: Easy to install, should give good scratch protection.  Haven't dropped it yet to know how well it'll protect against those.

author: Sandi K
title: Great Case!
content:
I am really pleased with this case.  It is almost identical to the Apple case except almost $70.00 less.
I would love it even more if the inside material was also purple to match the outside instead of gray.
The Apple case is the same color inside and outside....not real important, however, it would make it perfect.

author: Ruthie
title: fits like a glove and looks and feels great
content:
Finally found a cover for my iPad (model 1475)!! This cover is lightweight, fits like a glove and looks and feels great. The cover feels smooth as Swede and covers corners in order to protect if a fall occurs.
Love this cover❤️

author: what's up doc?
title: Five Stars
content: Great product! Love it.

author: J L Morris
title: JETech iPad Air Slim Case
content: I was looking for a very slim and very simple case for my iPad and this one is perfect.  Provides surface protection but keeps the slim profile unlike a lot of the bulky pad covers.  If you are looking for a stand look elsewhere.  I do like that it puts my iPad to sleep when I close the cover also.

author: karen j smrdu
title: It fits!
content: I was apprehensive ordering an iPad Air cover on line because I was afraid that it wouldn’t fit. There are so many models and covers out there that one little overlook could mean a misfitting cover. I was happy that not only did the cover fit my older iPad Air, but the color was true to the picture.

author: Cliff's Picks
title: A review after almost two years of use
content: I bought this case from JEDirect in early November 2014. I've used my iPad Air pretty regularly on a daily basis for games and internet use. I don't however take it out of the house except when traveling for the weekend. The case has held up great. I've gone through two authentic Apple cases (from their website and then exchanged in store) on an iPad 2 that didn't completely fell apart (1st tore at the seam, 2nd the covering basically came loose). This cover is still in great shape. Magnets still work like they did since day 1. There is a slight gap at the corners of the top when the cover is closed. But after almost two years of use I'm extremely happy. I only came here to review because I'm looking for a new case for that iPad 2 that I gave to my family.

author: Susan
title: Great fit, works like original from Apple.
content: Fits well, great value. A bit slicker on the he back than the Apple OEM. But 1/3 of the price.

author: Amazon Customer
title: This is not stand for the iPad. I tried to use it as a stand but no luck.
content: It’s does basically what it supposed to do. Keep the iPad covers up.

author: Karen
title: Horrible quality, the edges are just crumbling away which ...
content: Been using this for 3 months and it’s already falling apart. Horrible quality, the edges are just crumbling away which means it doesn’t hold the iPad in place. Would NOT recommend buying it.

author: Gary Koh
title: Good Quality at Competitive Price
content: Like - price, fast delivery, fit snugly, and working smart cover.

author: John Craddock
title: Great Airpad Cover
content: This is a very well-built cover. It's a great value.  Easy  to install and use.

author: Linda
title: Five Stars
content: Very good quality, keeps my I pad scratch free.

author: Susan Reardon
title: For the price, it’s fine
content: . It’s very light weight so we’ll see how it handles a 2 year old. I should have spent more for something more heavy duty and with a strap to hold it closed, and a firmer support when folding the back to hold it up. Not the products fault

author: Jesse
title: So far so good but doesn't seem to offer much drop protection
content: So far so good but doesn't seem to offer much drop protection.  If it fell face down with the cover open I don't think it will protect the screen.  Best to have screen protector along with it.

author: Amazon Customer
title: Good
content: Fit my iPad perfectly. Does the job of casing my iPad and looks nice.

author: D. Mitrevski
title: Good product
content: Really good case for the Ipad and less expensive than purchasing on the Apple website...however...this is not a perfect fit which is why there are only 4 stars.  The camera hole is not centered and part of the case covers it.  I don't plan on using my ipad for a camera but just for heads up.

author: Tunter
title: Perfect
content: Just perfect

author: Samintexas
title: A winner
content: Perfect fit at a perfect price

author: J Evans
title: Great product
content: I am thrilled you make this product, so much better than the Apple product I purchased for 4 times the amount and took back.  Great quality for the price.  I bought more for the future!  Thank you!!!!!

author: Swade M.
title: Falls Over
content: I've had it for about 4 days and I think I will send it back. It seems to fall over in the standing position. I had a Poetic case that was very similar but did not fall over. I think I will rebut that one. Other than the falling over, it's functional.

author: Amazon Customer
title: this case is great. High quality
content: For the price, this case is great. High quality, doesn't feel cheap.

author: J. Yochim
title: Cover fits well
content: This product fits the iPad well and has all the cutouts in the right places. The product overall feels of less quality than more expensive brands- but then that's why they cost more! This will work for now but probably won't last too long.

author: Dave
title: Nice buy.
content: Haven’t had it long enough to comment on durability but it came quickly, fits well and had a good price. Hardest part was trying to read the model number.

author: Andrea
title: Tore up easily
content: Case only lasted a year and then tore up.

author: Chad Dillon
title: Really nice product. Seems well made
content: Really nice product. Seems well made. i would say I like it better than apples offerings. Magnet works well. Fits great. For the price I don't think you can go wrong.

author: Rodolfo
title: Five Stars
content: Works great

author: Lit Coach
title: Great fit
content: Light wieght and great fit, very good buy for iPad Air if you are looking for iPad case.

author: Jenn Ruggles
title: Return
content: The product is in fine shape however, the camera hole is the wrong position and wrong shape for my iPad Air.  I am told the iPad Air and iPad 2 use the exact same size accessories.

author: dan
title: Good not Great
content: Material was a bit flimsy but for the price point, not bad.

author: Kendra Spore
title: Great color but not full protection
content: Nice case but doesn't stand as well as I would like. It doesn't cover the sides of my iPad so it worries me that if I drop it it wouldn't be fully protected.

author: Richard A. Lee
title: Good low-cost case option for iPad Air
content: This case is as advertised and fit my iPad Air (1) perfectly. It is comparable to the original Apple case, though materials are a little bit less refined, but at a quarter of the price!

author: Brendan
title: I would recommend this case to
content: The product was exactly as advertised and arrived on time. It looks durable enough to withstand a few drops here and there. I would recommend this case to others

author: Kim Williams
title: Fits like a glove
content: This product is great and fit my new iPad Air perfectly.  The only problem I had was with the way it was packed.

author: Bradyj
title: Cheap plastic
content:
Update. Plastic has broken in 2 places. Very disappointed in the quality of this case.

Original. Plastic started to break about 2 weeks after I received it. The thin plastic by the volume controls breaks very easily. Otherwise it is an okay case. Nothing special. But I wonder how it will hold up long term.

author: T. Griffin
title: Highly Recommend
content: I believe this cover is much better than the one Apple offers and is cheaper. This one lays in to the case as opposed attaching  magnetically and with which I experienced constant shifting or the case outright falling off. This one also covers the entire iPad as opposed to the screen only. It has the same feel and function as the Apple case, but this one comes in more colors and is a fraction of the price.

author: E. A. Casler
title: Perfect
content: It fits perfectly, looks compact and smooth, and, as advertised, locks and unlocks the iPad when closed and opened again.

author: clpcarroll
title: Doesn’t fit.
content: This does not fit my IPad Air. It is a little too smal.  I will try to exchange it because the quality seems OK, not great.

author: David
title: As good as all the reviews say it is.
content: Very well made, light and unobtrusive.  Functions perfectly at supporting my iPad.  It's a much better design than the previous case (MoKo Slim-Fit Folio Stand).

author: momof3aussies
title: Good quality
content: This is our second cover as husband is rough with his iPad.  Good structure holds in place really good and has not fallen apart.

author: Jim McRoy
title: nice but does not stand up
content:
This case is nice for my iPad Air model 1.
Fits perfect, feels good.

but it is only for folding all the way back and holding the iPad in your hand.  The cover is supposed to fold and allow you to stand the iPad so you can view it.  The case cover is too loose at the folds that it is not strong enough to stay standing up.
This is fine with me. my iPad Air is so light that it is ok.

author: Animal Lover
title: Needs an improvement!
content: Nice color & fits perfectly. However, I thought there was a photo hole on the front which would make it possible to easily take a photo when the front cover is folded to the back.

author: Taylor Bivens
title: It is a very nice case. The price is way better than that ...
content: It is a very nice case. The price is way better than that found in stores. I had one before that held up well but with the abuse it takes from my kids and having to constantly remove the case when taking test at school it eventually broke down, but I am very happy with how long it lasted with the abuse.

author: ut1970
title: Good Value
content: What we were looking for!. Seems to be a good value for the quality of the product.

author: Eva G
title: Good quality!
content: No problems with this case! Love that it is used as a stand as well. Super convenient when it comes to using my tablet (and case) for work.

author: DjReviews
title: Good compatible case & Customer service support.
content: Compatible with iPad Air. Delivered a bit late .. Looks good too with dual stand system..quality is also pretty good...This one was sent to me as replacement.

author: MTHB
title: Very nice!
content: As advertised.  Nice smooth back!

author: James W. Gerber
title: Great Value
content: I bought a new iPad and bought this case because it was slim, worked with the magnetic lock, and was priced right.  It succeeded in all counts.  I have no complaints.

author: Joni
title: Nice case!
content: Case fits my iPad Air well.  Like the price better than my last smart cover from Apple.  The only reason I didn't give it five stars is because I don't like the feel of the inside when I am holding it.  I fold it so that I can hold the outside, that solves that problem.  The outside is smooth.  Would buy again.

author: OmaZ
title: It is easy to put on and makes me feel  much better about the iPad being secure and protected.
content: Love the color!!  It makes me feel the iPad is really well protected.  Mine did not come with the Stylus.

author: Ellis Others
title: Good quality/good price
content: Good quality for a good price. My husband loves the shut off/wake up feature. Sleek design that protects without adding bulk. We've bought 2 of these so far. The first case we had for a couple years until last week, my husband dropped his iPad hitting the corner. A little piece broke on the case but the iPad was still in perfect condition.

author: B Bahadoo
title: The cover folds and locks to give good stability to stand the iPad up
content: As advertised.  This was a replacement and it popped right on.  The cover folds and locks to give good stability to stand the iPad up.

author: Francis Mohajerin
title: Perfect fore my iPad Air
content: As good as the Apple version. Thin and feels good, good grip.  Well made, fit and finish as well as holes cut out where they're supposed to be..  Magnet lid stays closed and turns on and off the ipad when opened or closed.  microfiber is good on the glass.  All man made materials.  I use this on an iPad Air.  Very pleased.  I would buy another.

author: Barry C. Padgett
title: Perfect case for my iPad
content: This case is exactly what I was looking for.  It is thin, lightweight, completely covers and protects the tablet,  folds to crate a stand, and automatically sleeps and wakes the  iPad when closed and opened.  I would recommend it to any iPad user, espcially when you consider it's very reasonable price.

author: Adam
title: not good
content: plastic is weak! dissapointed!

author: Blonde
title: After 1 Year
content: So I have been using this case for more than a year now and it has been through some wear and tear. I'm a very heavy iPad user. So the damages to the case is that it's missing a corner, the cloth piece covering the screen is starting to fall off and stitches are worn out. I haven't dropped my iPad yet but the screen is still good. I would get this case if you want to keep the back and front protected from scratches but this wouldn't protect it from a fall. Case is really thin to protect it from falls. Overall I like the way how the case feels and look.

author: WN
title: So far so good
content: The case seems to fit my iPad Air 1st edition.  It seems to be holding together after daily and occasional backpack use. I think the case shows natural oils from your hand too readily but I've been able to wipe it clean with a damp cloth. so far.  Lifetime warranty seems nice for the case itself. No experience working with the company to comment on the warranty process.

author: Michelle P.
title: Great, inexpensive choice for the iPad air!
content:
Love this case! I bought the blue one last year and it fit perfectly on my iPad air and kept it totally protected from any damage (and yes, I did drop it a couple of times!). However, I used it almost every day - often at the kitchen table - and so the backing got a little dirty. Totally my fault, not the product. But it prompted me to buy a new, clean JETech case and this time I went with the green! The product is obviously still awesome, and I love the green as well! Both colors are a little less neon in person than they show as online, which I liked, but double check my picture before you order to make sure that's what you want!

Overall, I found that this case functioned just as well as the cases all of my friends have, but at a fraction of the cost!

author: Catherine Horton
title: Works great!
content: Work as good as Apples sleep cover, very happy with my purchase, would buy again!

author: mike
title: Different colored blue than in photos, ugly case. One star.
content: Just received this in the mail today, a few issues. I ordered the baby blue version and honestly it doesn't really look like it does in the photos, kind of an ugly greyish blue on the front and on the back of it is a different colored blue so that makes it even more ugly. The auto sleep function works great but it is just an ugly case, would've never ordered it if it showed like this in the photos. Dislike companies when they post false pictures. One star do not order.

author: T. Lewis
title: READ THE DESCRIPTION!!!! Look at the ...
content: READ THE DESCRIPTION!!!! Look at the pictures and read the reviews from other customers carefully!!! The case did not fit. At first I thought it was my fault for not reading the description of the case correctly, but others have seemed to read it same the same way I did. The description is very confusing and apparently i'm not the only one who thought so (read reviews). The camera port was off center big time. READ THE DETAILS AND REVIEWS!!! I emailed the seller, who did email me back with confusing replies. BEWARE!!!!!

author: Belly
title: Great last minute gift
content: Really nice case it was a last minute gift and it was perfect

author: Steve Brood
title: great product
content: Product works perfectly makes a very nice compact protective case

author: o.w.
title: both are nice and colors are vibrant
content:
I bought two covers, both are nice and colors are vibrant. The case fits iPad Air perfectly and when you close the cover, iPad goes to sleep.
Very nice, just as described in the website.

author: Amazon Customer
title: Nice inexpensive case.
content:
I purchased this case for two reasons:
Low cost and usability.
I have not been disappointed. It also looks good.
It fits well on the iPad Air and the front flap works well as a stand. The magnet is also something I wasn't expecting, but now appreciate.
The only negative I'd point out is how thin it feels. I don't think it would protect against a car rolling over it, but I do think it performs well in every day use.
I'm very pleased with this purchase.

author: Margo D
title: So far, so very good!
content: Sleek, attractive, and functional. It fits my iPad Air perfectly.  This is more compact than my previous one, and the stand to prop it up works better than my previous one.  My only caveat is that I have had it for only one week, so I can't comment on how it holds up in time.

author: manda
title: Very plastic feeling, not like the description .
content: More plastic feeling than the description made it out to be. It's not even really silicone. There is no real protection to the case.

author: Debra Knight
title: Four Stars
content: Fits iPad comfortably and seems to be doing the job it is designed to work.

author: K. Sanders
title: Fits well but I don't like the 3-panel cover as much
content: Fits the iPad Air well and doesn't add much bulk.  The 3-panel cover seems a little awkward since my previous iPad used a 4-panel cover but that just be personal preference.  The cover is still magnetic and puts the iPad into sleep mode when closed just like the Apple model.  This cover is also magnetized along the edge so that when folded into a triangle, it acts as a sturdy stand.

author: JL from NH
title: Good value
content: Does what it should do.  Fast delivery!  Good value!

author: Scott
title: Great replacement for original case.
content:
Old Apple case got old and iPad keep falling out.
This has been a great replacement.

author: carmen cross
title: Brea
content: Got what I ordered....a cheap case that broke in a couple days after receiving it.  Would not purchase again or recommend.  It slide to my carpeted floor and the case cracked. I had the authentic case for my iPad never an issue.  The case was old and dirty, I wanted a new color.  I will try and save a buck with one more inexpensive case.....if all else fails back to the Mac Store.

author: Donnie
title: The quality is very good and the sleep / wake function works well
content: Everything as described. This is an inexpensive alternative to the Apple case which seems to do the exact same thing. The quality is very good and the sleep / wake function works well. It's nice to have both the viewing and the typing stand. What I like best is the weight. I purchased another portfolio style case and it was very heavy in comparison. The fold back magnetic stand makes it very easy and quick to get in one of the 2 positions.  I'm not sure how much protection the case offers if dropped but I'm not going to try and see. Fast shipping too!  I am very pleased with the service and the product

author: sdc
title: It feels really nice and fits perfectly
content: Everything I expected. It feels really nice and fits perfectly.

author: YJ
title: Nice
content: Would buy agat

author: Brian Mt Jackson VA
title: I love the prop up feature
content: Fits the IPad Air that I just purchased very well and will provide a resonable amount of protection. I love the prop up feature.

author: Jim Strohm
title: Great product.
content: The case was exactly what I was looking for.  I wanted some minimalist.

author: Sweng
title: Five Stars
content: Fits great with my Ipad air, and it's light weight. Would definitely buy it again!

author: Jasper
title: Well made
content: I was wanting to replace a "leather" Apple iPad smart cover which is finally starting to come apart. This looks just like the original, fits really well, and is exactly what I was looking for - except that I don't like the feel of the the back cover (according to the specs this is PU+PC). I think others are ok with it so this is just a personal thing. The item itself is otherwise great. Just wondering whether to spend $$ to return it.

author: Terri
title: Great
content: Great

author: vernon l adamson jr
title: Five Stars
content: This is a extreamly good and functional case. Fits device like. Glove

author: DT
title: Good case, not perfect
content: The cover also makes my ipad sleep from the back.  I thought my ipad had problem at first, but I finally find out the sleep problem came from the case.  Other than that, the case looks and feels good.

author: janniebird
title: Not as advertised
content: It is not a smart case and doesn't shut the iPad off when closed and it doesn't wake up when opened.  Not as advertised.

author: Jose
title: Fast service
content: Great product

author: linda grewell
title: perfect fit, light weight
content: Fast delivery, perfect fit, light weight.  Very pleased with purchase.

author: riddle44
title: I really like my JETech iPad Air Case
content: I really like my JETech iPad Air Case.  It is the very thing I wanted to protect my iPad.  It also makes it easy to read with the ability to stand it on the side.

author: josh
title: Perfect for what I want
content: Couldn't ask for more out of a case. Protects the back and front nicely, unlocks when cover is taken off the front. Pretty stable when sitting up and I've even been able to find a way to sit the case such that the angle is lower and it is still stable enough to type on.

author: Honest
title: Four Stars
content: Nice IPad Air case though sometimes difficult to take out from the device.

author: michael j barreras
title: Case for ipad air
content: Well worth it

author: Amazon Customer
title: Case for Ipad Air
content: Nice case, seems durable.  My last one I had for five years before it got frayed.  This is not an origami type, like my previous, so it won't stand on end, that's my only complaint.

author: Chris
title: Five Stars
content: use it everyday, just starting to show some wear, but cant beat the price and protection

author: Jellybird
title: Disappointed
content: I have purchased this case three times.  The first case lasted for a long time until it broke.  The corners on the last two cases broke rather quickly.  I did not drop the ipad so I am not sure what is causing the problem.  I will not buy this case again.

author: Zhao Rui Chen
title: Decent case for its price, but definitely not for long term use.
content: Overall, the case does everything that it is supposed to pretty well for its price. When I first got it, it seemed to be a pretty good Smart Case clone; however, the durability of the item as time passed showed why it was only $14. It’s been less than 3 months and there appears to be a crack at the corner where the camera is. I haven’t dropped the iPad or anything. I just started to notice that the crack was there one day. Also the magnet doesn’t seem to be very strong. Within the first month, the magnet had deteriorated to the point where it doesn’t even stay magnetized to the back of the case anymore. All in all, the case last pretty well for the first couple of weeks, but the magnet doesn’t seem to be anywhere as strong as the original Apple Smart Case. The case is definitely still usable, but if propping the case up for viewing or if holding the tablet vertically for reading is something that you do daily, I would purchase a different case.

author: Sarah Holmes
title: This cover is the worst. I've been through two of them in less ...
content: This cover is the worst.  I've been through two of them in less than a year.  The first one that broke I dropped so I thought maybe that's why it broke so I bought a replacement.  That one broke piece by piece for no reason.  It was not dropped it's just a bad product.

author: glassartlover
title: Great cover
content: Feels sturdier than the last one I got for my husband. It has a smooth feel to it and fits his iPad perfectly.

author: TONY M.
title: It does put it to Sleep!
content: It was perfect and just what I was looking for. I love that it puts the iPad to sleep.

author: Amazon Customer
title: Five Stars
content: Nice and fits well

author: P-C
title: Weak case.
content: Had for a week. Dropped it off a 2ft high table on a mat. Cracked the corner of the case. I would’ve thought it could handle a short drop, especially on a industrial rubber mat?

author: Astute Consumer
title: Bargain
content: I have the Apple branded case for my mini and this case for my maxi.  I like this one better as it has a little more "lip" on the edge making it easier to open.  I've had it for six months or so and I don't see any signs of wear or of the "hinges" getting weak.  I recommended this one to my dentist.  For roughly 10 bucks, you just can't beat this case.

author: VC Horek
title: but definitely better than the old original case
content: Had to buy a new case cover because the old one that I bought at Apple with the iPad looked awful and was falling apart.  This one looked similar, so I went for it.  It is slightly different, but definitely better than the old original case!

author: Adam. F.
title: Great product.
content: Fits exactly. Does the job right.

author: alex
title: JetTech iPad case
content: Bought this case on 12/28/16 and it already broke in several places. I only use my iPad at home and there was no heavy wear and tear. It has been less than two months. Very disappointed with the quality.

author: Jacquez Jordan
title: You might as well put a paper towel around it
content: Fell apart after two weeks!

author: PaG
title: Great!
content: Love this ipad cover. Was exactly what I was looking for. Feels well made and sturdy. Thinking about getting it in another color if they have it available. Would buy this again no question! Very happy

author: RONALD STOCKER
title: Excellent product very happy with it would recommend to anyone ...
content: Excellent product very happy with it would recommend to anyone else.

author: Cyrus R. Mody
title: 3 of 4 corners broken. Not very sturdy or protective.
content:
Purchased this at the end of October 2016. It is now April 2017 and I just purchased a new case from someone else.
This case looks and feels good and fits well - hence the 1 star.
My iPad fell off the bed onto a carpet and the corner cracked and broke off. The break actually scratched and damaged the corner of the iPad.
At this time with normal use and 'one' drop mentioned above, three of the four corners are broken. This case is not very practical or sturdy.

author: Mark K.
title: Junk
content: Very cheaply made, Does not fit my IPad Air well at corners and camera does not line up. I wish I would have looked at all of the reviews before I made this purchase. Sending this back and looking for a original Apple case.

author: Carlos Sanchez
title: Five Stars
content: Great case at a good price!!

author: Julio De Jesus
title: Great low price case
content: I really liked this case. Sleep-wake function works great. Only downside it’s that it’s very hard to take out when wanted to switch to my keyboard case. Other than that, it’s great.

author: Ralph D
title: Five Stars
content: Replacement, second one. Works exactly as I hoped.

author: triickma
title: Great Product
content: Great product for the money

author: GP
title: Great case
content: Great case.  Doesn't add bulk to the IPad, fits well.  I had another one that was heavy and literally fell apart, so I am quite happy with this purchase.

author: Peter J. Day
title: Inexpensive but very good product
content: Great price for a very good case

author: Amazon Customer
title: Five Stars
content: light and works

author: Joseph A. Stone
title: iPad Air Case
content: Simple design,fits great and good price. What's not to love.

author: Ellen P. Stucker
title: Would continue to buy!
content: Great color. Good product. Not too terribly heavy, yet I feel my Ipad is protected. This is my second one of these, and will continue to buy.

author: Tigerfan01
title: I like that it’s not bulky
content: When I first bought this I was afraid that it would be too thin because I had a thicker, very durable case.  This one is just perfect for what I need. I work in construction so it gets banged around a little and it still protects my iPad

author: Fred Boyd
title: Inexpensive protection.
content: Fits the ipad air fine, not as "heavy" as the apple version, but does the job.

author: Daniel Kim
title: Alright
content: For some reason I thought this cover would stand my tablet up if I put it a certain way but it didn't. But other than that I have no complaints about this. It works well, and I love when I flip the cover that the screen unlocks by itself (since I do not have a code/lock on my tablet.)

author: Globetrotter
title: Not rich enough to buy cheap stuff
content: The quality of this case is dismal.  It started breaking in each of the four corners.. We are tying to glue it.  Save your money and buy a  better case.

author: FourBoysMom
title: Good Case for iPad
content: Very strong case and looks good.  Would recommend if this fits your iPad.

author: junior
title: Five Stars
content: Very satisfied

author: Cajunkat
title: Works great.
content: I like everything about it.

author: CityGal
title: Nice, basic functional case in lots of colors
content: I love my iPad and I use it a great deal. My favorite cases are those with a four section top that folds back to make a stand for either typing or viewing, one that grips the edges of it without putting it in a frame that interferes with typing, and one that activates the sleep/wake function. This does all of that at a very attractive price. I can't attest to its durability yet but it is nicely made and fits my iPad Air perfectly. Well done.

author: onu_mpm
title: Cliche "You Get What You Pay For" Headline
content: This case was great at first. It fit perfectly and I loved the versatility of the front cover (being able to stand it up by itself, etc.). However, after a few months of normal use, I noticed a crack in one of the corners on the back of the case. The crack has slowly gotten larger and now other cracks have formed. Please note, I did not drop my iPad so I am unsure how the cracks are forming. I'm still giving this case 3 stars because it was pretty inexpensive and it's still functioning. However, it will most likely give out soon and I will have to buy another case. Maybe next time I won't be cheap and I'll spend a little more. We shall see...

author: creneau
title: Five Stars
content: Just as advertised. Fit perfectly.

author: E. Mugambi
title: Works as advertised
content: Works as advertised

author: Don
title: One year or less.
content: Doesn’t last long. Hard plastic breaks off one piece at a time. Shopping for new one already!

author: Sharon
title: Quality Product
content: I purchased this cover as a gift so cannot give much input.  I dod hear that this person was very happy with the cover.  It fit his iPad 1 perfectly.  Very rich looking black cover.

author: egport
title: Ipad Air case
content: It fits perfectly. It has a snap cover under the back and an attached lift cover that puts the iPad asleep when closed. I am very happy with the performance and look of it. Great price!

author: Katzanne
title: This will break on you
content: The case fit my iPad Air nicely, but like many other reviewers, my case broke too. The bottom plastic corners snapped off and now the iPad falls out. I will have to buy another one now. I’m thinking I will look for a different material or another design.

author: Angela T
title: ... doesn't wrap around the screen as much as I'd like. But it is just as good
content: the case doesn't wrap around the screen as much as I'd like.  But it is just as good, if not better than the $80 case that I got at the apple store.  AND the kick stand thingy works BETTER than the apple one.  I am very happy I found it.

author: William T. Baldwin
title: Great replacement option
content: Looks and works great.  The original cover had begun to wear on the edges and the hinges were getting loose, so I bought this version.  It doesn't have the fuzzy inside of the Apple product.  Its solid, clicks in place and the stand works just like the original.

author: JEastOne
title: Good case for IPad Air
content: This case provides adequate protection for the IPad. The cover flips over to create a stand to keep,the IPad upright on a table or a desk. The magnetic cover works to turn off the iPad, however the material is a bit thinnner than a case I had previously.  I have only used this for a few weeks, but the quality seems good so far, overall, I am happy with my purchase.

author: charles j. holcomb
title: Five Stars
content: perfect fit; looks good

author: Anson
title: Five Stars
content: perfect

author: Tim Moon
title: great fit
content: my older model ipad's cover became worn and unusable, this product fit perfectly and secure...great protection!

author: Marlber C.
title: Good but Non-functional Auto Wake/Sleep action.
content: Overall Good case, but the Auto Wake/Sleep action that is advertised does not work on my case. Not sure why. Other than that, it is of good build quality and protects my iPad well.

author: Alain Ades, M. D.
title: Excellent
content: Excellent case!

author: Marino357
title: Fantastic case!
content: I really like this very sleek Ipad case. The feel of it is very good and the sleep wake function works flawlessly. I've only had it a few days but so far it seems like the perfect case for my new iPad air.

author: RF n NC
title: good fit, lightweight
content:
Pros: very thin, good fit, lightweight, durable.
Cons: doesn’t make a decent stand when folded. Base too thin and falls over easily.

author: Kathy
title: Definitely liked this!
content: Great case. Delivery was very quick and packaging was protective. Would buy again!

author: Quintan Johnson
title: A quality case
content: A great quality case! I purchased a more expensive case from AT&T for my first iPad and this one is very nice and priced a lot cheaper. I would say it's identical to my first case. Worth purchasing!!

author: a9
title: Lasted about a year.
content: I've had this case for about a year and it's in need of replacement. The case looks good and covers the front and back of the iPad. The black case has a grey fabric interior. The magnetic closure works perfectly. After about 4 months the case had cracked in a couple of spots. A thin spot on the back cover near the on/off button cracked and one of the lower corners cracked. I have never dropped the iPad, so the lower crack was a surprise. The flexible cover started separating along both corners near the spine revealing the board. The edges of the cover along the right hand edge also started separating.

author: M. Oropollo
title: Not Pretty in Pink
content: Very disappointed in the quality of this product for the iPad Mini and iPad.  The pink color got easily marked..a subtle brush against the cover will mark it.  After having the pink covers for 3 days while on vacation, it looked like I had them for a year.  Very disappointed.

author: alex
title: EXCELENTE
content: COMPACTO

author: LenGlen
title: Must insert iPad left side first.
content: Good case. Met my expectations, however I ran into one difficulty during installation. When I tried angling the right side in first so the buttons would be set in place, the left side would not click into place properly, and I was afraid to press any harder than seemed safe. When I started by angling in the left side first, I found that the right side snapped in just fine with a perfect fit. Well, at least now I know.

author: Jasoturner
title: Works for me!
content: This case looks good, works well, and the price is great.  Exactly what I wanted - a little protection for my tablet without paying for an "official" case.  One thing I expecially like is how thin the back side case is.  It adds very little thickness to the device.

author: Ratrod
title: Excellent protection
content: Protection for IPad

author: Javier C. Rivera
title: Not perfect, but very good.
content: It does the job, but is not 100% perfect. The cover doesn't fall exactly right, but it does toggle the sleep/awake function and is lightweight. I would recommend it to others.

author: Wonderfish
title: perfect fit
content: This case first perfectly and appears to be of excellent quality.

author: Major Major
title: Get the right model & be happy!
content: The item we purchased is an iPad cover for one of the original iPad models.  Once we determined the Model # number we had, an order was placed.  Since Apple has produced many varieties and versions of the iPad, you must take time to insure you are ordering the model that does correspond to the one you have or else you're stuck with a return.  Remove the old cover, get a magnifying glass, and look under the Apple logo.  We received the correct cover for our model.

author: Wilstrong
title: Brittle material chips and cracks
content:
Easy to install and hold, but after only about a week of use I noticed little cracks and chips appearing.  I still have the same case after several months, but the corners are all chipped and cracked, and I am really not hard on my devices at all.  The plastic is very brittle and will break over time regardless of how it's treated.

Other than that, it was the right size and fit well and does everything I needed it to--it just looks a little ghetto with all of the chips and cracks around the corners.

author: James C.
title: Great case
content: Works just like my old apple case.

author: NCMom
title: Nice protective cover
content: Lightweight, but sturdy.  Will purchase again when needed.

author: Christian Hammerbeck
title: Disappointed with first case, but good customer service replaced it
content:
Initially reviewed 1-star as had the case a week and the plastic holding the iPad in place fell apart (it had not been dropped or handled roughly). I was disappointed as the the layout of the case is well thought out.

Review amended due to attentive customer service - Company reached out following my initial review and shipped a replacement case at their expense.

author: Sandeep
title: Five Stars
content: Good product and affordable price

author: Gary S. Locatelli
title: Great cover, great price!
content: Very happy with this cover! It has a good look, is light weight and doesn't add a lot of bulk to my iPad while still protecting. And the best part was the price! Very pleased with this purchase.

author: Sally Ann Gobrecht
title: Wonderful replacement cover!
content: My husband received an iPad for a birthday gift about four years ago and still was using the original cover. I was able to find the perfect replacement cover here and he loves it.  Better features than the original one!

author: Cropduster
title: Worth the money!
content: Excellent durability for the past few years of use.

author: Linda M. Trepczyk
title: An ok case. You get what you pay for here.
content: It's an ok case. It will cover and provide some protection, but the material is kind of cheap and the magnet is very weak.

author: meowcat
title: This quality of this case is good for the price
content:
This quality of this case is good for the price. It definitely won't protect your iPad past avoiding scratches on the back and screen, but it's great if you're careful with your stuff and are keeping it in your bag when it's not in use. I'm giving it 2 stars because I got the model for the iPad Air and it fits the product, but the camera opening covers half the camera. I didn't see reviews warning about this. I might have just gotten a defective one, but be warned. We also ordered a cover for an iPad 2 which fit perfectly. So I'm not sure what happened with the iPad Air model.
--------
Update: I got an email from them saying that they would send me a replacement for free, which is really nice. I already returned it, got the refund, and ordered a different case though. So if you do get a defective product, then they'll definitely help you out which is nice.

author: Lindy McDaniel
title: Good case for the money
content: The cover works well to  automatically turn on and off the iPad.  It is slender and fits the Air perfectly. Ni wish there were a way to use the stand in a portrait position. Other than that it is great.  And the price was good

author: Deborah H.
title: We LOVE the case
content: We LOVE the case!  We looked at Best Buy, Wal-mart and other stores but didn't find one we liked.  They were all too bulky, stiff and awkward. Then we checked Amazon and found this one.  It arrived quickly and was well packaged.  We would recommend this iPad Air case to anyone!!

author: Mike
title: Five Stars
content: works as expected. no problems

author: Cyawn Starfield
title: Great Fit and has magnetic on and off
content: It was exactly what I was looking for! Fits perfectly!

author: reddog mom
title: Good product.
content: Good quality. Fits my iPad Air perfectly.

author: Richard W.
title: I am very satisfied.
content: This is the second time I purchased this iPad Air case. I am very satisfied.

author: terry cole
title: No wake sleep function like promised
content: The sleep wake function didn’t work. That’s why I got and quickly returned it

author: Steve
title: function perfect and a great price
content: Form, fit, function perfect and a great price!

author: La Lune
title: Nice iPad case for your money.
content:
I bought this for my Apple iPad FIRST GEN air. It won't fit a iPad Air 2. I've had this case for a few days now and I like it, snaps easily into place, and it's super thin that matches the expensive Apple cases which are no longer available for sale. I'm giving it a 4 star rating instead of 5 for the moment, because it looks nice and so far has worked well, but the top foldable layer's edges are I think die cut and are super sharp. I had to use a rag and a tiny bit of water to wear them down a bit so they don't cut into my skin when I hold it, otherwise so far a good product for the price.

Update - 11.7.17
I've upgraded from 4 to 5 stars based on the 11 months I've had the case. The case is in perfect working order with no issues and I use it on a daily basis. I've had zero issues or quality issues with the case since purchase. Great buy!

author: Leigh Ann Jones
title: Great product. Does get a little dirty on the front
content: Fits perfect. Does get a little dirty.

author: Scott
title: Good Case for the money
content: Good product for the money.  My wife wanted to replace her case as it was difficult to charge with her OLD case.  This new case is much better for her to charge.  We are researching an issue with the microphone on Skype calls.  It may be that our iPad is not the correct version match for this case.

author: J Moore
title: Even better than the original!
content: Even better than the Apple branded smart case! This case fits perfectly and has a premium feel. In my opinion, this case makes the iPad feel slimmer and more compact when compared to other cases I've used in the past. The magnetic automatic wake/sleep works perfectly too. Most of all, the price is right for such a premium product. Time will tell how well this case will hold up long term, but so far so good. I highly recommend this product.

author: R. Krueger
title: Good functional cover
content: Nice and slim.  Provides adequate protection without being too bulky.

author: iSie
title: Good quality!
content: Good quality and durable... I returned it because I ordered the wrong case.

author: Ronald Goldstein
title: Perfect Case for your IPad Air
content: Bought two for my wife and I and arrived today. Better than imagined. Perfect fit and wanted light yet durable. Seems to be a great value. Back is semi smooth so doesn't slide easily. iPad fits in just snug enough to will not fall out yet can remove if need be. Like ability to fold cover and prop up for reading/typing.

author: VJ Franklin
title: Great case for the price
content:
For the price this case is really cool. It looks just like the official apple sleep wake case and acts like it, almost.

There is a slight delay when closing the case on the iPad as it takes a moment to put the iPad to sleep. No complaints about it, just making note of it for those people who care. I don't care, it does its job correctly.

The only thing that's weird about it, is how you have to fold up the cover to get it to stand it a bit challenging at first, but after a bunch of times of doing it, you remember how. I do want to note, that a few times it did fall over after propping it up.

For the price, its solid, I would tell a buddy to buy it.

author: Diana
title: I don’t recommend
content: Overall I like the price of this product. However it’s been 3 months and the corners have chipped off causing my ioad to slide out all the time now. While my last Apple iPad case lasted 4 years. So I won’t be purchasing this again.

author: Catfish45.
title: This one looks to be of a better quality.
content: Had a case similar to this and after a couple of years they come apart. This one looks to be of a better quality.

author: Serenata
title: A Good Ipad Case!
content: Perfectly fit the case!  Look good!

author: Steven E Winterbottom
title: Cheaply made but lasts 3 years of hard use.  This is the secon case I've own and would buy it again.
content: Fits perfectly for an iPhone Air.  Magnetic lids stays tight and keeps dust and scratches away from screen.

author: Barbara
title: Satisfied Customer
content: I have had my new smart case for a week now. I have been very pleased with it.  I like the feel of it. It is very similar to the Apple iPad smart case  only less expensive. The wake/sleep function works very well. I have had no problem with access to any of my buttons or  earphone plug port.  My camera is not obstructed. This fits my iPad Air perfectly.

author: hugh
title: Five Stars
content: Works great with my new iPad Air

author: Glen
title: Dropped it once and broke a corner
content: Dropped it once and broke a corner. It was nice while it lasted.

author: Kvon
title: Good fit.
content: It fits well nice and tight. Also sleek look.

author: M3end
title: Great product, but arrived with a funny smell.
content: Liked the price and the apparent durability of the cover.  Disliked the fishy smell that arrived with it!  Bumped rating down a star as a result.

author: Lorena Ramos
title: Low quality
content: This is a very cheap case. I bought it and within a week it already had the markings of a few cracks( although the cracks hadn't broken completely through the plastic). The corners chipped quickly. This is just everyday college student use, in and out of a back pack, on a desk. Then I finally dropped it, accidentally of course. The corner of my iPad is now dented on the metal and the case is completely broken. I would Only recommend this case if the iPad never leaves one spot , in other words, very light use.

author: cee
title: Sturdy
content: Sturdy, fits I- pad perfect

author: Neli Petrova
title: Looks good but very easy on scratching
content: Looks good but very easy on scratching

author: Jorge Soler
title: Five Stars
content: PERFECT FIT. FAST DELIVERY

author: John T.
title: So far so good, But like new condition and fast shipping A+++
content: So far so good , But like new condition and fast shipping A+++

author: Jeff-66
title: 4 star case, 5 star value
content:
Reviewed on: iPad Air (1)

It's not perfect, but it's a very strong value. The overall feel of the case is firm, solid, durable. More so than you'd expect for $10. My cutouts were all perfect, including the camera. It's very easy to get your ipad into the case, but removing it was a bit of a task. If you plan to leave the ipad in the case, that's not an issue, but I only want to use the case when I take the ipad places, which isn't often. Otherwise, one of the big appeals of the Air for me is it's light weight, and I don't want any weight added to it.

Regarding the weight, I have a postal scale and was able to weigh it.

iPad Air 1 alone: 459 grams
iPad Air 1 with this case: 640 grams
case alone: 181 grams

weight increase with case: +39.4%

5 stars overall for being a great value.

author: Jmc
title: Very slim design
content: It's a great case. I did drop my iPad in this case and nothing broke. The cover over the screen puts the iPad in sleep mode. It fits great in my bag.

author: Lars-Eric M.
title: Good Product
content: Product fits great and the price is very reasonable for the product

author: jat
title: Great travel iPad cover
content: Fits my IPad Air perfectly. Very slim and compact and light weight. Love the purple color.

author: Mmmm
title: Corners Chipped Keeping iPad from staying secure in the case.
content: Bought the case less than a year ago. In the last 2 months the top corners that hold the case onto the iPad have chipped away and broken off. Consequently the iPad no longer sits in the case, but will slip out. I have not dropped the case or otherwise damage it. This is just from normal use and me occasionally taking out of the case to clean the iPad. Disappointed because overall I liked the case.

author: Jim Baker
title: Love the magnetic cover
content: Love the magnetic cover. Seems to be holding up well. A crazy bargain compared to the nearly identical Apple case.

author: S. McCormack
title: A nice case / cover for my new iPad Air.
content: A nice case / cover for my new iPad Air. It fits properly and works well, and I like the blue color. A good low-cost option.

author: N123
title: good product
content: good product

author: MikeB
title: Not Good for Long Term Protection!  Seller quickly replaced!
content:
Was pleased at first with this cover and the protection it appears to provide the tablet.  At first glance, it looks and works just like the Apple version.  It has been less than 2 months, and the corner plastic (portrait top right) has broken.  No drops or rough handling, just as I was holding it the plastic broke.  The case is still usable for now but I don't expect it to last, I had an older Apple version with an older iPad that lasted 4 years!

Update 04/05/17:  JETech contacted me and quickly replaced the product - very responsive!  Adding a star back and will update on the new case.

Update 10/7/17:  Replacement case is holding up well, adding a few stars back for that and the quick replacement from the seller.

author: Marilyn
title: Five Stars
content: The case was a perfect fit and well made for the Apple iPad Air.

author: Leticia
title: Thumbs up
content: It was just as expected. No complaints

author: Mamie Lilia
title: I'm happy with it
content: Very thin, but the stand holds it up when I want to listen to music or read my recipes. I'm happy with it, but probably not the best for protection against bumps.

author: Sarah
title: 4 stars
content: Fits good, good quality for the money

author: Sebastian
title: Good for the price!
content: I love this, is pretty good for what you're paying for, keep it protect and save!

author: Erin
title: Great cover
content: So happy with this product.  Have bought a few covers in the past and this is my favorite one so far.

author: MB
title: Great iPad case!
content: Case is great and great price. The retailer was very detailed in which iPad this case would work for. Also very willing to help if there were any problems. I am very happy with my purchase, so no need to return or exchange!

author: Keith A. Woods
title: PERFECT FIT FOR MY IPAD Air
content: This case fits my iPad Air perfectly. You can’t beat the price anywhere ! This is my second purchase of this case and I will buy another when I need it.

author: Goran Hogan
title: Good
content: Good

author: Lonius Pokinus
title: Initially I really liked this case
content: Initially I really liked this case. Soon after I purchased it the thin piece of plastic next to the power button on my iPad Air broke. I contacted the seller and they wanted to see the damage. I couldn't get a good picture so I just dropped the matter. I kept using the case for awhile longer but then other parts of the plastic edges. broke as well. I have owned many devices and have had cases on all of them. I know how to handle the case with care and I never dropped the case either. I guess you can't expect much from a case at this price point (less than $15).

author: Janjanjan
title: Seller's Lack of durability costs stars
content: I'm editing my review.  After using this case for 6 months, the bottom corners broke off.  Since the corners are what hold the Ipad in place, this makes the case non-functional.  More and more pieces of the case have broken off. I reviewed the seller's description and it indicates that it has a lifetime warranty.  So, I contacted the seller who has ignored my email.  This makes the item significantly not as described!  Thus I've reduced my stars to 1.  Obviously the seller uses the lifetime warranty point to make sales with absolutely no intention of living up to his obligations.  I will be contacting Amazon to see if they can help since the seller won't.

author: Joe
title: Protected the iPad but the case broke at the edge
content: Nice material and looks sleek. Protects the iPad but case has weak edges.

author: Aram T
title: I'm really delighted by this cover
content:
Simple, elegant, light, and works as advertised. I'm really delighted by this cover.
The only thing it doesn't have is the  kickstand that my old case had but the fold over stand works just as well.

author: Fofo
title: Two Stars
content: Lasted less than a month. The corners started breaking off and now it won't stay in place.

author: Nikkandy
title: Would not recommend this case and will need to replace mine soon
content: I bought this case about 6 months ago. I have only used it lightly at work and at home but have never dropped or scraped it. A corner piece has broken and the soft green part has faded considerably. The green on the plastic doesn't match the green soft piece either. Would not recommend this case and will need to replace mine soon.

author: Mitzi
title: Five Stars
content: It fits and it serves its purchase of protecting the Ipad when not in use.

author: Asmaa ali
title: Very good
content: Good quality fits my ipad air

author: Akio
title: Would recommend 10/10
content: It's cheap and functional. Idk what y'all are expecting to find in the review.

author: Trisueh
title: Get what you pay for.
content: The corner cracked after only a month.  Ipad didn't fit anymore and would slide down when slanted to watch movies.  Get what you pay for.

author: SSteven L
title: Apple iPad Smart Case alternative
content:
This looks almost exactly like Apples' iPad smart case. Definitely a different material though. However, this case is pretty difficult, for me, to take out (easy to put in though). Also, the front cover is litterally held by a patch in the inside (behind the ipad) that is like 2 1/2 index fingers long. If that patch comes out, it probably might break off soon. The iPad case (not cover) feels like a cheap plastic. Really thin but it does feel good.

Pros-
1)Super lightweight
2)Smooth material
3)Much cheaper than the iPad smart case from Apple when they look nearly identical.
4)Maybe it's just me but my case rarely gets dirty/greasy.
5)Don't have to clean the inside/outside/cover often, practically never.
6)Case aligns perfectly (imo) with the buttons except for the microphone (little hole on the top center, right of outside power button/little above camera).
7)Super slim/thin and not som bulky rock like case.
8)Good for price range.

Cons-
1)If its like a "dust dirt" on the case, it's visible.
2)Water/syrups/other liquids are also visible, especially on the inside of the cover part (like a fuzzy but flat/non fluffy blanket or some sort of material).
3)Feels cheap, especially the case part. Probably can snap it with ease.
4)Sometimes it feels like the folds in the cover part might break.
5)Incredibly difficult to put iPad in and out, for me.
6)Not that protective of drops, liquids and other damages but can't expect that for the price I got it for ($12.99).

author: Gregory H.
title: Three Stars
content: does the job but not as sturdy as other like product

author: Jonathan
title: poor protection?
content: compared to my last case (leatherette probably- i thought i was buying a replacement) this case seems to afford very little protection as it's made of rigid plastic and i DOUBT the ipad would sustain a direct drop on concrete without damage with this case!! am i wrong? not confidence inspiring - was hoping for something much spongier

author: Paul Heim
title: Light, bright and useful
content: Am very happy with my new cover for my iPad. It fits perfectly and is much lighter than my old cover. The color makes it easy to find. And it is easy to keep clean, just a damp cloth and the greasy fingerprints were gone!

author: Christy villa
title: Nice but don’t drop it the corners will break off
content: Nice but don’t drop it the corners will break off.....mine did...a week after I got it....but it was my fault....

author: Historian
title: Good protection, lightweight
content: A very good case for the money.  Much better value than Apple's covers.  The case is solid, thin, goes on easily and fits securely.  All of the edge cutouts are correctly sized.  The only thing keeping this review from five stars is that the front cover doesn't flex or fold easily, making it hard to prop it up in landscape mode on a table or desk.

author: MH
title: Excellent Case
content: Great case. Just as advertised. The magnetic power is perfect and the angle that the iPad stands at is great.

author: Jamie
title: Fits old IPad Air perfect!!
content: Awesome case.  Was difficult to find one for our old iPad Air, but this is absolutely perfect.  Appears to be great quality.  Perfect fit!!!

author: Amazon Customer
title: Roya's review
content: This product was actually purchased for my son's iPad, and he loves it.  Easy to install, to hold, fold and unfold, overall a very good product & good purchase.

author: Phil Philbin
title: Great cover. Adds weight to iPad
content: This adds weight to your iPad. If you're concerned about the weight or your grip you may want to get something that is just a magnetic cover. This works great for me. Makes the iPad seem heavier and more sturdy.

author: Aimee L Rich
title: I sadly did not read the fine print well and it did not fit my ipad
content: I sadly did not read the fine print well and it did not fit my ipad, however luckily my mother had an ipad air 1 and it fit hers like a glove and she LOVES the color. So I can't give it a bad review because of my mistake! But the case is perfect.

author: William L. Frenzel
title: Five Stars
content: Nice product

author: C.
title: Great
content: Very sleek.  Replaced a bulkier case with this one.  Works as advertised, good price.  Would buy again in heartbeat.

author: Alejandro Calvo
title: Excelente
content: Excelente

author: Beetle
title: iPad Air Cover review
content: I had one like this in red & wanted to replace it because I chipped a corner off of it.  Very happy with this purchase.

author: Hannah

The cheap cover that came with the iPad finally went belly up.  I like this one because it does not interfere with using the tablet plus it has a cover for the bare metal back.

Just for comparison, my wife’s tablet has a case that would likely provide protection if you dropped it from a twenty story building.  The price you pay is that her tablet is very had to use with this monstrosity of a case.

author: Amazon Customer
title: Great values. 4 out of 4 Objectives satisfied.
content: I was looking for a case that would protect the back, act as a stand, allow me to hold the iPad without it slipping and automatically turn off the iPad when closed. This case accomplishes all of these tasks. For $15 it is just like Apple's Smart Cover but better since it protects the back of the iPad. The material is a hard plastic, instead of Apple's synthetic leather, but it feels fine. I recommend this product if you are looking for the same objectives.

Worked great fro a few months but the corners have literally fallen apart. My other IPAD mini Skech case has held up for over 4 years.
UPDATE: the manufacture reached out to me writhing 48 hours to replace this. Upping my review to 4 stars in the hopes this was a defect product.

I got this because I just wanted something to cover my iPad and to have a stand for it which it works fantastic for but if you’re looking for something durable and nice looks somewhere else this is some cheap stuff probably made in China

Great product and super affordable!

Cute case, easy to put on. But within three days after receipt, it cracked after a drop of only 6" from the ground. I'd only recommend this case if you're planning on keeping it stationary. If you're carrying your iPad around, I don't recommend it.

Additionally, the case exposes one large & one small portion of your iPad. It doesn't cover/protect it 100%.

author: Dennis
title: Would not recommend this
content:
UPDATE 2: I just received a replacement cover and I have to say that it is a lot better than the first cover I got. The texture doesn't feel like like it is absorbing the oils off my fingers like the first one and I have better hopes for this one. I will see how long this cover lasts and let you guys know if anything else happens. After seeing how nice their customer service was, I would recommend this cover to those of you guys looking for a cheap, nice cover for your iPad. I do like how sleek and classic it looks, but it does easily get smudges so just make sure to clean it often to maintain the nice appearance.

UPDATE 1: A portion of the back cover just randomly broke apart. it is the thin portion of the back cover that is near the volume control buttons. I'm not even sure how this happened since I didn't drop it or anything. I will ask their customer service about this and keep you guys updated. I haven't had this cover for long and it is already breaking apart.

Product was delivered on time. Works much better than my prior cover for my Ipad. More sturdy ( the back cover support proved a lot more protection) than prior covers I have purchased from others.
Also easy to fold and stand up. I recommend this product highly.

author: Biddys Dad

content: I love my new case/cover for my IPad Air. It's a perfect fit and the color is beautiful.......between a tomato red and coral and you can't beat the price.....$11.99!!

author: Billy
title: Better than the official apple smart case.
content:
I was a bit "meh" about purchasing this because of the price. I tell you what though, this was a good buy, 100%. My old ( official apple one ) - The smart case, had dried milk on it ( it's mostly for my son, and he's 2 1/2 ), and we didn't know. We were on the plane one day and smelled something absolutely so hedious, it was his ipad cover / case. The cover of the official apple one is almost like a felt or so, so when something spills on it, the little " micro hairs " can absorb. Needless to say, it was bad in our case. I assumed this would be the same, but it's not. In fact, the back is a slick plastic, and very very sturdy feeling. The front is made out of what I would describe to be " close to the same material as the apple watch bands ". It's a good product, all holes are covered up, etc. I'd purchase again, and I recommend 100%.

This case has the same " smart " capabilities as the official apple one. When I close the lid the ipad comes on, and turns off as expected.

author: John
title: Better than it has to be.
content: My old Apple brand cover was really falling apart, which made me wonder if I should get a new iPad.  With this product, I now have second thoughts it looks new!  It installs easily, covers all dents and scratches, and is made better than the Apple brand.

author: Strauss
title: Feels a little lighter than the Apple covers but fits perfectly and has a good grip to it

author: jh

It's inexpensive for sure, but not in quality.  It adds very little thickness to the ipad.  The auto shut off is something I have not had in a case before and I'm surprised how much I like that feature!  Saves my battery!  I would absolutely order it again!

The stability of the case when propping up the iPad can be a little wonky but as long as I didn't fiddle with it it was fine. Inexpensive, protects my iPad, on/off functionality, etc. Overall a great purchase that I'm really pleased with.

author: Grandmo

author: Kelsonhoff
title: Simple and useful
content: Decided against a heavier keyboard case like I had previously that broke at the hinge. This simple case is perfect to protect iPad. Easy folding cover doubles as a support to hold while reading. Hardly know the cover is on the iPad. Exactly what I wanted.

author: Carl M.
title: good price

author: JGibb

content: I have only used the JETech iPad Air Case Slim-Fit Smart Case Cover for a few days, but so far I am completely satisfied with it and would recommend it.

author: Ramazan oguz
title: Look good but not worrh it
content: Its been couple month that i been using the case. Ot fits well but it already cheaped from the corner where the sound buttons are with out dropping it.

author: J. Jackson
title: Perfection.
content: Fabulous, wonderful cover. Tactile feel is like a baby's skin.  Functionally, it could not be better.  Almost weightless yet protects the Ipad without bulk  So much better than what we had for the original Ipad. Did I mention the bargain price?  No?  Well, even my husband feels this cover is fantastic.  I would buy it several times over and recommend it to my best friend.  You cannot go wrong.

author: MooN
title: GREAT IPAD CASE IPAD AIR 1ST EDITION

content: The case is sturdy and light in addition to being trim.  it offers what I was looking for in a case and the price. Was right too

author: BobLoyd
title: Just what I wanted!
content: Obviously, my iPad is a few years old! I bought a case similar to this one when I bought the iPad and have been looking for a replacement. Bought other types and was not satisfied. So glad I found this case. Just what I wanted!

author: Middle East Expat
title: Good but Dont Stand up
content: Good material, perfect fit but it does not stand in order to see a movie..it can only lay around 30o but not the 60o as the original Apple cover

author: Amazon Customer
title: drop resistance is as good as can be expected from this style of case
content: We bought dozens of these cases to outfit an iPad deployment at the school where I work. The stand functionality works well, drop resistance is as good as can be expected from this style of case, and the materials - though not as nice as the Apple case - are surprisingly high quality. If you just want a basic, cheap case that offers some screen protection and can also act as a stand, this is a good choice.

author: Betsy
title: The cover fits well and comfortable. The color is great
content: Bought this to replace an old cover that was no longer available to buy for an IPad Air. The cover fits well and comfortable. The color is great. Really happy with the purchase!

author: Charlie
title: Great fit.
content: Great fit and good protection. Just what I was looking for.

author: Jennifer Ward-Batts
title: Good product
content: The red is a very nice shade and worth the $3 extra. Very easy install. Love it so far.

author: Rene
title: I was very satisfied with the product
content: It worked perfectly on my iPad and is very light! I was very satisfied with the product!

author: Music Fan
title: As advertised
content: The case fit perfectly and seems to be of reasonable quality.  They are inexpensive enough to swap them out every year and give you device a fresh new look.  We’re able to put this in landscape mode to watch movies, or view online content on a desk, airplane tray table, etc. with no stability issues.

author: RichHubie
title: I Like This Case!
content: Needed some sort of case for my new IPad Air. Looked at all the reviews and prices on various cases. Decided on this case. It came the same day as my IPad. Snapped it on and it worked. It is similar to an Apple case that I have on my old IPad except this one protects the bottom of the IPad and also provides some friction so it doesn't slide off the table. All buttons and holes are easily available and the case seems well made. There was some plastic smell when unpackaged but that is gone. Some reviewers seem to nitpick their way through their reviews on this case and others. I guess I'm not as fussy. This case does everything it's suppose to.

author: wah001
title: One Star
content: Magnetic closure didn't work.

author: j.m.
title: Save your money for better quality case!
content: Garbage...doesn't fit as described...very disappointed..save your money for a better one. Will never buy from this seller again.

author: Scootems
title: Five Stars
content: Great cover for iPad with great price

author: Dan P.
title: Revised review
content: 5 star downgraded to 1. For a simple reason. The corner clips which hold the iPad in place are now chipping off. Apparently not durable plastic.  This after just a few months. Not recommended.

author: GypsyCat
title: Works very well. No complaints from me.
content: I’ve been using this for a while now.  It is sleek, light weight and fits my ipad well.  The stand works too.  Nothing to complain about this ipad cover in my opinion.  Very happy with it.  Love the red color. No scratches or marks on it from use.

author: Brian
title: Really disappointed. Never had this happen before
content: It's a little too flimsy for me. But most of all, it literally stinks. Mine has an awful chemical smell.  I can't leave it near my nightstand bc it gives me a headache. Really disappointed.  Never had this happen before.

author: edGiR
