content: The case is great and rivals apple or case mate cases even exceeding them. It’s durable, doesn’t feel cheap and a great case. Highly recommend it

author: Janet Crawford
title: Fits perfectly!
content: Love the case.  It fits perfectaly, easy to put on and its nice and simple.

author: JCK
title: Functional and durable.
content: Like the auto on/off and magnetic stylus holding features.

author: Dale H.
title: Make sure you have the right iPad for this case
content: This was not able to fit on my iPad Air 1. Caused the sleep wake button to not work properly tried taking the case on and off and it would not budge.

author: Ian D. Turner
title: Good and bad. Worked to an extent and also failed to an extent!
content:
15 month old boy dropped it from his hand height, so not very far. Case cracked and so did iPad. 2 cm long crack on the iPad but only on the white bezel area so am disappointed the case didn't completely save the iPad screen but thankful it's still usable and don't need to repair it so it probably saved my iPad from a complete new screen requirement.
Need to buy another because the case also cracked. So it's good and bad but without having the means for testing other cases hard to say how it compares.

author: Kindle Customer
title: Durability
content: The cover appears to be a nice quality for the price.  I am using  this cover to protect my IPad. As I have only began to use it, I cannot comment on its durability or versatility, but hope it will give good protection.

author: William K
title: Funtional case
content: Case is great except the construction is inferior. Broke near the volume controls with 1 week of use. This area is too thin, hence with very light use it broke

author: annie
title: This is perfect for the user
content:
This is perfect for the user. I bought it for my 87 year old mom to use on her new ipad. It stays in one place I could not use this type as I have grandbabies and need a super protected case
Mom loves the color and it works perfectly for her lifestyle.

author: Stephen A. Weber
title: Nice for the price
content: Looks nice and fits well. Doesn't feel quite as sturdy as the Apple cover that it replaced but the price is better and if it holds up like the Apple cover I will be satisfied.

author: Sarah
title: Nice case
content: Fits my iPad perfectly. Seems durable. Good price

author: roshan sayed
title: I love the case - it is better (in terms of ...
content: I received the case promptly on time. I love the case - it is better (in terms of look and feel) than I thought, or was advertised. The only grouse I have (which is my fault) is the oily fingerprints get imprinted on the back case. But, the case itself is very functional, fits well with iPad 2 and actually makes the iPad look much better. The material has a smooth and rich feel to it. I bought the black color case - and I highly recommend it.

author: 2themax
title: Great case for new iPad!
content: Exactly what I needed!  Fits perfectly!

author: Karthik K
title: Fits perfect!
content: The case fits very snug on the Ipad Air and it has all the openings cut out for easy access of all the buttons. The case will protect the ipad from scratches on all sides. The case feels good and grips well to hold the ipad.

author: Mohammed
title: nice stuff!
content: So far so good. Don't know what will have after 1 year.

author: Darlene Cribb
title: Great iPad case
content: It's just what I wanted I love it ..it snaps in stays in place great..I would recommend it not for children not enough protection

author: OgZapper
title: Everything they claimed it was.
content: I bought the $75 Apple all leather version 4 years ago and had to dispose of because it was falling apart. I didn't want to spend another $75 found this cover online for $10. To my surprise, it has the same feel and texture as the Apple version. It seems to be a bit sturdier than the Apple and does everything I want it to and doesn't cover up the speakers. If they were both the same price I would pick this over one over my old cover I had for 4 years.

author: JTowns
title: Exceeded my expectations
content: For the price, I cannot think of a better cover to get. The feel and quality exceeded my expectations. The magnets work great, not just for closing the cover but for utilizing the sleep and wake function of the iPad. iPad fits perfectly snug too. Order this cover... you will be pleased!

author: sleaves
title: Nice fit but flanges and corners break easily
content: Wanted to love this case, because the fit is perfect, it's lightweight, does a decent job of standing up in the 2 positions, and certainly looks nice and looks like it protects as well as the Apple smart cover at 3x the price. Problem is breakage - the fine cutout around the volume/side switches broke off within a month. I snipped off the remainder and sanded down the edges and that was good enough to continue. Then, the hinged corner on the Home button side just broke clean off. But for $12 or so, I ordered another one (they come with a 60-day NQA replacement, but I was past that). And... lo and behold, the small cutout broke off again! So I'd say if you don't plan any heavy travel or knockabouts, this might work for you - hard to argue with the price. But two of them had parts breaking off within a few months of purchase.

author: Retirrrrrred
title: Good Value
content: Seems good as advertised and excellent value

author: Alianet Ojeda
title: Great iPad case
content: Sturdy, inexpensive, stylish, compact.

author: Emre
title: ... it for the last year and it is absolutely good and sturdy
content: I have had it for the last year and it is absolutely good and sturdy.

author: Linda A. Millingen
title: IPad Air Case
content: I had a case for my iPad Air which was just not satisfactory.  I could not find the correct size in any store as apparently the iPad Air is now considered old.  I went on Amazon and sure enough, there was the exact kind of case I was looking for.  Not only was it reasonably priced, but I loved  the colors.  Also I must add that I received the case in much less time than they had stated.

author: Craig
title: Excellent cover
content: Great fit on my first iPad. Thin, good quality material. Like the magnetic on/off feature that integrates with the screen.

author: SRLee
title: Excellent product for a lightweight case
content: Service from JEDirect was very fast--absolutely no problems.  This is not a high quality cover for my ipad.  But for the price I did not expect one. It fits well and provides excellent protection for the screen. That was my main reason for purchasing this product.  I fully expect that it will not last as long as the ipad, but while it does it will functon well.  The cover (that folds over the screen) is a a somewhat lightweight padded plastic with a matte finish.  It has a nice feel to it and is not slippery to the hand.  Easy to hold on to.  The back side is a more stiff and heavier plastic like material which will provide adequate protection the the device as long as I do not abuse it.  It grips the ipad well and does not come off easily, but can be removed without difficulty if desired.  All the ipad controls are easily accessed.  The window for the camera is correct for the original ipad air, but not subsequent ipad models.  I highly recommend this as a lightweight protective case.  If you want something heavy duty or waterproof, look elsewhere.  If I manage to wear this one out, I will look for another with the same features.

author: Brent Farris
title: I didn't think I woudl like it, not leather and all
content: I didn't think I woudl like it, not leather and all, but once I shaved the sharp edges off with a razor, it works great.  better than the Apple product because the back is hard plastic .  For the price.. great

author: AB199
title: Second case, but suffering from the i the same issues as the first.
content:
This is the second one of these cases that I have bought. I like the feel of the case. Heavy enough to make me think that my iPad would be protected with a nice style to it.

As I said, this was the second one purchased, but it has the same issues that previously made me buy a new one, thinking I just needed it. On both, the corners cracked and the plastic bars that were built to protect the on/off button and the headphone jack also cracked, fell off and disappeared.

I really like the case, but as this is the second one and all the problems I am having are the same as for the first one I bought.

I am giving them a 3 star review, and I think that one with rubber corners would be. Better.

author: W. S. Zimmer
title: A great value for the price!
content: Fits perfectly and seems well made.  A great value for the price!

author: TH
title: Works great for close to a year.
content: Nice case for the money, but don’t expect more that a few month before it falls apart.

author: Norma

content: This case fit my iPad Air 1 perfectly.  I would definitely buy it agai!

author: eric chen

author: N. Isaacson

content: Yes, this is good. Lighter than the Logitech beast I got. While probably better protection it was much too heavy. On a good music stand (high metal content) I can put it anywhere and the case & iPad hold. I like it!

author: GJ
title: I will order a new case that's not quite so flimsy
content: I've had this case less than two years and do not use my iPad on a daily basis but the case cracked!  I will order a new case that's not quite so flimsy

author: Book Junkie
title: The Auto Wake/Sleep works great so far!
content: I love that the auto wake/sleep function actually works correctly. This is my 3rd cover in just a few months. However my iPad doesn't not fit correctly. One corner keeps popping out. I can live with it as long as the auto functions continue to work correctly but it won't protect your iPad very well. Being disabled, I read in bed most of the time so not a huge issue for me. Just want you to be aware.

author: Yvonne
title: A rocky start but seller did tell me how to make it work by switching settings on my ipad.
content:
I edited my reviewed of this product.  At first the cover didn't work at all (the auto shut off and shut on).  Then I tried to return it and got an automated notice that the seller didn't accept returns of this item.

I pushed a little harder and got in contact with the seller.  Seller was very responsive and told me which settings to change to allow the cover to work.  He also offered to take a return if the fix didn't work.  The fix did work however.

author: Amazon Customer
title: Works like described.
content: Works great. I haven't had the cover long enough to make a comment on the durability of the product but so far so good. It looks to be made from quality materials.

author: Gretchen G. Brassard
title: Great replacement cover
content: I was happy to find a cover for my iPad Air......the first version.  They are hard to come by!  This cover is durable, sleek and has the wake/sleep function when opening and closing the cover.  Overall, I am very pleased with this purchase

author: Sharen M. Couchman
title: Sleek cover
content: Nice and light and not bulky!

author: Gam
title: This is a great, inexpensive case
content:
This is a great, inexpensive case! The iPad fits securely in the back part of the case. When the front cover is closed, it puts the tablet in sleep mode. It awakens when opened up again. I like that the front cover folds into thirds to support the tablet in landscape mode. This stand will not hold the tablet in portrait mode, but I have a separate folding stand for that, so it isn't a problem. This case looks and functions just like some much more expensive cases.  I am pleased with it!

Update! I was pleased with this case for about 6-8 months. Then it began breaking off and cracking...first one corner, then another. I am not really sure what caused the breaks, as I am the only user and don't recall dropping my iPad or any other rough stuff. When the bottom corners chipped off, it was difficult to keep the device in the cover. Eventually all 4 corners were broken off and cracking. Time for a replacement. I just received the Zover-Ultra-Lightweight-Smart-shell iPad Air Case from Amazon today. Instead of a hard plastic (and breakable) shell, this one is more like hard rubber. I am hoping it will hold up longer. The JETech cover was very reasonably priced, so I don't feel as if I'm out a lot of money. It worked fine for several months.

author: Susan J. Lafer
title: iPad cover
content: This is exactly what I needed. Great color and very lightweight.

author: Wolfgang Roeder
title: I would buy this one again
content: Simple, effective and all that for a very attractive price. The case was delivered within two days of ordering as promised

author: Carol Sexton
title: Great cover.
content: I really like this cover for my iPad. It's very nice and a great price. I like that it is a case for all around coverage a not just the front cover.

Also it comes with a piece of paper with a lifetime warranty for the case all you have to do is follow the link and sign up for it.

author: nan1f

author: 10kgr13

(my iPad falling out of my case bc the case stretched over the years prompted me to look for a new one)

It is however less good than the apple-branded case: the magnets are a bit weak and the case doesn't stay "closed" well, the front is a 3-element split (vs. 4-element for the apple one) making it less stable. But again, for the price, it's all good.

author: Jimerna
title: Great product

author: E. McDonald
title: Great product for the money.
content: This case is just what I needed at a very reasonable price. The iPad air snapped in easily. If you want to prop up your iPad air for reading, it is easy to do.  It also gives good protection.

author: Jessica R.
title: An inexpensive alternative to the Apple brand...
content:
I honestly wish I knew about this when I purchased my iPad Air two years ago and spared myself the $80 for the Apple brand Smart Case. This is comparable to the Apple brand case for a fraction of the cost and really good quality. I was skeptical at first about how well this would work/fit with my iPad but was pleasantly surprised. There are subtle differences in this case: your iPad "clicks" into the case and is extremely secure (my old case began to give and I was afraid it would eventually fall or slip out), the bottom section where the charge port is located is completed unobstructed/cut out. The back panel IS plastic or plastic-like and if you aren't careful with removing your iPad, the corners could split. The smart cover functions exactly like the Apple brand smart cover and turns off my iPad when it touches the screen. For the first month of using the cover to prop up the iPad, it was a little stiff and would slip off the back but it eventually began to cooperate with no issues (I'm going to attribute this to the back being plastic).

Overall, for somelike me who loves to switch out cases for her electronics, this inexpensive case is worth the price and I'm confident with the protection it offers.

author: Brianne Nowak
title: Love this color
content: Love this color! Great protecting my iPad, even though it is not for the model I have, I don't use the camera so it works.

author: Dahlia
title: Great fit for my iPad Air!

author: Amazon Customer
title: Nice case

content: This is a great case and having bought them before I've always thought they were high quality. However, as soon as I put my case on, the thin piece over the volume control snapped off. We ordered this for Christmas but didn't put it on until recently. Not sure how to contact the seller or if there is even a chance for a replacement.

author: Reggie Wu
title: Very good iPad Air case... won't choose another one!
content: This is actually my 3rd purchase of the JETech iPad Air case. It's quite robust and versatile. Easy to clean, and smooth to hold. Gives the one protection you want your iPad to have -- the screen. There is a little complain. actually two points. 1. drop the iPad on one of the edges, and the edge plastic crack off... iPad was ok... I guess the hard plastic protected it.. but that's the reason I change the case. 2. the edge skin tends to peel after some use... still feels good to hold... but guess that was normal wear and tear.

author: Steve Smith
title: Durability a problem
content:
Case lasted 3 months. The plastic on the glass side of the volume buttons is too thin and broke.

I did like the case, it has a surface with a bit of grip to prevent slip.

author: Amazon Customer

However my biggest issue which I was going to think was a positive with the smart cover, however when you fold it back to make it more comfortable in your hand it turns it off, so the best possible way to hold this case and in order to make it feel good in your hands won't work. This is what caused me to rate it only 2 stars, the design in a flaw in my opinion. Maybe it was just an issue with mine but however I sent it back and received my money back.

content: LOOKS , FEELS, WORKS JUST AS GOOD AS THE APPLE CASE. WAY BETTER PRICE. I'LL BUY AGAIN

author: Michigan
title: Do Not Buy - Cheap
content: I had this for two months and the rubberized backing is flaking off the bottom edge of the case.  Very disappointing.  I guess you get what you pay for.

author: Amazon Customer
title: Perfect
content: This product is well made. Just as pictured. Snaps very satisfyingly into place and stays put. Exactly as ordered.

author: Olivia
title: Nice Fitting Case! Sleep Featire is Great!
content: I am a longtime Apple fan and have owned several iPads over the years. This case was for an adult owner, so the main concern was minimal as far as protection goes. Love that that the sleep feature actually works and it is only a fraction of the price of the name brand alternative. Brilliant color and decent quality for the price. NOTE: This fits the iPad Air. It does NOT for the iPad Air 2.

author: bria bade
title: Great case
content: Great case, Just as good as the expensive apple one.  One cool feature that doesn't seem to be advertised is that the cover, when triangle-folded on itself as a stand, magnetizes to itself!  Pleasantly surprised by that.  Not a strong hold, but enough to support the iPad at that ~75 degree angle.

author: lkelton3
title: Five Stars
content: Satisfied

author: Marissa DeMarzo
title: Great Case!
content: The case fits my ipad perfectly and looks sleek. The screen turns on when you open the flap, and shuts off when you close it. Great!

author: LR
title: Terrible after a fewMonths.
content: It seemed great at first. But within 3 months it's just crumbling. It no longer even holds the device.

author: SRLY
title: iPad 1 case
content: Good good  the money

author: Thngamajg
title: I checked on other prices online and found this item ...
content: I checked on other prices online and found this item on Amazon. I'm always skeptical in finding something at a much lower price, but after looking at the reviews, I purchased it. It fits my iPad air perfectly.

author: Dany1985
title: Good case but I rather pay more for better quality
content: I like the color, the price was fair, I've been using it for over a month and the material is now the best it already has signs of wear and it seems it's old even though I use it basically at home

author: p.s.
title: Stand doesn't work
content: The stand doesn't work at all. It's too weak. I tried multiple angles but it can't hold on to the iPad's weight. It doesn't offer much protection in case of a fall. It is good only if you want to keep scratches away from your iPad.

author: DianeA
title: Perfect cover
content: Got this as a gift, love it.  The color is so vibrant, it is so velvety smooth and hugs my iPad perfectly. The buttons are not covered like my original iPad cover but I don't have a problem with that. The stand works perfectly.

author: Maui Tech Guru
title: it fits, it works, its great .....
content: it fits, it works, its great ..... don't pay top dollar for the original when this clearly does the job...... the hinge part is a little more open so lid flexes a tiny bit more than the original, but the material and quality is fine.

author: Amazon Customer
title: Depends on how much protection you need
content: Works just as advertised.  Maybe not the the most durable or protective case, but I use this with my work iPad which hardly ever leaves my backpack.  I have no complaints.  My personal iPad takes a lot more use (and abuse);  I dont know how this case would work with it.  But for mild use and protection, this is all you need.

author: B. Vincent
title: Five Stars
content: Fits nicely and a fraction the price of the overpriced official apple model I used prior.

author: Christina Goley
title: Great case, great price!
content: Really great case for the price! I first purchased the red case in 2014 when I got my iPad Air, it's lasted really well considering I've thrown it around quite a bit. The outside material is nice feels like silicon but much harder. The case fits really well and requires firm force to remove which is great because the case does not slide off at all. The inner lining is soft material and it's magnetic as it works with the sleep/wake feature. Must buy! Great product.

author: Mike D. - LA, CA
title: Excellent quality for the money
content: Excellent quality for the money.  A little bulkier than the Apple magnetic cover (without the back), but still slim and does the job for  great price.

author: Fredsmom
title: Great Ipad Air case
content: Looks and feels very very similar to the Apple smart case....  I like it!  Appears sturdy, but time will tell how it holds up.  It turns the IPad off when you close the cover, and it turns it back on when you open, just like it should.  Did I also mention that it feels like the Apple made smart case.  Very nice!

author: The Big Duck
title: It's a snug fit, but that's good.
content:
I was initially concerned that the iPad Air (first gen) didn't fit, but with some effort, it did fit in very snugly.

The case is actually nicer than the leather one I had for years, as it doesn't pick up moisture, lint, crumbs, dirt, etc...

Also, it's more open on the bottom and doesn't cover the speakers (The original Apple cover did!).

Overall I am very happy.

author: S.C.
title: Works well, looks and feels like you would expect for the price
content: Great for the price.  It definitely has a cheaper, more plastic-y look and feel than the Apple version, but I expected that.  Apple doesn't make them anymore, so this one is a good option.  The hold seems very secure.

author: Robert Brouwer
title: I would highly recommend this case
content: I purchased a case for my new iPad air 3 weeks ago.  I didn't know what to expect.  I ordered it mainly on looks and price.  I have always used another brand cover for my iPads.  When this cover came in, it was more than I expected.  It is well designed and snaps to the iPad air tightly.  I ordered the iPad Air since it was so thin.  This case kept it thin.  I would highly recommend this case.  It has been a great choice.

author: Michael
title: As expected
content: Slim

author: David A. Zack
title: Great replacement from my original Apple case!
content: I was looking for an affordable replacement from my original iPad case, which my iPad kept falling out of. The case is similar to my original case, whih I like. It's lightweight, and comfortable to hold. A great product at a reasonable price!!!

author: FMoreman
title: Cracked after just a few month!
content: I bought this case less than 5 months ago and it’s already broken! The narrow piece in front of the iPad power button has cracked all the way through and each of the bottom corners on the case has cracked. I haven’t dropped my IPad so this was just from normal use. Very unhappy but I guess you get what you pay for!

author: Johnathon Hernandez
title: works perfect!
content: works perfect!

author: Katy
title: Nice
content: Very good case

author: shawn mcloughlin
title: GREAT BUY
content: PERFECT FIT

author: Anja
title: Dissapointing!!!
content: At first really liked this case, nice and thin and sleek.  But before to long the one corner afer another corner just flat brole off, to the point that my iPad wiuld just slide right out/off.  I thought maybe it was just me and wasn't carefull.  So went ahead and bought another one and when it arrived relized it was the exact same one Like I had before, so I must really like it.  But now, a year later (and I was careful) corners breaking off again.... so bummed.  Need to start looking for a new one but definitely need something that hold up better then these!

author: la
title: good quality with multiple positions for viewing and working on your ipad
content: Now my husband wants one!

author: Amazon Customer
title: size is perfect fit, but can‘t stand steady with compare to ...
content: size is perfect fit, but can‘t stand steady with compare to my older one ，only if the surface such as table or desk，No bed！

author: John Prada
title: Perfect case for Apple iPad.
content: The case was exactly as described in the description of the listing.  Provides excellent protection for the ipad.

author: Janis Creason
title: Five Stars
content: very nice. sleek and smooth.

author: Sara Lawn
title: but the reviews were good so I thought I would give it a try
content: I purchased this case for our iPad.  I wasn't sure what to expect for eleven dollars, but the reviews were good so I thought I would give it a try.  I'm glad I did.  We have been using it for about 2 months and I couldn't be happier.  It fits well and is holding up to my kids rough use good so far with no tears or gouges.  The front cover is tri fold, which makes it nice to use while recording video or taking pictures, you can just fold one section down to keep the camera lens unobstructed.  The material is smooth but has enough texture to keep it from being slippery.  It cleans easily with antibacterial wipes, baby wipes, or something similar.  I would recommend this case.

author: Amazon Customer
title: Perfect fit.
content: Perfect fit even with the added tempered glass screen cover.

author: D Cook
title: Works well and great value
content: This case replaced an Apple store cover that finally wore out.  Outstanding quality for the price.  Not quite as premium as the Apple case, but works very well.

author: Rod Rudder
title: Good value
content: Pretty much as described; perfect fit. Black color easily shows dust and fingerprints, but otherwise satisfied.

author: Amazon Customer
title: Very nice case!
content: This case is just as nice as my Apple case!! Great price!! Very please!

author: Tony
title: Good
content: Good

author: Dennis Potter
title: Durability
content: Great product for my iPad air.

author: Laurence C.
title: Better than more expensive cases.
content: I purchased this iPad Air cover because the $40 one that I owned was falling apart and leaving pieces of it's coating everywhere. Upon receiving this JETech case, I could immediately tell that it was better quality. The plastic cover snapped on more snugly and the rest of the case has an excellent feel and appearance. I wish I had purchased one of these in the first place!

author: William Ulrich
title: Plastic cracks away
content: I replaced my iPad cover with the same product because it was light and seemingly lasted a long time.  The problem with the one that I replaced was the plastic around the edges cracking until eventually a corner cracked away and no longer stayed on the iPad. Now, after checking, I see that it had not lasted a year. The new one  that I purchased in May is already cracking.  It did not even last a month.

author: A. Nunez
title: For older iPad Air 2
content: I just bought an iPad Air 2 (July 2016) and this case does not fit. Camera hole does not align.  As for quality, seems fine.  You get what you pay for, but it is very lightweight which is exactly what I wanted.  Bummer, it's going back.

author: John Mac
title: Five Stars
content: Great fit for iPad Air 2. Purchase one for my iPad Air. And fit great. I am in sales and won an Air2. Was so happy with the fit  purchase another for the Air2. Covers front and back but still very slim fit.

author: Partha
title: Very good value
content: Product arrived on time and it fits like a glove !  All ports are accessible and feels good enough to protect the iPad

author: Ingmar B
title: It was a very nice cover while it stayed in tact
content: It was a very nice cover while it stayed in tact... (for 1 week) But the fit was too tight for my iPad air, and it started to crack and split apart at two of the corners. I don't understand how this product could have received such high and consistent reviews, unless if I received dud...

author: Amazon Customer
title: Not Bad
content: You get what you pay for.

author: MANNY
title: Great cover
content: Excellent for my I pad

author: Joan
title: iPad Air case
content: This case is great.  Just as advertised and real bargain.

author: Derek Grace
title: Five Stars
content: I liked my first case so well, I bought my girlfriend one.

author: A Player
title: Highly recommend this product and vendor
content: Great product and I would purchase it again. I did. This is my second purchase since I dropped the first and corner cracked but the iPad was protected.

author: Tim Redding
title: it’s not sturdy enough to sit up with the iPad
content:
It is what I expected and it does protect the iPad. However, it’s not sturdy enough to sit up with the iPad! Other than that, it I’d very nice!
It took me awhile but once I figured out how to use it to have my iPad sit up, it’s great?

author: Bill
title: Love this
content: Great bang for the buck A+++

author: Swriter
title: Good quality
content: This brand is good quality...

author: Kay in TX
title: Sleek look at a great price!
content: This is a terrific case/cover for my iPad Air (1). It looks like the one (Apple)  my hubby spent WAY more for when buying his iPad. It appears to offer the same type of protection, the magnetic on/off mechanism works perfectly, and it functions as a stand (as shown in pictures). Very pleased with this purchase.

author: John L. Patterson
title: Nothing really special but certainly worth the purchase price. ...
content: Nothing really special but certainly worth the purchase price. This cover is adequate for gentle use.  It fits perfectly and is thin and light weight. If you desire edge protection in case the iPad is dropped I would suggest you look elsewhere.

author: Emily Schirmer
title: Shuts iPad off when folded back (:*(
content: Bought this case for my iPad Air. When the cover is folded back, if it comes in contact with the upper right corner of the back...it turns the iPad off. Tried to initiate a return, but that option doesn’t appear to be available in ‘Orders’ on my Amazon page...

author: Hesham Sabry
title: Great
content: Great

author: R. Sahmel
title: Good buy
content: Better than expected. Good fit, covers front and back

author: JimR
title: Five Stars
content: This cover looks great and seems to turn everything off when the cover is closed.

author: Amazon Customer
title: Five Stars
content: Very pretty pink fits the iPad snugly

author: jon perry
title: Five Stars
content: Great case for the price.  Well built and good design makes using it very easy.

author: Mark A. Stello
title: great product, great shape
content: The Ipad was like new, shipping was fast

author: Eng06
title: Not as advertised
content: Fits perfectly but does not stand up for viewing.

author: e
title: solid product
content: no complaints at all.  have had it for a few weeks now and seems sturdy.  have owned a similar case in the past.  lasted for well over a year (ended up leaving job and had to give ipad back so no way to know how long it would have lasted).  will probably be one of those products they stop making by the time i need a new one and will regret not buying 2.

author: Desiree N. Boger
title: ... for the 1st edition iPad Air and this was perfect. They continue to do well in protecting the ...
content: Needed a new cover for the 1st edition iPad Air and this was perfect.  They continue to do well in protecting the iPad  from wear and tear damage and even some fall damage.

author: Hope
title: It looks good.
content: I LOVE IT.

author: plsusa
title: Great quality and customer service
content:
Great quality and perfect fit.  This is a minimalist product but it does exactly what it claims.  First one so I'll be aware of it's durability.  Seems like very good materials.

Edit...  After four months the case cracked on one of the corners and a small piece fell off.  This in no way rendered the product unusable, just a sharp edge on one corner.  I contacted JEDirect and sent them a few pics and inquired about replacement policy.  In a few hours I received a very nice email thanking me for the information about my product, apologizing for the inconvenience, verifying my shipping address and telling me to expect an immediate replacement.  Replacement received fast in perfect condition.

Can't imagine better customer service.

author: Dale
title: Designed for the Apple iPad Air.
content: After I first put it on, it felt flimsy/light. It has an alright feel to it. It's the right color. It's cheap. That's the positive. The surface area of the back folded as a stand is kind of poor. So you need a flat immobile surface to set it up on. You can't put it on your couch or your bed standing up or it will probably fall. So it works for the basic purpose of keeping it clean and minor protections against drops. If you want to protect against drops, get a different case. This is cheap for a reason. It's basic.

author: Am@z0nUs3r
title: Pleasantly surprised!
content: I've only had the case for a few days so, I can't speak to how long it will hold up. However, so far I'm very happy with this case. Perfect fit, good color (gray), seems to be quality materials. I was skeptical to buy a case at such a good price point but, so far so good!

author: Amazon Customer
title: AMAZING
content: It has been a couple months of everyday use and this case is still in amazing condition! Probably the best case i have gotten for my iPad.

author: Matthew Isble
title: It's great, THEN it Simply Falls Apart
content: Just a bout exactly 2 years into this case it simply started falling apart. Keep in mind, I have not dropped this ever and I don't make it a habit of taking it in and out of its cover. One corner after another has just started failing away, crumbling. I think the plastic is designed to just give up and fail. If all you want it 2 years for your purchase then yeah this is a good buy. I liked the soft touch on both front and back covers. My wife's case is slick on the back and we wouldn't buy that one again. The interior has a soft material for the screen. Let me finish by saying that this cover WILL NOT LAST!

author: Miguel Iñiguez R.
title: Jet Tech iPad Air case
content: Excellent product, I bought twice...One a Year before, when the item gente old, but  functioning...and now...I recommend this item strongly...

author: Chickidee
title: Great if only it lasted
content: Got lots of scratches on me from the sharp corners but I loved the color (red) & that's worth 2 stars alone but unfortunately it didn't last. I use my iPad around the house only & had it for less than 2 weeks before I noticed the tiny bit of plastic cutout above power button near camera was broken. I'd be pissed if it was expensive but wasn't worth the hassle or postage for return

author: James J. Der Jr.
title: Does the job
content: If you want an inexpensive case/cover for an old iPad, this works.  It is not nearly as stable as a keyboard, but then again, it is a fraction of the cost, and more importantly, weighs much less.

author: TechGearHead
title: Price was the best part of this product
content: Price was the best part of this product. The case fit was not perfect but still usable until the edges started chipping off. The curved edges that hold on to the ipad eventually all chipped off and would not hold ipad in place. Junk.

author: gejj
title: Great case for the iPAd.
content: Great case for the iPAd.

author: Igor & Olga
title: Nice case!
content: Once you close the cover, the display turns off as in original Apple cases.

author: BBF
title: Fantastic! Fits my iPad perfectly and love the soft ...
content: Fantastic! Fits my iPad perfectly and love the soft rubberized feel. The stand works better than the Apple original this one is replacing and for fraction of the price. Couldn’t be happier.

author: Bruce M
title: Slim and Good Quality
content: This case is slim, and seems to be built from durable material. The fit is perfect. For the price, you can't get better.

author: White Rabbit
title: Great case for an iPad Air first edition.
content: It fits my iPad Airbfirst edition perfectly. It replaces different case that didn’t hold up very well.

author: LSU Tiger
title: Affordable, Lightweight & Durable !!
content: This product is very similar to the one Apple used to sell.  It is quite a bit lighter and the back is plastic as opposed to the leather wrapped material on the Apple version. This one does snap securely in place and does NOT slip off as the Apple version did quite often.  Pay $80 for Apple version, no thanks.  Great lightweight but protective case.  Would definitely recommend !!

author: A
title: Not Good
content:
iPad Air Case, JETech® Gold Serial iPad Air Slim-Fit Smart Case Cover for Apple iPad Air iPad 5 with Auto Sleep/Wake Feature (iPad Air, Dark Grey)

Case was fine for first few months but later back plastic case started crumbling even with minimal usage. Check the attached pictures

author: Randall G. Bennett
title: Great Case and Value
content: Bought this for my wife.  It is an excellent case and about as thin as thin as you can get.

author: S. S. Simonds
title: Terrific SmartCase. I've purchased 2 Apple brand iPad cases ...
content: Terrific SmartCase.  I've purchased 2 Apple brand iPad cases for $50 and $80 - wanted a new color but the overpriced Apple made me take a chance on this JETech Case.  It is WONDERFUL.  I'm a stickler for quality - This JETech hits every mark (securely holds iPad, great feel in my hand, sturdy construction).  Just what you get from Apple only at a sane price !  Can't say this often about certain products, but you will NOT sacrifice quality for price with this purchase.  Purchase with confidence !

author: Saedi Folluf
title: So-so but does the job for very little money - OK
content: Although the magnet hold on the cover isn't powerful enough and the cover is slightly too wide, the case performs ok so far. Given the price and purpose - protect much more valuable item from damage, I would still recommend this case.

author: ARTUR GONCALVES PINHEIRO
title: Five Stars
content: Excellent...

author: Stephen F.
title: it cracked at the corners after a few months but overall not terrible for the price
content: Decent case, it cracked at the corners after a few months but overall not terrible for the price. Looks great, and offers good protection.

author: Thomas C. Lyon
title: Good Value
content:
Case appears to be of good quality backed up by a lifetime warranty.
Case fits the device snugly; very well satisfied.

author: Rex C. Becker
title: Quality case and fast shipping!
content: Good, solid and compact case. Great price and fast shipping!

author: Frederick C. Scherr
title: Perfect for an Ipad
content: Easy to install, cleans easily, and does exactly what it is supposed to do.  I highly recommend this cover.  And the lime green cover makes it easy to spot when I misplace my Ipad.

author: Amazon Customer
title: Fits Perfectly
content: This cover fits the 1st edition of the iPad Air perfectly.  It is exactly what I was expecting and is working well.

author: Brad W Shar
title: Four Stars
content: good value. Does the trick

author: Santiago
title: Didn't fit my iPad, but was fixed
content:
I was sent the Wrong case the first time, it is great built quality and makes the iPad look elegant. Ten costumer support contacted me, the next day and delivered a new case with no extra charge. Now it works with my 2017 iPad.

Very glad with the seller and happy with my new case

author: D & R fm VA
title: Nice
content: We have had hard plastic, leather, keyboard included and a few other cases for our iPads over the years.  Rate this one as the best.  Simple protection, soft to the touch, yet you feel confident that it will protect from normal wear and tear.  The stand works well in either the lie down or stand up position.  Closing the cover puts the iPad into sleep mode.  Took only seconds to attach it to the iPad.  Can not really ask for more from this style of case.

author: crystalkim
title: Next time I hope to get my packages as usual methods Other than that it was a good product Thank you
content:
To me, new shipment method was new. I didn’t expect someone needs to drop my package other than mail man or ups.
I expect my package will be in front of my door or mail box but someone called me asking my condo code to come inside.

Well I got a package in front of my door.... don’t know how the package came to my door entrance.

Next time I hope to get my packages as usual methods

Other than that it was a good product

Thank you!!

author: MAS
title: Perfection in Fit & Color
content: This is a replacement cover for one I had at least 5 years.  It is identical to my original one, a perfect fit and the rose gold is a fabulous color.  Before placing my order, I confirmed the model number on my I-pad Air to ensure I was ordering the correct case.

author: adam baughman
title: Just buy it. Great product .
content: Just buy it. Im leaving the revirw for you. If your looking for whats in the picture its exactlt what you want. It's exactly what I ordered. Nothing hidden. It does its purpose. And for the price I couldn't be happier. It's honestly just as good as anything else I could have paid 3X the amount for.

author: Rodrigo Jalaff
title: Fits well, soft to touch, but cheap quality materials
content: Fits well, soft to touch, but cheap quality materials

author: Martin Vaughn
title: Great price for a cover!
content: Just needed to replace my iPad cover, great price, feels soft yet durable. I’m sure it’ll do what it was meant to do!

author: PhilMT
title: Great Replacement
content: After a year and a half of use, the original Apple case for my IPad Air was getting a bit shabby so I replaced it with this JETech model.  It's every bit as functional at a fraction of the cost. If you need a smart case/cover for an iPad Air, don't hesitate to buy this one.

author: Rick Weldon
title: Just what I was looking for!
content: Very pleased with this purchase (I actually bought two). Great fit and quality at an excellent price. Couldn't be happier.

author: John K.
title: Fit my ipad aire model 1 perfectly
content: Works great

author: Scott
title: The best cover I've had for my iPad
content: My original cover was purchased directly from Apple and had a sleep mode and ease of handling that this new one had, BUT the new one protects the corners.  Great durability.  Easy to clean.  Easy to use.  Very good value.

author: Franklin Grant
title: the case dont fit the Ipad the Ipad is 10.5 the case tooo little.
content: not anything

author: Heidi Allison
title: Junky
content: Lasted only a year and a half before the corner broke off.  I always treat my possessions with care.  Very disappointed with the durability!

author: Ju
title: One Star
content: Cover will not lie flat causing auto sleep/wake function to not work.  Material smooth and slippery with no grip causing case to easily slip from hand.  Very disappointing.  The Fintie case I purchased for my Kindle Fire is way better.

author: TAFS
title: Does not protect against pressure cracks on screen
content: Item did not protect my iPad screen.  The screen is still very vulnerable to pressure crackswhen it is inside a padded protective briefcase. :-( I have had this original iPad air for years now and this never happened with the old cases.

author: Nicole Oglesby
title: What I wanted
content: First one came damaged but by shipping. Returned it and got another one. Second just what I wanted.

author: Joel Matoso
title: Try to find a better case, but it works.
content: Hello everyone, welllllll. I didn’t liked too much but it works. Owww if you get it for an IPad Air 2 ... it doesn’t work, I had to make a hole to the camera.

author: TacoPete
title: This is a good case when traveling for business (like I do) but ...
content: So, this is my second JETech iPad case.  I purchased my first one in March of this year (2016), and it broke at the top where the on/off/suspend button is and the plastic also broke just above the volume buttons.  This is a good case when traveling for business (like I do) but do not count on this to take a beating.  I purchased this product again (August, 2016) more for convenience and it saves me a few bucks from having to purchase a product at Apple.

author: Larryw9638
title: Fits perfect!
content: Works great!!

author: J. Larsen
title: Great case!
content: Great case. Love it!!

author: Paula Peterson
title: Good but not perfect
content: This is the second case I have had.  The top of the first (after 2 years) one began to slide around and NOT shutting down the iPad when closed - thus running the battery down.

author: Jeremy Moore
title: Hard plastic cover is brittle and shatters.
content: This product didn't even last a year under normal/gentle use.  The hard plastic back cover started cracking and chipping around the corners early on, and now, less than 11 months later, it has lost enough material that it no longer stays connected to the iPad.  Needless to say if dropped, this plastic product would simply shatter, not providing any protection at all.  Thoroughly displeased with this product.

author: codecaine
title: This case is better than the ipad cover apple sales
content: This case is better than the ipad cover apple sales, and it is at a better price! I fit my ipad air perfectly.

author: kokoda47
title: good case
content: Feels good to hold and firm when using the fold stand to watch a movie.

author: H. M. Banks
title: Five Stars
content: This item works exactly as described. A+

author: David R Skidmore
title: Good basic ipad cover
content: Basic case. Ipad support is sketchy. Doesn't really stand up very well.

author: BEAD MAVEN
title: The case appeaers to be bonded to the iPad Air
content: The wake/sleep was not working properly. I called Amazon to say it wasn't working  & would like to return it  for a refund.  The  bigger problem is I cannot remove it. My husband & I have tried several times to remove the case but all we can get off is one corner. It's as if it's glued or bonded to the iPad Air.  I think  I'll bring it to the Apple store, Staples or some other tech place  to see if someone can remove it. The problem is  the corners are rigid. The Amazon rep did refund my money. I told her if it finally is removed I will try & return it. It's very frustrating. I'm at my wits end. The only thing positive about the case is it's soft to hold & the color is cheerful.

author: Donald Cassil
title: Fits nicely and is light in weight.
content: Expecting leather for some reason but a very nice plastic case with good feel and lighter than my old leather unit.

author: Nannette R.
title: And this one so far has the best design and quality
content: I've gone through 3 cases already. And this one so far has the best design and quality. I doubt this will crack and break so easily with just regular use.

author: SusanS
title: Perfect fit and function for new iPad
content: Fits perfectly, folds and holds well, great color ( lime green.) Has a good feel-not too slick and not too rubbery.

author: Amazon Customer
title: Good product
content: Fits perfect. Exactly what I was looking for.

author: jleedmd
title: Nice simple case
content: Nice simple case.  Not sure how protective it would be when dropped but if you want a simple streamlined case this is it.

author: Kathy E
title: Very nice case
content: Very slim and nice looking.  Was easy to pop the iPad in.  It works very well and will keep it. I am looking for a case that has a handle because I use crutches.

author: Martin Fallenstedt
title: Good value for the money
content: After an initial purchase to try it out on our iPad Air my kids liked it so much for the fit and convenience that I bought a second for another iPad Air.

author: Lazytea
title: Better than the original Apple cover
content: Great quality especially for the price. Was happy to find an older gen cover; didn't really expect it to be this nice. Nice texture and very durable.

author: Amazon Customer
title: ... is my second purchase of this case and it's great
content: This is my second purchase of this case and it's great

author: Mindy
title: bought this brand before and quality has diminished. plastic ...
content: bought this brand before and quality has diminished.  plastic that holds the iPad in kept breaking little by little.  TRASHED IT!

author: chwaters
title: Nice for the price
content: Fit perfectly, looks great, protects the iPad. Good purchase.

author: shopping lady
title: Great IPad Protection Cover
content:
Bought this in black for my husbands new IPad Air. A nice sturdy smart case which covers the iPad completely in the front and back.  The iPad snaps in within seconds.  When closed it allows the iPad to sleep when its opened the top flips over and the front of the case becomes a stand.  The inside has a soft liner which prevents the iPad from becoming scratched.
For the money this a great product.  My own first cover which I paid more than double only covered the front without any protection for the back so I purchased one in red.  When buying one for my husband I decided for this price I can change colors and bought myself a blue one so I could change covers.

author: Amazon Customer
title: Good functional case with suitable protection
content: Good functional case with suitable protection. However, the black coating on the case (not the cover) comes off, especially around the edges, and leaves residue on fingers, clothes and furniture. I could not recommend it because of that flaw.

author: sue
title: iPad cover
content: Fit like a glove- perfect, and love the color!  I’m giving 4 stars because didn’t come with the stylist!

author: Orion
title: Works perfectly for me
content: Much better than the Apple product this replaced.  The Apple branded product never stayed upright, while this one has no such issues.  Material is quite good, fits the iPad just right, and provides requisite protection.  It is also far cheaper than the Apple product, so you can't lose with this.

author: Jose Castro
title: Well made, inexpensive case. Actually works.
content: This was designed and manufactured quite well. The case fits snugly, and the flap has a magnet and fits tightly in the front. The flap does feel a little light, maybe not as nice as the $79 version, but will last at least half as long, and cost a quarter as much.

author: Pomfritz
title: Would not get this one again
content:
eh, nothing great, feels good in my hand.  But there seems to be a major flaw.  The areas around the buttons are thin where it is next to the bezel.  They crack very easy.  Now it has a very rough feeling where the plastic broke off.  Both areas broke within the first week.  I may snip off the remaining pieces and sand it smooth.  Bad design that is pretty obvious. With all they have sold this has had come up in the past and they don't seem to think it's worth fixing.

Uodate, cracks have formed in the back, time to replace.

author: Gramps
title: Ipad air case
content: Very nice cover with made of plastic that snaps on the back of my ipad, with a flap that hinges over the front of the pad that puts it to sleep like the Apple cover does. I gave it 4 stars for the simple reason that the opening in the back needed to be elongated so the rear camera would not be blocked. I have a ipad air 2 & thought that maybe it fitted the older ipad air. The flap that covers the front of the ipad is almost identical to the one you get from Apple as it folds up in a triangle to be used as a way to support the pad as a way to stand the pad up on an angle.

author: Sheila
title: Get rid of the bulky covers!
content: Love, Love this cover!  Light, simple and easy to use.  Great seller, thanks.

author: Amazon Customer
title: Two Stars
content: Kinda cheap but effective, cracked on me first week

author: Amazon Customer
title: Bottom 2 plastic corners broke and now it is useless unless it is kept flat
content: Only lasted one year.  Bottom 2 plastic corners broke and now it is useless unless it is kept flat.

author: Songgirl
title: Slim and works well
content: Case works well and fits the iPad Air perfectly.  It also protects the iPad well without being too bulky.

author: Andrew
title: Must Have
content: Love their products and wish I hadn’t waited so long to order. My go to for all of our other devices!

author: Mr A M Chapman
title: Cheap - price and quality.
content: 6 months to the day, I noticed that the corners had cracked and one had broken off completely. I'm giving it 3 stars because it was very cheap - I guess that you get what you pay for!

author: Carol
title: ... had this cover for a week but fits very nicely on my IPad
content:
Only had this cover for a week but fits very nicely on my IPad.

Have had this since October, it is now March of the following year and the case is cracking around both of the the top corners near the cover’s flap.  A small chunk has actually cracked off one corner.  Kind of disappointing.  Will have to start looking for another one.  Bummer!

author: yaya
title: Four Stars
content: We are satisfied with it, it is advertised. The price was great.

author: Emmanuel Bernardo
title: case
content: Perfect fit in my device.

author: Susan Pitcher
title: I am not satisfied with the product at all and would NOT order ...
content: I had to order the case twice because the first one arrived in the wrong color.  The second one came with a “lifetime” guarantee, but one corner split apart after about 2 weeks.  Also, the opening for the camera is not properly aligned and cuts off part of the picture.  I am not satisfied with the product at all and would NOT order it again.

author: Becky W
title: Very Durable
content: This is my 2nd JETech Case for my iPad. The first one I bought 5 years ago and it held up well.  Considering all the times you open/close the case, use the stand, it was still in working condition but it was starting to fray around the edges which is understandable. I would buy this item again and recommend it as well.

author: Kindle Customer
title: Good cover for the price
content: Arrived within 48 hours and fit my ipad perfectly. Only complaint is that when you fold up the cover to make a stand it is a bit wobbly. It will stand but needs some fiddling. Otherwise, a good product for the price.

author: m29c
title: Good look and feel but not perfect.
content: I had it for about a month.  It has a great feel and look.  One thing I notice is that when I fold the cover fully to the back, the ipad shuts down.  So I constantly have to fold one third of the cover face so the ends do not meet when folded.

author: HARIKIRAN
title: PERFECT FIT
content: Perfect fit to iPad air. I have the JETech brand cover for my iPhone 6 which had was a perfect fit. So I booked this brand for my new iPad air without even giving a second thought and I was right. It fitted perfectly. Only thing is it added little weight to the iPad Air but I donot mind that. I recommend to all

author: Sherry Sayers
title: Cheap junky
content: Junk broke after one week

author: Amazon Customer
title: Mom's Favorite
content: I got this case for my mom a little over a year ago and it's been perfect but she wanted another one due to discoloration and I got her this same one again

author: Amazon Customer
title: Five Stars
content: Worked great

author: Tanya E Cross
title: Good case
content: the case was the correct fit for our IPAD air. Son is happy with it. Seems to be well made, our last case has been on the Ipad since we purchased years ago. So hopefully this one will last a while also.

author: Amazon Customer
title: Simple design that is light weight - I like it and it works very well
content: I purchased the same product about a year ago.  The old one still works, but now has small chips on two of the corners, so I have replaced it with a new one.  Simple design that is light weight - I like it and it works very well.  It is economically priced.

author: Stevens Creekland
title: Must be a bad run.
content: This is my second one of these cases. The latest one is way less quality and does not fit well at all, including slight blocking of the camera. I have the newest version of the iPad Air. Must be a bad run.

author: Amanda K Hippert
title: Updated review
content: I've had the cover for a couple of months now and it's just falling apart. The corners are breaking off and edges are cracking. The iPad never leaves my room so it does NOT get a lot of use. Sadly I will have to buy another one soon.

author: AKM
title: but so far this is the best one. The look and feel is closer to ...
content: I have had other of the lesser expensive brands of cases for my iPad, but so far this is the best one. The look and feel is closer to what the Apple cases are like, but the fit is snugger and it all works great. I can highly recommend this case, and it is worth every penny.

author: AmazonUser
title: Nice inexpensive case -- lasted exactly one year.
content:
Nice color. Seems to be well made. Arrived promptly. All openings in the right place.
Update -- One year later -- plastic didn't fit exactly. One corner kept popping out just a little. Not enough to cause problems. It was just annoying. Finally the small bridge over the buttons broke off leaving a couple of sharp edges--it was cracked for a while. Time for a new case.

author: Julio
title: The product was according to the order and arrived on time
content: The product fits with my IPad.

author: Cindy G
title: Protects well!
content: Works perfectly to protect my iPad from two teenage boys - not an easy task!

author: Engracie8
title: great product
content: It is much lighter than my last one that had a key board and the keyboard only lasted for a couple of months, plus it fits in my purse.

author: Helen
title: satisfied for sure!
content:
I bought the dark grey smart cover for my dad, fits great for his iPad Air 1st generation. Seems durable right now but
not sure how long it will hold up, but it feels like a quality case. My dad and I are satisfied for sure!

author: T. Settle
title: Great product, great price!
content: Great quality, seems really durable and very good price.  Arrived the day after ordering!

author: Dave O
title: Strong cover, perfect fit
content: Bought the same item about 6 years ago and it just wore out.  Traveled around the globe with it.  The seams separated and the magnets fell out.  Great product.  Fits well and provides cover for iPad.

author: Donatello
title: Great price for a great product
content:
Nice quality for the price.  Does work.  When I close the lid my iPad sleeps.  Open and it activates.
Very lightweight and slim.

author: elphltd
title: Nice case.
content: Inexpensive but looks good, and all the cutouts line up like they should.  I recommend this case if you're in the market.

author: D. Myers
title: Five Stars
content: Good price, good quality; color was a bit muted from what I was expecting but that is ok.

author: Joan
title: Great case
content: Fits my iPad Air very well. Turns the iPad on any off.

author: Ramesh mehra
title: Its ok
content:
It gets dirty very soon
The day i received it there were already patches on the black cover may other colors are much better

author: L.E.B. Enterprises
title: One Star
content: bad fit

author: Jim Bub
title: Functional, affordable
content: Fits my iPad Air perfectly. Snaps right in; didn’t have to wrestle with it. This is the second one of these I’ve purchased. Great price and customer service.

author: Erik Anderson
title: Save some money with this
content: This is the second one I have bought. My first one lasted about a year. This is a nice case very similar to the actual Apple case. Performs just the same. The plastic backing doesn't seem the strongest (but i have no complaints as it lasted a year) and the front cover is barely noticeably different than the apple brand. For the price difference, this is definitely the way to go. The cover is a little sharp/stiff around the edges at first, but that wears down as it gets used. If you are looking for a cover and backing similar to the standard Apple smart cover, this does the job.

author: Jan
title: Great case
content: Bought for my husband. Great little vase.

author: A. Martin
title: This is the best tablet case I have ever bought
content: This is the best tablet case I have ever bought. I bought this model for every iPad I have ever owned.

author: Erik
title: Great lightweight iPad case!
content: Very nice iPad case. Fits perfectly and feels nice.

author: PollockFam
title: Good product, works and fits excellent
content: Works as expected and good quality. This is my second time ordering and using this brand. I had one for about 3 years before normal wear and tear, so decided to buy another one. I was happy with it and so I re-ordered.

author: Sidselvphx
title: Sleek case for iPad Air 1
content: Good case - very sleek and nicely made. So far so good. The delivery was spot on. Very Happy.

author: ScrappyDog
title: I used another case for a long time without fully ...
content: I used another case for a long time without fully realizing I was losing the compactness and lightness of the IPad Air.  This case is light, economical and the sleep/wake feature is flawless.

author: Mary G
title: Works great!
content: Love the color and feel

author: SJ in CA
title: Nice fit and definitely puts the ipad to sleep when ...
content: Bought for my wife. Nice fit and definitely puts the ipad to sleep when the cover is closed. I have a similar case, but different manufacturer and when I close mine, it sometimes doesn't put the ipad to sleep. Happy wife, happy life.

author: Sandi White
title: Just okay
content: Serves the purpose to give some protection to my iPad.  The stand leaves a lot to be desired.  You get what you pay for.

author: Karissa
title: Falls Apart
content: This iPad case started falling apart within a month of normal, daily use. The corners chip away, making it so the iPad is no longer held in a protective case.

author: twg
title: Shell cracked after 6 months
content: Broke after a few months, the shell cracked after 6 months

author: Marsha Reinbolt
title: Easy to attach
content: Very easy to put on iPad. Pretty color red

author: Nell Daley
title: I really liked it, but when I accidentally dropped the iPad
content: I really liked it, but when I accidentally dropped the iPad, the cover did keep the iPad safe...but the plastic cover is very brittle and broke at both corners, so the iPad was always slipping out.  I had to get another cover (not this type of plastic).

author: J. Wong
title: Good quality. I've had it for a couple of ...
content: Fits well.  Good quality.  I've had it for a couple of weeks now.  No regrets whatsoever.

author: Vikusa
title: Impressed with customer service.
content:
The first one lasted about 7 month only but I wanted to give it another try as reviews are good for the product. Unfortunately this time it lasted only 2 months. Very disappointed with the quality of the product and it is not durable at all. I experienced it twice.

PS- I am impressed with customer service, they took care of the matter and they will be sending a replacement. I would definitely recommend JETech iPad cover where customer service backs you up. Buy with confidence.

author: pastor mark
title: I like it. Meets my needs and does not demand ...
content: This cover fits my iPad really well and is made well also. I like it. Meets my needs and does not demand the higher price tag of other covers.

author: John F.
title: Disappointed
content: After having for only 2.5 months it is falling apart.  Will not order another one.  Cover coming unglued at the edges.

author: Shelty
title: It fits and does it's job.
content: It fits and  does it's job.

author: grandma gibby
title: Nice thin case.
content: I only wish there were more options for free standing use.

author: andrea
title: Excellent Quality!
content: This product is the EXACT same name brand products that sell at Apple!!  I searched for a few of these and purchased a couple like it but they ended up being cheap feeling and looking. This one IS NOT! It's great. It protects my iPad, is thin and sleek and feels very nice in hand, not cheap at all. If i need to come back for any more cases, this will be my first stop!

author: Maria Filamor-Robinson
title: I love this case
content: I love this case! I actually bought this thinking it was just a front magnetic cover to pair with an Aidata I also bought so I was surprised and disappointed the cover is attached to the back. Anyway, I was going to return this but decided to try it for a few days. Well, it looks good, feels good, and thank goodness I did not return it cause now I love it! I only wish they came with a screen protector but overall it's a convenient case with different colors to choose. The price is excellent!

author: Amazon Customer
title: As described!
content: Excellent!

author: M. S. Avant
title: Fine Fit
content: Very good fit for my new iPad Air, it lines up perfectly and has a nice texture that gives a good feel in my hands.

author: David
title: Light and great looking
content: Light and fit perfectly to my Ipad.  Useful stand up position.  My son is very picky about his Ipad cover.  I bought him a different model last time and he saved some money to buy this cover.  He loves it.

author: D. T.
title: Great price and fast shipping
content: Just what i wanted.  Great price and fast shipping!!

author: J. Coleman
title: Excellent customer service
content: After approximately 6 months of using this case, one of the plastic corners chipped and it no longer stayed on the iPad well. However, after contacting JETech and explaining the problem, they quickly shipped me a replacement without any hassle. Excellent customer service, and for the price of the product I'm satisfied with the quality.

author: J S
title: Fits well
content: At last was able to find a cover which fits the Generation 1 I-pad.

author: Maverick
title: Not bad overall.
content: I got this for my Ipad air. It's decent. It feels a bit cheap as compared to the apple certified cases but then again it's a fraction of the price. Not bad overall.

author: RJ
title: Life time is 2 yrs.
content: I have used purple one earlier and bought grey now. This is pretty good case. Plastic strong case for the base of ipad and smooth smart pad for the front of ipad. When you close the front pad, it automatically locks the ipad. When you open the front pad, ipad automatically wakes up. My first case was still hanging and it did good job. I can say that the life time is atleast 2 yrs.

author: Jim
title: Magnet not right, won’t stand.
content: The magnet does not work well to stand up the iPad.  Magnet does not lock into place as nicely as my old iPad case with magnetic strip.  The polarity of the magnet is the opposite to my old case, you have to fold it with the inner felt part to the outside.  But, even when you do, the magnet is too weak and often the iPad will just fall over.  Other than that, the build quality is actually quite nice.

author: David M.
title: Highly recommended for the money spent
content: Exactly what you would expect from Amazon, if you know what it is that you need.  Highly recommended for the money spent.  Maybe not as nice as the version from Apple, but for the money, it's really very good.

author: L.S.
title: Five Stars
content: Fit my iPad perfect.  Great color.

author: jon
title: It's a good solid case with a low profile
content: It's a good solid case with a low profile. I really like how the smart cover is magnetic and will stay closed when you're holding it upside down. It puts your iPad to sleep and shuts up the screen when you close the lid and when you open the lid it will turn back on. Much more cost-effective than the $70 Apple OEM product.

author: Amazon Customer
title: Good product
content: It is thin, light but tough.  I put my iPad on top of my car and drove off. It fell on the ground and was driven over but the case perfectly protected it.

author: Lala Fatma
title: No complaints!
content: Works well for what it is supposed to do!

author: Sharon
title: Dedicated Purchaser
content: This is my second case, only ordered a new because my old one broke after having owned the original since December of 2014.  I think almost two years of everyday is pretty good for this product and it's cost.  Will purchase again I am sure

author: G. Julia Vandyke
title: Great I PAD case.
content: This cover seems to be sturdy, it fits great, opens and closes easily. Color is rose gold looks pretty. I recommend purchasing it, shipped fast and wrapped nicely.

author: Patricia G. Deen
title: Three Stars
content: It looks fine and covers well - but it doesn't seem to stand very well - maybe it's me!

author: MemphisHeights
title: Great case but...
content: I love the case, looks great, fit the ipad air great... but the thin plastic piece that goes around the volume buttons arrived broken. I would give 5 stars if that hadn't been the case. Will change to 5 stars if seller fixes this problem.

author: Harlan Chiu
title: Not durable
content: The cover broke at the power button slot after a few weeks of use.  The most annoying is the poor quality of the plastic mold parting line flash creating a sharp burr that digs into my fingers where I hold the iPad in the head phone jack area.  Why a disconnect edge instead of a continuous edge?  Those design flaws add to the poor fit.

author: MKL
title: Sleek, slim, protective
content: I'm completely satisfied! It's slim, sleek and protective.  It's also stylish:) I like the auto sleep/wake feature. It's easy to snap on/off & it's slim enough to fit inside of this bubble wrap type carry case I purchased for travel (I can fit the Logitech air keyboard along with this in the other case with no problem bc it's so sleek). The only thing I am wondering about is cleaning the case...I'm a nursing student and will be taking this to clinical for help with prep work...want to be able to sanitize it afterward....will need to research it.

author: Matt B
title: It's just OK at best. The price was great but the quality isn't ...
content: It's just OK at best. The price was great but the quality isn't the greatest and is not similar to the true Apple case for this iPad. I guess you get what you pay for.

author: Saxxy
title: Good cover
content: Nice secure fit and looks good. Doesn't add a lot of extra weight to my iPad. I use the cover with a tempered glass screen cover.

author: Bryan Shank
title: Exactly what you want!
content: It fit perfectly!

author: D'Artagnan
title: As good as if not better than the original Apple case!
content: As good as if not better than the original Apple case, and soooooo less expensive! We will see how long it lasts.

author: G.  Kevin Hannah
title: Very Pleased
content: What I liked first about this company was that in the description it stated which iPad the cover would fit. I have an older iPad and found out that is was iPad Air. The cover arrived within 2 days and fit perfectly. It is lighter than my old cover and feels soft. I am very pleased with this cover. I highly recommend this company and this cover.

author: Steve
title: Good Cover
content: For the price, it's actually significantly nicer than I was expecting. Fits the iPad perfectly and the casing is a good quality soft touch plastic with no obvious seams or flashing.  We'll see how well the "hinge" area holds up over time, but for now I'm quite happy with it. Definitely recommended if you just want a basic, no frills cover.

author: RZR F-150
title: Pretty good quallity
content:
Pretty good quallity.
Nice front fold into stand.
The wake feature when opening front saves wear and tear on ipad.
Good price.

author: glenn
title: Perfect fit
content: Fit iPad Air perfect. Great grip

author: Stetts
title: Great Buy
content: Great Quality and great fit. Really good for the price!

author: Cosme Mejia
title: Five Stars
content: every good

author: Viewster
title: Excellent light weight case
content: This is an economical IPad cover that is well worth the cost.mit holds my IPad securely, makes all the buttons and the camera readily available, and is light weight. I bought it because it was the only IPad case that I found that listed model numbers. Many of the cases I saw were actually made for the Air 2, but it required a very close look to find that out. As the teo models are different sizes that's important. Because I was able to clearly match the numbers I was absolutely sure I had the right case. I could not be more pleased.

author: D Matthews
title: Four Stars
content: Nice case for my iPad. Would recommend it.

author: Grave
title: Fits like a glove and works as described.
content: Fits like a glove and works as described.

author: Kris
title: Exactly what I needed
content: I like the fact that this case covers the back and of the iPad and can also act as a stand

author: Brian Diffley
title: Fits nicely
content: Fits nicely, has a nice simple look. Great cover for the price

author: Diana Miller
title: Great
content: It was great when I forget to closed it

author: John Q
title: Wonderful cover for 1st gen iPad Air
content:
Got this to replace the old black leather cover by Apple that got terribly worn out and wouldn’t stay attached to the iPad very well. This iPad basically belongs to our 5 yo son now so we let him choose the color. Red it was!

The color turned out to be very nice looking. The texture of the front is silky smooth and the back is a thick durable feeling plastic. The back snapped on very easily and stays on securely. When closing the cover, the on/off function works very well just like the original leather Apple cover.

At a fraction of the price of Apple covers this cover surprised us with good looks and functionality. We’ll definitely try more JETech covers in the future.

author: R T
title: Fits!
content: Nice value case...fits well

author: therealtom winberry
title: good while it lasts
content: I liked my first one so much I bought a second one after that first one fell apart (there are areas with very slim bits that don't hold up to use... I had one corner slowly disintegrate to the point the case could not hold the iPad any longer.)  I've had this second one about 8 weeks.  Now it too is starting to fall apart - take a close look around the buttons and camera areas and you'll see there are places where the plastic is very thin.  Not sure if I'm going to buy a third one when this one can't hold it any longer.

author: Roger A Fischer
title: Very good replacement, can't beat the price
content: Got this to replace the original worn out Apple smart case cover (which was $40+ at the time). Very good replacement, can't beat the price. Also, the tan faux leather original displayed a lot of grime from years of exposure and handling. Don't think this black cover will that issue. Don't know about how this cover will do with wear and tear because I've only had it for less than a week.

author: Amazon Customer
title: Do not buy, listen the the reviews on quality
content: I should have listened to the reviews. This cracked 38 days after delivery. Adult use at home and very gentle. Cracked by volume button.

author: B. Gildner
title: Corners crack and break off (x2) making it worthless: and I never dropped it!
content: Bought one, hich lasted a year, the a corner cracked, so the ipad would slip out. Bought another, and it cracked after 3 weeks (neither time was it dropped, either).  Save your money on multiple cheap cases, and buy rubber, something that doesn't crack just from being dropped into you purse with your lunch and wallet inside!  Just missed the 30 day return, too bc was too busy with my son in mayo clinic all week to remember to worry about a return.  Dern.

author: Suzanne
title: Love it!
content:
Much better than the old one purchased at Apple store.
MUCH Lower price, better quality, I like the different materials that were used, too.
The one from Apple store was just plastic; this one has same kind of plastic on one side (as the old one) and kind of a fleece material on the side that covers/touches/protcts the screen. Good replacement cover for an older model iPad. I just don't know how it holds up as I just got it.

author: Martin N Miller
title: JETech Case - Rocks!
content: I purchase one for my wife years ago and the thing still looks like new!!!  It was time for me to join the club!  I am totally satified with this unit... and the power management is a great improvement!

author: Expert
title: Nice Cover for IPad Air
content: The cover looks nice and has all the functionality that I need. Price is reasonable.

author: Amazon Customer
title: Five Stars
content: Works as Advertised!!!

author: Bill Alexander
title: Great Cover!
content: This is my second cover and it works great for my iPad Air 1st Edition.  Perfect fit and function.

author: redcloud
title: Great case
content: Great case! Love the durable feel and it was just the right shade of green.

author: Mark A
title: Love this case
content:
After owning several iPads over the last 5 years and being too cheap to buy a case from Apple when my previous case became loosely goosey I wasn't expecting much from JETech for my $9.99 but what a pleasant surprise.

The on/off works first time, every time, the case looks good and feels better.

It is thin so probably dropping it on a hard floor would not be a smart move but it will keep the Air somewhat protected, is really nice to hold and works fine when balancing it on a pillow as I lay on the couch.

10/10 will recommend to friends and family

author: Steve Price
title: A perfect, light, great looking inexpensive iPad case for the original iPad Air
content: This iPad cover is light weight and very thin.  It adds almost no weight or bulk. It feels great to the touch with a non-slip velvety texture.  The auto-sleep/wake feature works great.  Why pay an enormous price for any other competing product.  If you have a 5th Generation iPad, the first Air, then this is perfect for you.

author: Alicia Wyjad
title: Three Stars
content: The camera hole doesn't line up correctly with my Ipad carmera but it works well otherwise.

author: Lydia E. Andino Demyan
title: Two Stars
content: It was the wrong size and I could not return it.

author: Tom Sisul
title: Necessary companion to Apple Air original
content: The case protects the Apple Air, holds it up when using and shuts it down when closed. I got one when I bought the Apple Air and this was a replacement of the original.

author: E Williams
title: back is not slippery like some hard cases
content: Fits very well, back is not slippery like some hard cases.  Back is not transparent but not an issue as I don't care if the Apple Logo shows.

author: Denise Vyse
title: Way better than I thought...
