content: ok, so I'll admit, I'm a huge cheap skate and after reading all the reviews decided to give this a try because Apple and $75- really? Anyway, I actually love it. I did testing for you, too! Everything locked on well and no buttons, speakers or camera were mismatched. When closed, the top fits like a glove. No lifting. When folded to stand, it did so securely and without wobbling. I don't know if I got lucky or what, but this is def one of the top 10 best deals (value for quality) that I've found in a while!

author: jld
title: If you want super thin this is your case
content: I ordered this by accident and I don't like it because it's so thin and slippery I feel like it'd be easy to drop and likely to pop out of the case if I did. Since I haven't used it or dropped it that may be an unfair assessment, but that's my feeling on the matter. I would return it, but the deduction for shipping would leave me with virtually no refund, so I'll try to find some other disposition for it. I ordered a Snugg case and it is much better for my uses.

author: David H. Jones
title: Good Case
content: Product is exactly as described.  Wake-sleep feature works well. Good protection and perfect fit for my iPad.  Would recommend product and seller.

author: K. Arr
title: Great quality
content: Very nice case for the price and comparable to the apple version. I am completely happy with the purchase.

author: Eva
title: Nice case...does the job!
content: Easy to hold, use. Works as described. Decent value for money.

author: L Pelosi
title: The case is lightweight and the color is cool. The only thing is that I have the ...
content: The case is lightweight and the color is cool.  The only thing is that I have the brand new iPad Air and the opening on the case for the camera lens and the actual lens placement on the iPad differ just slightly but it is not a complete correct alignment which is frustrating of course for photo taking.  Also, The opening for where the volume control is also a little off in that it isn't easy to access the buttons unless you pick up the tablet and look to see what you are doing.

author: lynn
title: I love this i had bought a more expensive one for ...
content: I love this i had bought a more expensive one for my old ipad paid like $30 for that and then apple changes the size on new ipads was not going to buy one but saw this thoought ill take a chance and this is as good as the more expensive one all holes fit perfect for sound buttons etc

author: Min Zhong
title: it is a pretty case, however after 2 month lightly use
content: it is a pretty case , however after 2 month lightly use, one edge was broken and I have to find another case.

author: Mom3
title: Order by number
content: The cover fits th eipad well. We are satisfied with this purchase

author: Cynthia E.
title: Great buy! Very happy overall!
content: I love this case & stand & price!  I just wish it came with the stylus shown & that was a bit of a disappointment.  I am glad, however that if something happens to it, the warranty will be honored!

author: FanLarm
title: Perfect
content: Just as described. Fits perfectly.  Ordered two.

author: gmontana
title: Exactly as described
content: Ipad cover works very well for protecting both  the screen and back and fits perfectly. Thanks!

author: Isaac Antonio Garcia Cordero
title: Really elegant but secure case
content: This case has a hard backside like hard plastic with a soft cover texture and a soft top cover that seems very delicate but elegant as well. I really loved this case.

author: Consumer
title: Great Product
content: Great product.. Great price!! Light weight case which also offers good protection..I love the bright color because I'm visually impaired & am now able to spot my iPad when I misplace it

author: Dutch Engstrom
title: Obstructed Camera
content: An Amazon search for an iPad Air 2 cover found this product.  I should have paid more attention to other reviews. While the case's overall fit is acceptable, the camera's lense portal is obstructed by about 25% and causes images to have some blurring.  Because of this, I give 2 stars.

author: Arlene Bueno De Mesquita
title: Great iPad Case
content: This case is superior in many ways to the original Apple case that I bought when I bought my IPad 3 years ago and it is less than half the price. It fits perfectly, allows me to access all the ports and is sturdier when folded so that it never topples. The only downside is that it is a bit heavier.

author: J. Spithill
title: BEST IPAD COVER AVAILABLE
content: My wife upgraded to the iPad Air and ordered this cover.  I was so impressed I ordered one for my iPad 2. This product exceeds our expectations in all respects and is an outstanding value.

author: PHCARTE
title: Five Stars
content: Just like the original I bought from Apple.  Only better construction!

author: wendy watson
title: Would now recommend to others!
content:
I wanted to share that I got a bad case that broke down within days of receiving and using. May have been a fluke. The seller resent a new one and I have been using it now for almost a month with no problems. My hat is off to this seller for making it right.

Thank you!

author: maruthi
title: Four Stars
content: For the price its okay but not strong enough to hold

author: Patti A.
title: Nice and thin"
content: Nice and thin, no weight to it at all and love the blue color.  Carries well in my purse and does what I want.

author: Littlest Finch
title: a silky soft case
content:
Wanted a super slim case that offered at least a little protection for my iPad. I'm carrying around a cute little back pack and my old case was thick cause it has a keyboard in it. Although I love that case and I'm sure I'll use it in the future, this one is far nicer for cramming my ipad into my bag and having space for the rest of my junk.

The texture is nice on it, I would 1110000% use a screen cover for you ipad with this case as it really doesn't provide much protection for your screen. I don't think it stands up as advertised, but I don't generally use my cases like that so it doesn't bother me, but just a heads up.

author: AUGUSTUS J. SIKO
title: It's a winner!!
content:
You wont be disappointed here.  What a great case for a great price.
We'll have to see how it holds up.

author: Christopher Davis
title: Great company for cases
content: I purchased one of their iphone cases and was delighted with the quality and style especially at this price. When I needed an ipad case, I immediately looked at JETech, and I was equally delighted with the case. I strongly endorse JETech for all of your case needs.

author: Prasanna M.
title: Durable case
content: It took 5 years of daily use for this case to fall apart. I ordered another exact one to replace this. Double thumbs up.

author: Larry Sierra
title: The design is very nice.
content: Bought it as a gift for someone that needed it for ipad air. Sonfar so good.

author: Dusty F.
title: Great cover!  Great Price!
content: This is a great product for the money. This fits my 16gb iPad Air perfectly.  I chose this one over the other cases because the bottom of the case does not cover the speakers on my iPad like the others do. I also like that the cover is a Smart Cover and wakes or puts the iPad to sleep when I open or close the cover. I would highly recommend this cover for anyone wanting to get some basic protection for their iPad.

author: ScottAK
title: Good low cost case
content: First off keep in mind this is a $10 case not an expensive smart case but it was exactly what I was looking for. The iPad fits perfectly and the case is very lite and thin adding very little weight and thickness to my iPad Air. The case has a Smart Cover which is great for this price point. There was a small rough spot on the edge of the bottom molded case but completely acceptable and not even noticeable when the iPad is in the case. Overall a great option for the price.

author: Amazon Customer
title: Priced right.
content: I like the iPad cover. Only dislike is did not fit properly for Camera hole view.

author: Sid's Comments
title: Can't Contact Seller
content: I tried the website and email to register the warranty (card in package) but both didn't work. So... no warranty.

author: Christine
title: Hits every mark!
content: I’m delighted with my new case. It’s light weight, sturdy, works well as a stand. It does everything Apple’s stand does at a fraction of the cost

author: Joe the plumber
title: Good product
content: I seldom write reviews but this product fully met my expectations. Don't know how long it will last but seems quite durable. Fits my iPad Air perfectly. Biggest problem in shopping was figuring out which cases fit which iPad versions.

author: Tom Laf
title: The Price!
content: The price, the quality, the price, the quick shipment, the price, the seller, the price, the color, and did I mention the price!

author: Aaron R
title: It just works
content: I didn’t have high expectations for an IPad cover, but this really worked out well. It fit perfectly on my IPad Air, it’s light weight, and the hard back cover is sort of a smooth soft plastic that feels good to carry. Very sleek and protects like it’s supposed to. I’ve had several covers for various IPads over the years but this is the best yet.

author: blkmamba
title: Like how the Unit fits into the back case for ...
content: Like how the Unit fits into the back case for Protection and the Cover in the Front to protect the Screen.

author: Marie E. Ritgert
title: Exactly what I expected
content: I ordered this iPad cover to replace the one that I had since I received the iPad as a gift 4 years ago this coming Christmas.  It fit perfectly just as advertised.  I fully expect that it will protect my iPad if/when I accidentally drop it as the previous case I had did just that and this is the exact same thing.  For the money it was and for the amount of time I believe it will last, I believe it's a bargain.

author: smb
title: Find a better option
content:
Fits iPad Air perfect but the hole to out the charger in is made too small, so
You have to take it out of the case to charge. Inconvenient, I will look for a better
Alternative

author: P. S.
title: Five Stars
content:
Great little case for my iPad.
Feels like it should have cost more than it did.

author: Joseph C. Finnell
title: The Apple store clerk actually recommended looking on Amazon for what I wanted
content: This iPad Air Case I ordered for $11 from JETech is identical to one I previously bought at the Apple store for $70 and meets all expectations.  When purchasing our latest iPad Air at the Apple store, I tried to find the same case I'd bought for the first iPad Air, but the store doesn't carry that design anymore.  The Apple store clerk actually recommended looking on Amazon for what I wanted.  Glad I did.  100% satisfied.  The only down side, the shipping charge was almost as much as the product.  Still a big win though.

author: Jay
title: Good product
content: Good product

author: Rural Dweller
title: Awesome case. Previously I had purchased an iPad Air ...
content: Previously I gave this a very high rating - really liked it when it first arrived.  I have now owned it for 4 months and it has dried out and become brittle...breaking at the corners and no longer wraps all over the top edge to provide protection because it seems that with the drying out process it shrunk.  At first I liked it better than my husbands ipad air case which he got from apple...but with time it has broken off plastic on all 4 corners and his (which he got long before I got mine) is in great shape.  Don't buy this - it doesn't last.  I'm online ordering another case right now after only 4 months!  VERY DISAPPOINTED after initially loving it.

author: Amazon Customer
title: Great value!
content:
I’ve purchased several covers for my iPad Air & none of them hold a candle to this one.  Lightweight but very durable & inexpensive (not cheap)!

Highly recommend!

author: leftworx
title: iPad cover
content: Bought 2, came quick. Great low price. Cover fits well on my iPad Air and my new iPad that I just received 4/3/17! Not the iPad Pro 9.7 but the new iPad. Compared with others for $40.

author: BB
title: Edges cracked after a week
content: The cover fits well, but after a week of use, the two thin edges at top right just cracked. My previous cover lasted 3 years. So, this one has some quality issues.

author: TRS
title: Fell Apart in Abor Three Months Time
content: I don't often do ratings (sorry sellers 😀) but I have been unhappy with this product. I got it in February of this year and it quickly began to fall apart. Two of the corners are broken out as well as the opening around the power button. I'm someone who is very careful with their electronics, I have never broken or lost a cell phone (knock on wood) in the 15 years I have had a cell phones. I don't have kids so it's not as if it is being handled by young children. I simply don't understand how this case is falling apart when it is not being dropped or handled roughly in any way. I would not recommend this product; there has to be something better out there which would last longer than 90 days.

author: Wayne Erickson
title: Five Stars
content: gift

author: NCShopper
title: Nice and sturdy
content: Nice and sturdy, was a replacement for a similar one from another source...I like that this one has a back on it also.... Lightweight and fits perfectly.

author: Poporopo
title: Good case protector.
content:
Is kind of annoying that when you flip it all the way back, it shuts off the display.  Somthing with the magnetic thing.  I have another ipad, same model, with a Belking cover and doesn't do that.

Other than that, great protector.  Good quality.

author: Brenda
title: Good case
content: It works perfectly for me & I love the color Purple. This is my 2nd case like this one.

author: Linda L.
title: Five Stars
content: The cover works great, but I didn't get the stylus as shown.

author: jerrold Ulmer
title: Good to have a more substantial feel
content: Fits my iPad as expected

author: Kindle Customer
title: Works well, does everything I need it too.
content: Case works well for basic protection from scratches and small falls. It is no otterbox, but is a great alternative for low risk usage. The front cover folds for a nice stand with a good angle.

author: Ronald R Roth
title: A good product at a good price
content: Arrived on time and is of good quality.  The fit is fine and I am pleased.

author: walt
title: looks good. Very sleek
content: Well made, looks good. Very sleek.

author: Heather
title: Five Stars
content: Protects my iPad when I drop it.

author: David Bohnsack
title: perfect cover for iPad
content: I like the simple design cover as expected,

author: chris hawkins
title: very nice
content: arrived very quickly and as described

author: The Rocket Dog
title: Get's the Job Done
content: Nice case. Fits well. Was expecting something with a bit more padding but this is just a hard plastic case. Cover folds to stand up iPad for viewing. Magnetic switch for sleep wake is just like more expensive units. Would buy again.

author: Marion Gessendorf
title: Great buy
content: Very nice, lightweight but not flimsy

author: LB in MA
title: Inexpensive, lightweight iPad Air case
content: This is an inexpensive, lightweight case with magnetic cover to trigger sleep mode when closed. It will prevent scuffs and scratches, but offers little or no protection against drops.

author: JandJSoup
title: Great protective case
content: I bought this when my last case (Photive) wore out from daily use. This one is similar in features (lightweight, hard back, corner protection, folding cover), and I hope it lasts for at least a year.  So far it is holding up well and I have no complaints.

author: Hugh Robateau
title: Great case for the money!
content: This is the second one I purchased since my wife needed a new cover and she liked mine. For the money, a very good case. Just keep in mind that this isn't meant to protect from drops and bangs but mostly for scratches, spills, etc.

author: Shannon
title: Amazing quality for the price
content: This case exceeded my expectations. It’s very high quality, very durable, easy to pop the iPad into and out of, and easy to clean. (Which comes in handy as my daughter has her iPad in it and loves to make slime while was watches how-videos on You Tube.)

author: Eric Hochreiter
title: Great replacement to my original Apple iPad case
content: Great replacement to my original Apple iPad case.  fits great and feels good in the hand.  It is more rigid than my old case, however, so I am interested in how well it will handle being dropped.  Only time will tell, but it is working our great so far.

author: GoonerYoda
title: Fits pretty well. Really hard to bend the cover to ...
content: Fits pretty well. Really hard to bend the cover to create the stand. However, it's brand new so it'll probably take awhile to break in.

author: Hug1
title: Nice IPad cover
content: This is a nice iPad cover. It puts the tablet to sleep and the cover folds to make a stand.

author: JAS
title: good product
content: okay, bought the wrong one. got this for my wife's iPad air 2. fits fine except the camera lens is offset. we never use the iPad to take pictures, so no biggie. could just enlarge it if we did. nonetheless, fit is good, it's light weight and far more protective and a better cover than the apple one.

author: PICTQ
title: if you like black, I would highly recommend it
content:
works fine everything fits appropriately.
black blends into background too easily.

author: Arlyne L. Campbell
title: Great customer service
content:
The con: pieces of my case cracked and broke off after only 4 months or so causing my ipad to slide out.
The Pro: it is covered by a lifetime warranty and the company's customer service was excellent and they quickly sent me a replacement after I contacted them.

author: Ara's Grams-Angie
title: Love it.. Love it... Love it...
content: I absolutely love this case. It turns my screen on when I open it. You still have to unlock the screen, so no worries....Awesome, love it..

author: PW
title: Sturdy and provides “all around” protection.
content: The Jetech case is a lot more sturdy then I had expected. A very pleasant surprise as it provides protection all around and not just over the glass display like my original apple cover. Arrived earlier than expected which was another nice holiday surprise.

author: GQ Dillon
title: 5 Stars
content: 5 Stars

author: Lalli
title: Do not recommend this item
content: Started breaking within the month. Do not recommend this item.

author: akm0446
title: Nice One. Stand can be better
content: Fits perfectly. But, while using as a stand if doesn't stay properly. I used to have a infinite case before. That was like a real stand. Also, if you remove the case and put if for few times, close to the power button, there is a thin line of plastic. It'll be broken. it won't make any difference in fitting, but it should stay intact. That part is very fragile. Need to handle carefully.

author: Steve 08755
title: Compact Ipad Case
content: This is a nicely designed case at a reasonable price.  The case was delivered as promised and the transaction was effortless.

author: Johanna Sanford
title: Good for he price!
content: The case is fine for the price you pay.  It definitely doesn't feel like it was made with the same quality materials as my older iPad Smart Cover, but it does its job.  One small complaint is that I wish the magnet in the cover was a little bit stronger when you flip around the back of the case.

author: AboveorBelow
title: Saved my screen!
content: For this price this is awesome. Perfect fit. Slim and let’s the iPad stand up pretty well on airplane trays. Also I dropped my iPad a few times and this protected the screen

author: Kanika
title: the feel is good and is not making my iPad thicker too
content:
I ordered this case for my iPad Air, the feel is good and is not making my iPad thicker too. I mean the difference in thickness only gives you more confidence that it is well protected.
It wakes the iPad even when the cover is slightly pulled up and the magnet helps it snap back quickly. That's nice too!

I rated it four because, I would rather have preferred leather, that's just my choice.

author: Amazon Customer
title: One side is covered but the other is not when you fold the case for reading with your arms.
content:
So when you fold it for reading and hold it with your arms, one side is covered with case but the other is not.
In other words, one side is warm and the other is cold because the bare metal of the ipad. Big no-no, I disposed of it on the first day it has arrived.

author: Brian B.
title: Fits well
content: Fits my ipad like it should. Seems like good quality. has a rubber feel to it. Also note that the front and back cover are connected-as in it is one piece.

author: Bonnie J. Boschert
title: iPad Air case
content: I recently bought this product and am completely satisfied with it. It's a hard case so as to protect your tablet. It's very easy to adjust for ease of reading or typing. The case fits smoothly around the edge of my tablet leaving openings for the power and volume control plus the speakers. I like how it feels and looks.

author: Russell wolfe
title: Five Stars
content: This the only case I have bought,several top of the line.case for IPad Air.

author: Bill B
title: Works like it is supposed to
content: Looks nice. Works like it’s supposed to

author: Lego mom
title: Perfect fit for iPad air
content: Great product.

author: Amazon Customer
title: Good product
content: Well priced and well made.

author: wtc
title: Great! No problem at all!
content: Great! Fits my iPad Air 1 great!  Was afraid of build quality but was impressed when product arrived.  Very nice.

author: Doggy
title: good price for the cover
content: It is nice to be able to find a case for 1st edtion iPad air.  The price is great and the produce looks well built.

author: Aruna
title: Do not recommend kit to anyone
content: I bought this cover for my iPad Air  17 th of July, 2015 and started using it week after that..it has been chipping off and few times iPad came loose and almost fell out ! Now it is chipped off in few places . I have stopped using it . Do not recommend kit to anyone ! What a waste of money !

author: Dng8
title: Great color and sleek look
content: Great color and sleek look. However, I dropped it once and about an inch of the bottom cracked and broke off in the back. At that time i had it for a few months. I ended up having to buy a new cover recently since it caused me to cut my finger from the back. It did protect my iPad, which is why im giving it a 4 instead of 3. My iPad was not scratched from that incident.

author: P
title: Good quality
content: Fits great and looks like a good quality product.

author: SUZY
title: For someone that wasn't sure what they were ordering this seemed like a reasonable and not overly pricey way to start
content: My iPad Air has never left my place and never had a case before, but I will need to take it on a business trip. For someone that wasn't sure what they were ordering this seemed like a reasonable and not overly pricey way to start. It is a nice gray. The feel is decent. It fits well. The magnet is strong enough. It is slim enough that it fits into a small purse. It will not be water or dust proof but I'm not going to the beach. I will know more when I get back.

author: IA
title: Its really nice but didn't last for two long
content: Its really nice but didn't last for two long. It broke from one edge after one lil drop. I love the matte finish, but it didnt really last.

author: Lakeside
title: Excellent value
content: A good cover. It works well, protects the iPad well and is easy to use and sturdy. Overall an excellent value!

author: Dre
title: this is perfect.
content: Does the job well! is a very simple case that stands one way and pops up the iPad one way and dos nothing else, but it didn't say that it would! for simple functionality and covering of your iPad, this is perfect.

author: Golden H
title: Great product
content: Better, tighter and lighter design than my previous case that was broken

author: DRM43
title: A very satisfied customer
content: I needed a simple to use ipad cover for my ipad air and I purchased this one.  It is very light and does exactly what is was designed to do which is to protect the ipad while being light to carry around.  I am very pleased with this product and it does everything I was expecting when I purchased it.  A very satisfied customer.

author: Michael
title: Excellent quality case. Terrific price.
content: Excellent case for iPad Air. Being able to set my ipad upright with this case is really handy. Definitely a plus that opening/closing the case cover locks the screen. Great case for the price.

author: Jennifer S
title: Perfect fit
content: Fits my iPad Air perfectly. At first I didn't snap it in completely and it fell out onto my lap. But once I snapped it in - all was well. Snug fit. The case cover is lightweight so if you are looking for something with a lot of protection this is not the case for you. For what I use my iPad for it is does the job. I love the 'sleep' cover.

author: Twoquick4u
title: JET IPAD CASE VERY LOW QUALITY
content:
Waste of money.  Case broke in less than 3 months from a minor drop.  Very brittle plastic case.

I had to re-order the original Ipad Air case I had which lasted for 3 years.  I never got broke even though I dropped it multiple times.  However, the cloth on the case became detached to the cover, but it was still functional.  I could have glued it, but I chose to get a new case instead.

MoKo Apple iPad Air Cover Case - Ultra Slim Lightweight Smart-shell Stand Case for Apple iPad Air / iPad 5 9.7 Inch 2013 Tablet, BLACK (With Auto Wake / Sleep, Not fit iPad Air 2)

author: Mel S.
title: Saved my iPad!
content:
This is the 2nd case I've purchased. The last one didn't survive a drop; my iPad did! So, needless to say, I went and got another one straightaway. These are a nice bit of engineering. They just work.  One weak point: there is only one stand orientation and height. If that isn't just what you need, better to look for another solution. 
Here's what I bought to help: https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B006ZT4VA0/ref=oh_aui_detailpage_o03_s00?ie=UTF8&psc=1
Paired with this case you have a truly fantastic combination.

author: Ravi K Mehta
title: Apple-Like Quality for 80% Less
content: This case is exceptional both in quality and cost. It fit my iPad perfectly and the material has a nice, high quality feel. It is very similar to Apple's iPad Smart Case which runs $50.00. I liked this case so much that I bought another one for our other iPad which was in an aging Otterbox Defender. You really can't go wrong with this case if you're looking for Apple-like quality but without Apple-like prices.

author: Metalman
title: Does the job
content: Nothing exciting to say. Please note this is not a "protecting case" this product protects from scratches not drops. Nothing really will protect from a drops. This product is best used to protect when packing the ipad away for travel, in a backpack, bag, purse or sitting on the coffee table.

author: Greg Savage
title: Wife likes it
content: Fits my wife's iPad exactly but retains the slim look and feel.

author: Gabriel Garcia
title: Two Stars
content: Fell apart after 2 months.

author: Englishj
title: Longevity
content: Replace first case which wore out.

author: Jeffrey D. West
title: good seller
content: as described, quick shipping

author: Jwong2772@gmail.com
title: Case is working great, gives protection as well as function
content: Color blue was the same as advertised. Case is working great, gives  protection as well as function. I am happy I made this purchase.

author: Adam Wang
title: Warps and cracks over time
content: I have had this cover for about half a year and it does not hold up well. I barely use my ipad since I got the cover to protect my ipad when I was using it on a trip. It's been a few months since I last picked up my ipad and I noticed the top right corner is warped and cracked (my ipad has not been dropped or hit by anything). Seems like a manufacturer/quality defect since another reviewer had the same issue.

author: Michael
title: Does not stay up when touching the screen.
content: The case provided adequate protection but would not stay standing up anytime I pressed the screen. I ended up returning it and getting Devicewear Slim iPad Air Case the Ridge with Six Position Cover Flip Stand, Magnetic, Smart On/Off.

author: Cinderella
title: Works fine
content: I was very pleasantly surprised at the quality for the price.  It’s basic so not deigned for key board etc.

author: Amazon Customer
title: It works
content: It fit a iPad. It works

author: M. Bender
title: Five Stars
content: This item fits my iPad Air great.Product protects very well.Will buy again.

author: Kenneth L. Boekhaus
title: Broke in less than a year
content: Nice compact cover for iPad Air. It was easy to install. A great value at the price, butnot durable. First one did not last a year.

author: webinar
title: not very good to hold my iPad
content: the case is not holding my iPad well.

author: Anderson Trindade
title: I can’t turn the pad around like the one I had before
content: Decent and fair for the price. I can’t turn the pad around like the one I had before, but it works.

author: Anonymous1
title: Not a bad case. Relatively durable
content: Not a bad case.  Relatively durable.  The only real problem is the fit is not quite precise.  But the magnets are strong enough to keep the case closed.  It certainly out performs the Skech case that costs 3+ times the cost of this case.

author: Brent
title: Five Stars
content: works great, good fit

author: Amazon Customer
title: It fits
content: It's a nice case fits well. However I wouldn't say it's super protective. Im still carful with my iPad and try not to drop it. It will protect screen from scratches and minor drops.

author: Gunnar Rastenburg
title: Solid
content:
At first I was struggling to get it to snap onto my iPad, but a few seconds later it clicked and works fine. I just needed something low cost and still able to give it protection. Love how it stands.

Con- you can't make it stand vertically somehow.l but that's okay

author: Sonali Gera
title: Totally satisfied.
content: This is just what I was looking for. I was a little skeptical about it because of the negative reviews but was pleasantly surprised when I received it. Though I have just had it for 2 days but I am hoping I would not be disappointed.

author: Jim Holland
title: I love it!
content:
This is my firstborn
 I-Pad, and I just love it. My wife has an older I-Pad she's had for years and love it, but she said that my new one is better and has more RAM, too. And this price was cheaper, too.

author: budfox
title: Really liked this case but the fact it can't even last ...

author: K.Gardner
title: I absolutely love this case it is very sleek but still adds ...
content: I absolutely love this case it is very sleek but still adds the protection I need for my iPad Air when it's in my tote. I definitely recommend this case! Such good value for the price.

author: Nick
title: Fits perfectly on iPad Air 1st Generation
content:
First let me say I've been using an iPad Air 1st Generation since 2013 almost on a daily basis.  When I bought it I also purchased a case for the iPad directly from Apple as well... which cost $80 at the time.  It worked, but not worth the $80 in my opinion.

Through the last 5 years of using the iPad Air the case eventually wore down to the point where I try to stand the iPad up in the case but it just slides out of the case.  Obviously this was just normal wear and tear over 5 years of using my iPad, but still not worth paying $80 to get the case from Apple in my opinion.

Review:  This iPad case over is great!  For one thing it's much cheaper than buying a case from Apple. Secondly it also locks into place on your iPad vs Apples iPad cover which also fit good on the iPad but it didn't lock into place.  When I say it locks into place you can hear all four corners snap into place, so you know your getting a very secure case and tight case.  This iPad case doesn't cover up the speakers or around the charging port at the bottom of the iPad Air where as Apple's iPad case does.  Because of this it's also easier to listen on the iPad when not using headphones and also makes it a little bit easier to plug in when you need to charge your iPad.  I should also mention that this case also has the magnetic strip for when you want to stand the case up.  One thing this case does lack is that it doesn't cover over the buttons on the iPad.  With that being said the buttons are still easily accessible even with the case on.

Pros:
1.  Cost significantly less than Apple's iPad Air cases
2.  Snaps into place for a very secure fit
3.  Doesn't cover the speakers on the bottom of the iPad
4.  Has magnetic strip to keep the case in position when standing it up

Cons:
1.  Since it snaps so securely into the iPad it could make some small marks on the corners of the iPad
2.  The case doesn't cover any of the buttons on the iPad (volume up, volume down, power button)

author: ron scales
title: slim-fit case cover
content: This is my 3rd cover, the first one the front cover started to delaminate and was replaced JE Tech for free.. the 2nd one I broke the corner. All in all I really like the cover, I like the feel of it and the positive way it closes....

author: Umbasse
title: Perfect
content: Perfect, I reccomend

author: DonB
title: Great protection!
content: This case has saved the day and my daughter’s iPad many times. Great investment.

author: Stephanie Chang
title: Perfect Fit for original iPad Air
content: Fits my iPad perfectly and snuggly. The color is great and it is well made. The only minor issue is that the back is completely smooth (not textured/silicon) so I do worry about it sliding around sometimes. Overally, worth it for the price :)

author: papa
title: Very durable and comfortable to hold
content: Really really like it

author: Chad
title: Great value
content:
This is a great, inexpensive case! The iPad fits securely in the back part of the case. When the front cover is closed, it puts the tablet in sleep mode. It awakens when opened up again. I like that the front cover folds into thirds to support the tablet in landscape mode. This stand will not hold the tablet in portrait mode, but I have a separate folding stand for that, so it isn't a problem. This case looks and functions just like some much more expensive cases. I am pleased with it!

Update! I was pleased with this case for about 6-8 months. Then it began breaking off and cracking...first one corner, then another. I am not really sure what caused the breaks, as I am the only user and don't recall dropping my iPad or any other rough stuff. When the bottom corners chipped off, it was difficult to keep the device in the cover. Eventually all 4 corners were broken off and cracking. Time for a replacement. I just received the Zover-Ultra-Lightweight-Smart-shell iPad Air Case from Amazon today. Instead of a hard plastic (and breakable) shell, this one is more like hard rubber. I am hoping it will hold up longer. The JETech cover was very reasonably priced, so I don't feel as if I'm out a lot of money. It worked fine for several months.

author: Xavier F. Lopez
title: I love this case
content: I love this case. It was cheaper and is nice that the one I purchased from apple. I stopped using my apple case for a  few months and it was stretched out and my ipad would slip out of the case.

author: Nancy Carter
title: It’s Safe, but...
content:
Its very difficult remove the ipad from the Smart Cover. To remove the ipad i have to pry it out using two puddly knives. One of the knives serves as a foundation so as not to dig into the cover material while prying the ipad out with the other knife.

On the positive side the ipad will not slip out from the cover falling on the floor as i have experienced with other covers.

author: Pheebers
title: Wouldn't buy again.
content:
I bought this case to replace a similar Fintie case which broke after a year of hard use.  I've been using this one for about a month now, and here are my impressions:

It's thinner and lighter.  To me this is a neutral thing.  Thinner and lighter is great when you're carrying it around, but it also contributes to the case looking cheap and plastic-y.  To be completely fair, it's a very inexpensive case, so I don't expect it to look like the leather Apple cases at 5 times the price.

The fit isn't quite as good as the Fintie.  There's a bit of flex/wiggle on the corners when I'm using the case.  It's a bit annoying at times.  The cutouts are all perfect.

My reason for 2 stars, however, is the sleep/wake cover feature.  It doesn't work reliably.  When I first got the case, I would flip the case closed on many nights, only to wake up to a dead iPad because it didn't turn off.  This never happened with the Fintie.  Now I don't use that feature anymore, and I miss it.

author: Xay Vang

content:

Update: after about a month of light usage, the cover is separating. this doesn't affect the product in any way or form but for the price, it still works.

author: Matt M
title: The plastic case cracked after only a few months and ...
content: The plastic case cracked after only a few months and would no longer stay snapped onto my iPad Air. I only use my iPad a couple times per week.  No children use it, it's never been dropped, it doesn't travel with me, it primarily just sits on the coffee table. So, the cracking wasn't do to wear and tear.  The plastic case flexes around the iPad and snaps on. I'm guessing that the pressure that the iPad puts on the plastic was enough to cause it to crack and fall apart over time. Spend a few dollars more to get a higher quality case instead of replacing this one.

author: M. Johnson
title: Don't bother!

My iPad doesn't leave the house, and it's not roughed up in anyway.. so for the price.. it's ok but I wouldn't buy again. and certainly not rugged enough for kids.

author: B. Wehl

content: The case was purchased for the color more than anything else.  Once received, it is well made and is offering good protection at a budget price.

author: Customer
title: iPad case review
content: Case is a good value over all. Cover magnets aren't as strong as I'd like. They barely hold the cover closed. I expect they may get weaker over time. The case fits my iPad good and is comfortable to hold.  Everything considered, it deserves a 4 star rating.

author: Amazon Customer
title: Great for basic everyday usage and protection.
content:
If you want something that will protect your iPad from basic scratches, bumps and dents from everyday use, then this is the product for you. When I opened it initially the packaging looked cheap and I thought I had been ripped off, but when I put it the case on (I have an iPad air) I noticed that it was a perfect fit, not too tight, but not too loose either. The openings are very neat and symmetric, and they were in all the right places. Once the case is on the iPad, it definitely does not look like a ten dollar product. The auto lock-unlock feature also works perfectly. You can also use the case as a stand (see picture attached, forgive my camera quality though) which is the main reason I bought the case.

I would recommend using this product alongside a tempered glass cover just to be safe. This is not a super armor for your iPad, and I would most certainly not test this product with drop tests, but it is exactly what is advertised, a Slim-Fit Smart Case, great value for money.

author: filme`
title: Good purchase
content: Just what I needed. Very good

author: MartyB
title: Perfect for wife's iPad Air

She had another one (black) on her old iPad 2 that was in a accident that totaled the vehicle but it came through with out any damage. I would and have recommended this product to a good friend.

author: Wazoo
title: Fits perfect
content: My second one👍🏼

author: Leonard
title: Just as described and better
content: This case is everything it is described to be, and more. I was concerned about the case's feel, but I was happy to see that both the back and front offer a positive grip with its matte, smooth surface. No slippery, glossy finish here! And the interior has the feel of a microfiber flannel protecting the iPad's glass from scratches. The iPad snaps snugly into the case with no effort, keeping its cutouts precisely conformed to the device's camera, buttons, microphone, speaker, etc. All of this with hardly any bulk added to the slim device. You can trust what you see in Amazon's pictures. In fact, the case closed with the iPad in it is just as thick as my stylus alone. See my picture. My package arrived with the free shipping schedule in less than 48 hours, and who can beat that great price! Kudos to JETech and Amazon.

author: pmagunia
title: I am satisfied with my purchase
content: So far so good. In the beginning the magnet seemed kind of weak but everything seems to be sticking now. Works as advertised. A great little stand for the coffee shop. I don’t think it would hold up if I dropped it but I’m usually good about that. I bought it mainly to protect the case when I am going to place the tablet on a metal surface and for that it will do nicely.

author: Mr. T.
title: Case shattered the after a few weeks when it fell ...
content: Case shattered the after a few weeks when it fell to the ground for the first time. Did not protect the iPad whatsoever and there is now a large dent in the corner of the device.

author: picky buyer
title: Cracked but ok quality triggers auto off functions.
content: This case had a crack in when it arrived. The crack didn't seem to impact the case too much so I tried to use it anyway. Now the case is causing the iPad to repeatedly turn on and off when the case is in open and in use. I guess it triggers the auto off sensor that's triggered when you close the flap. It's annoying so this will have to be returned.

author: J.P.
title: Great product. IPad fits snug
content: Great product. IPad fits snug. It does take a bit of doing to get the IPad in the cover, but I am extremely pleased with it. I will mention that I am elderly, so as not to take away from the product's ability to perform, in reference to my comment about the product being a bit of a challenge to get the IPad in the case. I assume some youngster would have no problem with it. Buy the product, you will not regret it, and I like its ability to be upright by use of the flap/cover. Thanks, Jim

author: James U
title: Meh, weak magnet keeps it from greatness...
content: It's very slim and feels nice, but the magnet is too weak. It doesn't stay closed or stand-up very reliably.

author: D. Reynolds
title: Great item
content: This is just what I was looking for. I have been using it for about three weeks and am totally glad I ordered this one.  Shipped fast and in great condition. I would purchase another one if I needed to.

author: amanda
title: Great case!
content: Great buy. I've been using mine for months without any problems and I love $10 over the price of the Apple cases. The red is a little off from the real Apple cases but the function is the same.

author: Julio
title: Four Stars
content: it does the job I need it to do

author: James Martinez
title: Durability needs improvement
content: This was used strictly indoors by my wife. After several months, the edges have started to fray and there is material separation along the edges. It is stable when used as a stand and the fit is perfect for the iPad Air.

author: M.Reviewed
title: Very nice.
content: This case is very nice and has lasted a long time.  Great purchase.

author: TeamPalo
title: We did like it while it lasted
content: This case didn't last long.  The corners chipped/broke and it no longer would stay on.  It was dropped a couple of times and the ipad came out undamaged, so I guess it did its job.  We did like it while it lasted.

author: Jon kieffer
title: Stealthy
content: Black is not super visible on dark surfaces, but looks cool.

author: Bogie
title: Fits like a glove
content: This case fit my iPad Air like a glove straight out of the package with all the functions of the iPad working perfectly. The case is extremely well designed, engineered and manufactured, with all seams perfectly sealed and the joints similarly aligned. This case will last a long, long time!

author: C. Joy
title: Great Cover
content: Looks good and easy to clean. Just what we were looking for.

author: J. Harris
title: My wife loved her Mothers day present.
content: Delivered on time.  Items were exactly as described.

author: John Calandro
title: Functional but weak
content: Functional but breaks easily. Is it worth the money? Yes, but how long does it last? Not very long in my case.

author: Adam Lavi
title: Would buy again
content: Very solid case. I carefully read through the reviews for all of the most popular cases and decided on this one and I am quite satisfied. I am unsure of the quality of rivals but I am happy with this one. The screen does not wake/sleep when the cover is on/taken off. This may be due to the fact that I have a screen protector on, (not a glass one either) but its worth noting. Its not a huge deal for me, but overall great case.

author: pj sweeney
title: 4th one
content: This case always does the job and is nice and slim

author: Mat
title: Nice case for a good price
content:
Good little case, bought these for the kids ipads when they are doing their ABC mouse.
The work well, they protect the ipad and seem sturdy enough.
the magnet to shut off the screen is nice and the stand feature work well.
Not much more to say

author: Nanci V.
title: Great iPad protector
content: I have been looking for a good and affordable iPad case. It fit my iPad Air 1 perfectly!

author: Stephen
title: looks like the original cover I bought with my iPad
content: This case cover does the trick at a fraction of the price.  It fits perfectly, looks like the original cover I bought with my iPad, but this one fits all around and won't fall off.  It folds like my original so I can use it as a stand.  It weighs a bit more, but that's to be expected because of its two sides.

author: DValve
title: Much better than expected for the price
content: Much better than expected for the price. It fairly resembles the Apple branded smart cover, but includes a rear shell -- at a fraction of the price of the Apple product. A great buy!

author: Careful Buyer
title: Excellent IPAD Air Case excellent fit w/correct cutouts
content:
The Ipad Air Case by JetTech is an excellent fit for my daughter Ipad.  I was initially concerned it would not fit nor the button, power cord etc., were
not accessable to the Ipad due to wrong cut outs etc., .  The one that came with the Ipad (gift from her sister) did not have any accessablity to the power button; volume, powercord etc.,.  Glad I purchased this case!  All the portals are cut at the correct places, all buttons are accessable without hinderance. Great fit and I immediately threw out one that we had.  Very reasonably priced, good quality, excellent fit and esp recommend for purchase.

author: elmatt
title: Five Stars
content: Great case and waaaay cheaper than the apple version.

author: Michael R.
title: Nice case
content: Needed a case for an older iPad Air, and had tried a couple that didn't fit before I found this one.  Fit's perfectly, Great case and great value.

author: FAN OF GOOD MUSIC
title: Looks good but just lays there
content: While the case looks good and feels great, it offers no real protection. The strength of the magnets are great and stays put when the case is closed and held upside down as well as when the cover is folded back and picked up. So there's no worry of the cover giving out while I'm typing or watching something, nor when it's in my bookbag. However, once the ipad air is in the case, it looks like it is sitting on top of the case. The back of the case barely covers the corners; it actually looks like it is clinging to the side of the ipad instead of coming up and holding it at the corners. If I wasn't concerned about making sure the corners weren't dented if the ipad fell, then it would be a great case. But I can't take it outside of my house without feeling insecure. There is no strange smell when I took it out of the packaging either.

author: T.S.Wood
title: Doesn't add bulk or much weight and has a nice integrated feel on the iPAD, but there is a slight design flaw....
content: I like the feel of the cover materials (rubbery and non slip) and how it felt once installed on the iPAD air.  The flip cover doesn't move around when closed so it feels tight and solid.  The magnets are also strong and hold tight when the cover is flipped around to the back.  There is a design problem to be aware of however.  There is a VERY THIN edge that results from the cutout  at the on/off switch which snapped during installation - IMO it's not able to handle the stress when the corner tab of the case snaps over the corner of the iPAD.  I imagine if I had installed this corner first it would have been okay (and leave as the last when removing the cover)  These cases are inexpensive and I don't expect them to last forever so I doubt I'll bother to return it, and will probably just use it as is.  I don't think anything is really compromised.  I

author: Denise
title: Well-made and durable
content: This is my second time purchasing this iPad case. My 1st one lasted 4 years. This is a well-made case; it supports the device it whatever position it is used. I definitely recommend this.

author: Rachel B.
title: Sleeps from the backside while ipad is in use.
content: It gets one star because it fit my ipad air. . . The sleep option on this case was a joke.  If I covered the screen to make it go to sleep, it didn't stay very well nor make the screen sleep, but if I flipped it around while trying to use it/hold it, it always made my ipad sleep from the back, while in use, constantly hanging up on my face time conversations or locking my kids out while they were trying to play a game.  Super annoying. I endured it for 4 months becsuse I'm cheap, but when my 2 year old daughter dropped it this morning  (less than 2ft drop) and the corner broke off the cover I was elated to chuck it and get a new one. Thankfully I checked my past orders so I didn't make the same mistake in buying the same bad case.

author: Jonathan smith
title: Two Stars
content: Nice but broke easy

author: Eric Gurvis
title: After searching high and low in Best Buy, Staples and elsewhere I am amazed that ...
content: After searching high and low in Best Buy, Staples and elsewhere I am amazed that this simple yet incredibly solid cover is what I needed.  For considerably less money than the ones with all the bells and whistles, this cover is  great replacement for m y former cover that was fraying.

author: James
title: Fits well for my iPad.
content: This particular case was recommended for the particular iPad I was looking for, and fits perfectly. It covers both sides, and allows you to flip the cover and bend it to where you can have the iPad stand, which will do benefits for me.

author: Duhrel
title: For the price, it's an okay product
content:
The cutouts need more refinement. The bottom cutout for the lightning connector and speakers could be more straight and the camera cutout more round. A simple deburring could probably correct for that.

My biggest complaint would be the headphone jack cutout. It appears to have arrived partially chipped off. I could understand how other reviewers have complained about the case chipping and/or cracking. The rear plastic back feels a little brittle.

2015.03.23 UPDATE
After two weeks of use, I noticed the cut out around the power button has already broken off. I think if this case were dropped, it'd easily crack and the iPad would pop out. I've downgraded my review to two stars. Nice case, but don't expect a lot of protection.

2015.04.02 UPDATE
I found that the cutout around the top rear microphone is cracked. It doesn't appear to affect the performance of the case but it does concern me that the case appears to be breaking down at an alarmingly fast rate despite light usage.

author: K_HOLD
title: The CaseCrown I've had for several years now feels like it has a little more protection and easier to ...
content: Just received this and the color is as shown and it is "thin" and for some reason feels harder to hang on to.  The CaseCrown I've had for several years now feels like it has a little more protection and easier to hold onto. Returning it is not worth it after paying a return ship of $8.00+. Ordered another Case Crown.

author: Patrick Crowley
title: Correct size
content:
I just received cover and it’s perfect.
I wouldn’t have a problem ordering from you again.
Thank you.

author: tmarti08
title: Much better than Apple for 1/2 price
content:
This feels and functions so much nicer than the real Apple ones. I will for sure buy in the future.

I have now had it well over a year and it looks new.

author: FK
title: Broke after only two short years...
content: I bought this two years ago and it has been my absolute favorite case! It did start to crack and break apart after only 24 months of constant day-to-day use. I used it as a stand regularly to watch videos; used the typing format when it's sitting on my lap. I've taken it camping, to work, in the car, and in my home. Opening/closing the flap did a superb job turning on and off the screen. After two short years, it did start to crack without being dropped and eventually would not hold the iPad anymore. However, I would not take it breaking after two years of use as a negative. Definitely RECOMMEND!

author: Aficio2000
title: Fits perfect!
content: Arrived as described - love it!

author: P. D. Wiliam
title: Excellent product
content: Excellent product. Fits my iPad much better than the original cover I bought from Apple (and the Apple case cost four times as much). Highly recommended.

author: Bee
title: Fits 1st edition Apple air pad.
content: I love my new purple cover! Fits snuggly, looks pretty and it’s easy to find wherever I lay it down. Also easy to wipe off.

author: Matt
title: Nice & Simple
content: Solid product. Came quicker than expected. Slim fit and doesn't add much bulk to existing ipad air. Magnetic cover could be a little stronger but works perfectly well.

author: Della Fowler
title: My favorite color and a very nice case
content: My favorite color and a very nice case. The case is thin and stays propped up nicely. When I first opened it I didn't think it would prop up but it is fine. I would buy again.

author: Diane
title: Good cover
content: Nice cover, durable but a little slippery for my fingers.  It is nice cooking and the screen is protected.

author: Anat
title: Second best, but good enough
content:
I like it because it serves its purpose, but it is bulkier and thicker than the Apple one I had for my old iPad.  I preferred the Apple one, but they either don't sell them anymore or are out of stock, I don't know.
I haven't had it for long enough to know how long it will last, but so far so good.
So - long story short - it is second best, but definitely good enough.

author: SmashesGashes
title: looks and functions great. However after only 5-6 weeks of very light ...
content: The case feels, looks and functions great. However after only 5-6 weeks of very light use the top right corner has just fallen off. The iPad it is being used with stays in the same room every day and is used while sitting on a couch about 6 hours a week while watching tv so I don’t know why even a cheap case would be disintegrating at this rate, possibly a fluke.

author: D. Barnes
title: Great for price
content: Great for price.  Doesn't work very well if you want to roll it up to lean on a table etc.

author: Kate
title: Breaks easily
content: Fits nicely but VERY frail. I've only had this on my iPad for a little while now and pieces have began chipping off. Looks nice but only buy this if your device stays in the same place and you are very careful!

author: frozennipple
title: Five Stars
content: Slim, slick and effective.  I have no problems with this case.  I hope it holds up for a while

author: Tricia
title: Five Stars
content: Perfect!

author: customer
title: Flimsy
content: I bought this case to protect my iPad2. I was attracted to the color, which I did like when I received the order. But from the beginning, this product was too flimsy in my opinion. My iPad kept tipping over when I was trying to have it stand up horizontally while in the case. I wouldn't order this product again.

author: Harvey G. Payne
title: Avoid Avoid Avoid
content: Piece of crap right out of the box --- already had cracked corners and the plastic was not molded correctly on the other corner. Only buy if you're really really stupid, apparently, like me.

author: Michael H.
title: Terrific Product
content: This is an amazing product for the iPad. I was always very skeptical about if the iPad could be used effectively to type notes or something without a Bluetooth keyboard, but using this case in its “typing position” has made me a believer. And for the low price of this case, you can’t get much better. 10/10 would recommend!!!

author: Justleeway
title: Not worth the buy, read the comments and do your research
content:
This device is a one clip-on and stay product. Don't think about taking it off afterwards, or it will break on the edges where it holds the case secure.

Had to toss this shortly after the buy because the back of the case started to cut me and my wife. We have children that were using it to and they also got cut by the rough edges. Not good.

author: L Wylie
title: Quality product at an amazing price!!!
content:
Finally...a quality case for my new iPad 5th generation at an amazing pr ice!!!
I had purchased others with shabby manufacturing and tho advertised the size correctly they did not fit.
The dark grey color is rich and I love the wake/sleep feature while the case protects the back.
Definitely recommend.

author: Denise M.
title: Very good cover!
content: Love this basic cover. Not bulky . Love the red color! It satisfies my needs for an iPad cover.

author: grandma judy
title: Lightweight, easy to use.
content: This is a lightweight and attractive cover for the iPad Air, perfect for travel.  Easy to clean.

author: PWCDFW
title: Great slim iPad hard back cover
content: Fits perfectly and does not add bulk to iPad. Auto off when cover closed.

author: Doctor Right.
title: Great buy!
content:
Perfect case for protection, lightweight, and functionality. I've had the case for about a month now with daily use of my iPad on and between commutes. Does exactly what is says - protects while maintaining functionality.

The only thing I'd wish they'd improve on this case is to increase the rigidity of the front cover, so the iPad can stand up on itself better - otherwise, a must buy for the price.

author: Jim H
title: Front and back case for iPod air
content: Case arrived quickly, it’ easy to attach, reasonable priced, and protects the iPad well.  It wipes clean and has no signs of wear yet.  The only negative I can think is that it adds a noticeable amount of weight to the iPad, but well worth the advantages.

author: LJ
title: Great case
content: The product arrived as promised. Fit exactly as described and it has a lifetime warranty.

author: Michael Halgren
title: Perfect
content: Perfect

author: C. Kow
title: Seemed good but Zero Durability
content: When I first got this case I was impressed with how nice it seemed. The cover that goes over the screen it sturdy and does its job well. I purchased this is in December of 2014, and with very minimal use of the case and my iPad (mostly light use on the couch at home) it already needs to be replaced. Every corner of the plastic that holds the iPad has broken off slowly, no longer holding the device in.

author: Wendy & Larry
title: It is more that sufficient to do the job and great color choices
content: Both my husband and I use this same kind of case. It is more that sufficient to do the job and great color choices.

author: ColoradoBahamas
title: Great customer service. 2 case is perfect!
content: OK. Everything fits fine but lid (cover) does not snap closed. The 3rd hinge panel stays open slightly - so the pad does not sleep. Company contacted me and sent replacement free of charge. Fits perfectly - closes properly. Excellent customer service.

author: R. P. Perkins
title: Nice case
content: Perfect case for my iPad Air. Fits very well and good quality.

author: Carol S.
title: We love our iPad cover
content: We love our iPad cover! It's very slim and has an automatic shut off when you close the cover. Also the price is great for the quality.

author: J & G Bradshaw
title: Fits device well
content: Love it. Fits tightly over speakers and access ports.

author: Daniel W
title: useless
content: With one drop, the screen cracked ... does not protect the iPad at all.. Useless.

author: Banks R. Zellner
title: Works great!
content: Very happy with this case.  I would buy it again.

author: Manuel
title: Excellent
content: Excellent

author: Quilting Mom
title: Good case
content: Bought this for husband and he loves it.  Has a good feel to it and soft inside to protect the screen.

author: MM
title: Five Stars
content: Works just fine!

author: Chris Stromberger
title: Cheap and Works!
content: Works as advertised. Fast ship, great price. I haven't used the official Apple one so can't compare, but fit on this is fine and magnetic doohickey works. Hard to beat for the price.

author: Izi
title: Fell apart after just 5 months
content: Bought the case 5 months ago and the plastic is crumbling and breaking, especially the corners. The back is no longer staying put because of the edges being broken.

author: SunLover
title: Not durable
content: This would be fine for the price but the plastic around the volume buttons is very narrow and it cracked all the way through after only 10 days or so.

author: archiman
title: Look good. falls apart. No protection.
content: corners broke within a week. hardly any protection anyway. looks nice for 7 days.

author: Ephraim Manasseh
title: Fits perfect
content: Protects my ipad. Very durable

author: Claire
title: The case is perfect. Just what I was looking for
content: The case is perfect. Just what I was looking for. I like the feel of it, too. The back is rubberized. Makes it easier to hold on to and helps when positioning it. Great case!

author: Bub61
title: hen my wife received her new iPad Air it was a no brainier to purchase this same case very well made easy to install
content: After buying one JETech air case for iPad, hen my wife received her new iPad Air it was a no brainier to purchase this same case very well made easy to install, opening for controls in the exact locations. Thank you JETech.

author: KY born
title: I loved it until it so many edges had cracked and ...
content: I loved it until it so many edges had cracked and broken off that after only 4 months I had to replace it. It is very slim, sleek and classy but I expected more than 4 months of wear. I am careful with my things. The ipad has never been dropped. I would have been thrilled with it had it not started cracking and breaking on the edges!

author: Emmy
title: We have the IPad Air maybe two three years. ...
content: We have the IPad Air maybe two three years. With the last case we never had the screen broken. With this one, just few months, the IPad screen broke twice already!!!!! It doesn’t protect the screen at all. I don’t understand how could this be a Amazon’s choice and high reviews. (This was why I bought it, so wrong!)

author: Heidi
title: Ok for the price
content: It’s okay for what is intended for but, i just thought that the quality would be better. Its a little thin for my liking, i just think the thiker the more protection the ipad will have

author: Peggy
title: and it's pretty to boot
content: I wanted a case to protect my iPad, but that didn't add too  much weight.  This case just snaps on and was exactly what I wanted. It's keeps my iPad slim, turns it off as soon as I close it conserving the battery and provides all the protection I needed.  It arrived exactly on time, and it's pretty to boot!

author: Anthony Washington
title: Simple and Sleek Protection
content: Just what I was looking for. A simple and sleek solution that protects my iPad without the bulk.

author: Cindy Gelinas
title: Great value!
content: Obviously not as durable as original case, but great value and seems to protect well.  Love the colour!

author: Joel Kirkwood
title: Just the basics...
content:
This is a basic case that wraps tight around the iPad.  The material is easy to keep clean from kids dirty fingerprints.

The only downside of this case is that when the cover is flat against the back of the case the magnets cause the iPad to go to sleep.  Not fun when trying to watch a video or play a game.

Still worth the purchase for what I use it for though.

author: Jason P.
title: Great product!
content: Fits perfectly and easy to open and close with one hand.

author: Dick Whittington
title: Okay, but could be better
content: Bottom fits well and top covers will but connection between the two is too loose to permit useful stand up whether short or tall.

author: Novlette golden
title: How it keeps my tablet safe
content: I like how easy it is to close my tablet and effective it is

author: ReneKan
title: Excellent case - fits perfectly!
content: I've only had my case for a couple of weeks now but I really like it!  Nice textured feel, looks sharp, and I believe it will be quite durable.  Installation was a snap!

author: Hozay
title: Great case for the money
content: Light, thin, handsome, and most affordable.

author: J Taylor
title: Love it
content: Lightweight but tough, works great!

author: J. Livingstone
title: Great price; great alternative!
content: Love it! The purple is such a fun Color. It fits snugly and all the holes for the ports are properly placed. I have had an original Apple Smart case on my IPad for several years. For the price this one is an great alternative. I may order another in a different color so I can switch things up. Very satisfied so far.

author: JTZgirl
title: Nice cover but slightly too small
content: Overall, I like this cover. I like the color and construction for this price point, but there is one issue that cannot be overlooked - it is slightly too small to fit completely around the back side of the iPad Air. No matter how I've wiggled it in, it simply does not fit! Bummer!

author: ARanaday
title: Great case! Affordable price!
content: This is the third case I have bought for my Ipad and I can honestly say this is the closest I have gotten to a real apple smart case as one can get. The case fits very snug around the ipad and does a good job or protecting it while looking stylish. The magnetic strip on the cover is strong and keeps the lid closed in comparison to some others out there which are made from cheaper material. The overall feel of the case is very nice and it is definitely a quality product. It is hard at times to stand the ipad up on its size but all smart cases such as this which I have owned have had similar problems so nothing to worry about. Very happy with the product and would definitely recommend.

author: Ruby
title: ... than I thought but the case itself is a nice quality, fits my Ipad Air well - and ...
content: The gray color is more muted than I thought but the case itself is a nice quality, fits my Ipad Air well - and arrived exactly as expected!

author: Kindle Customer
title: Priced right
content: The cover is thin but sturdy. The price is great for a nice looking cover.

author: Review Guru
title: iPad Case has a nice slick and yet soft rubber feel
content: I love the way the iPad case feel (the back part).  The only one issue I have is that the left side of the iPad is not completely covered due to the design of the front cover so that the cover can close. If I drop the iPad on the left side onto a corner or something sharp the iPad could get damaged because it’s not fully protected.  I love the magnetic closing feature and the feel of the back side The back cover does absorb oily fingers and you can see smudges but it’s not too bad.  Most iPad cases don’t cover every corner and this one does so that’s why I chose this one

author: Glenn R.
title: As expected
content: I had one of these before - it lasted about two years and I believe that's pretty good for an iPad cover that is easy to  use, easy to install, and not super heavy or anything.  If I have to buy another one in two more years I'll be perfectly fine with that.  I may buy a backup one now just in case they stop making ones to fit my model iPad....

author: Richard Hall
title: Five Stars
content: Very good case, item is exactly as advertised and priced right.

author: Michael Caradonna
title: Works exactly as needed.
content: Thank you!

author: Annie
title: Very breakable
content: The plastic back breaks easily. This is my third or fourth one in 3 years. But I like the suave-like cover and the slim profile.

author: Tech2
title: Highly Recommend
content: I am very pleased with this cover. I would highly recommend it for the iPad Air. Additionally JETech stands behind their 100% satisfaction guarentee. They immediately contacted me to see if I were happy with the cover and replaced it within 2 days when I indicated a flaw.

author: Zack
content: surprisingly very good

author: Robert
title: Five Stars
content: Great value.  Good quality!

author: A Knits
title: Great Cover for my I Pad Air!
content: I ordered this cover and it is just like the well known brand other than the fact it doesn't have the magnetic siding.  Great delivery time and a great product.  Love iit.  Fits my iPad Air perfectly and I ordered the purple.  Nice dark color.

author: T. L. Hiatt
title: Five Stars
content: Excellent quality and fit.

author: Carol
title: easy to manage when reading
content: Thin, easy to manage when reading.  I don't use the stand, so can't comment on that.  Sturdy enough that I feel comfortable the IPad Air is properly protected.  Fit is good.  I would definitely recommend it.  The item was sent promptly, and I have been very satisfied with the purchase.

author: michelle yoder
title: great product!
content: Fits my iPad Air perfectly. Works great! It even shuts the tablet off when the case is closed. I recommend this product  The edges did chip a little after light use. Not sure how that happened because I never dropped it. The Smart Cover works well in it and takes photos easily.

author: R3D2 family
title: Great case, doesn't last long.
content: i really liked this case at first, but after using it for several months, the edges of the case have cracked and broken off to a point it barely stays on the iPad. I've never, repeat, never, dropped my iPad, and it only ever goes in a padded slot in my book bag or on my desk. It started at the corners a few weeks after i got it, but gradually got worse until it is in the state it's in now.

author: Leanbrit
title: Decent for the price
content: The case fits nicely on my iPad. But the front cover is rather flimsy and doesn't feel like it'll last the two years of my prior cover. Sill, it is a decent deal at the price if you've limited expectations.

author: Amilcar Estrella
title: Good quality product!
content: Product as described with fast shipping and delivery!  Good quality product.

author: Gconsumer
title: Good protection at a reasonable price.
content: Fits as advertised, good value, protects device

author: SLN
title: Cheap Imitation
content: Had to return shortly after purchasing for the case broke. It split near one of the port openings. Great color but poorly manufactured.

author: Andrew D. Sanders
title: Great value... Would recommend
content: Fits perfectly and is high quality.  Has plenty of room to accommodate a non-standard charging cable and earpiece.

author: marcia tannenbaum
title: Five Stars
content: Love it

author: Laura In SDCA
title: Exactly what I wanted!
content: i wanted to protect my new IPad Air and wasn't satisfied with the covers I was finding in my local stores; Apple wants WAY too much $$ for their covers. When I found this cover on Amazon I thought I would give it a try. I wasn't disappointed! Slim and sleek, my new cover is exactly what I wanted. The cover adds very little weight and profile. It's not slippery and is easy on the hands...has a sort of velvety feel. The auto sleep/wake feature is cool. My covers, (I bought a spare) were delivered promptly and came undamaged is great packaging. I'm entirely satisfied with my purchase.

author: Em
title: iPad would not stay kept falling out of it because the corners broke easily.
content: Very flimsy, broke in 2 days, iPad would not stay kept falling out of it because the corners broke easily.

author: Richard G. Ulsh
title: Good fit, good price
content: Fits my IPAD retina perfectly, good price, quick shipping

author: Corina Reyes
title: Easy to use case for iPad
content: Easy to use case for iPad. It does not have the automatic shut off feature that my Moki case had, and its not as stable when you have it propped for viewing, but overall its a good case for a good price.

author: D. Phillips
title: Economical functional iPad cover
content: I love this product.  It looks nice, very functional and does not cost an arm and a leg.  Mine take a lot of beating on the road but does the job of protecting my iPad.  Mine usually has to be replaced after 18 months because the corners will chip off thereby not allowing the iPad to lock into plastic backing.  This does not stop me from buying another replacement because I love them.

author: Zee G.
title: Great choice for iPad Air protection
content: Sturdy, attractive, and fits my iPad Air perfectly.

author: Amazon Customer
title: It's really good. I needed to give it 4 stars because ...
content: This is my second time ordering this case. First red, now purple. The colors are true to what you see online. They're truly slim and yes it does lock your screen when you close the cover. It's really good. I needed to give it 4 stars because the first case that I ordered, in three-four months... The skin began to rip from the corners. But overall this is worth buying!

author: Ben Merrill
title: Cost and durable!
content: Works great and didn’t break the bank !

author: BC
title: but for the price can easily endorse this product as a worthy purchase
content: Only had it for a week,  but for the price can easily endorse this product as a worthy purchase.  The iPad fit snugly and securely. The cover fits well over the screen and functions just as good as the much more expensive Apple iPad Smart cover.

author: Veer
title: Bought 2nd one
content: Great cover, bought 2nd one to replace the 1st one, 2 corners broke after few iPad drops.  Light weight and protects iPad well.

author: Howard Bergstrom
title: Case sacrificed itself
content: I just bought my second case of this type.  I've always like the way it fit in my had and it's appearance.  But I recently dropped my iPad onto a hardwood floor.  I'm pretty sure it landed on a corner, but the iPad is fine.  The case broke.  That's a tradeoff I'd take any day!

author: McBailey
title: Don't love it but I like it
content: Definitely as described. The back plastic piece is pretty thin so I don't think it offers the greatest protection from a fall, but  otherwise it seems well assembled. This is a great price for a cover if you're a very careful, coordinated person!

author: CKH
title: Sturdy; cover closes tight
content: The customer service was polite, informative ( great).  Without it I would not have kept the item.  I had to correct my Apple settings which I believe were "changed" when I upgraded my apple.  I would've never known about this w/o customer service alerting me. Thank you!

author: briggsza1
title: High quality case!
content:
Great case for a great price in a beautiful shade of pink.  I gave this as a present to my mother for Christmas (along with the
IPad Air that goes in it) and she loves it.  It fits securely without any gaps and it folds over so that you can use it as a tablet stand also. I ordered this about a week before Christmas and it arrived in plenty of time for the holiday, even earlier then promised.

author: Stephani Brown
title: Five Stars
content: Fits

author: Amazon Customer
title: I love it. This is my third one
content: I love it.  This is my third one.

author: Rene
title: Five Stars
content: Good quality an fit as spected

author: sinbad_111
title: Looks good and easy to use
content: Didn't discolor yet after 6 months of use!

author: Dolonchapa Chakraborty
title: Got it yesterday- So far, Okay!
content:
I got this yesterday. I was a little skeptical from the reviews about their iPads not fitting properly. I used a little force and heard a click. Then I had to use a lot of energy to take it out. So I'm feeling good about the fit.
What I am concerned about is the back resting thing. So basically the front cover folds up and makes the screen stand up. It's barely an angle and I'm very scared as to when it fall face down. Let's hope it doesn't break my iPad.
Also the finish isn't amazing. But I guess its a decent material for $10.

author: victoryah
title: ipad cover
content: very much like the one we got from apple store (which stretched out of shape and wouldn't hold ipad securely). this one seems like a better material.

author: Alicia M. Rojas
title: Excellent product
content: Happily suprised with quality and how well fits my iPad  Great price!

author: Jscottgp2011
title: Great case!
content: I love this case. iPad fits snug and cool design and the auto unlock when you open it (unless there's a notification) is awesome, esp when it doesn't do it if you have a notification so you don't miss anything. Perfect case for me.

author: griselda b.
content: Am ver happy with the case just don't understand the sleep/wake feature , not very computer savy

author: M. Eisenpresser
title: Ipad case is perfect
content: I purchased a new case for my Ipad Air (first edition) to replace my old one, which was worn. This case fits perfectly and has a nice "feel" to it as well. I'm very happy with the product.

author: SHIPUNOV VASILY ALEKSEEVICH
title: Great Light case
content: Pretty awesome. Very light, easy to put in and out. Yet hold iPad securely. Folds to hold with one hand or stand up. Only problem magnet is too strong so if I turn the cover completely behind iPad it shuts iPad off.

author: B. D. Lubbers
title: A good value.
content: Pretty decent case, especially for the price.  Fits well and a soft cover over a firm back.  Ipad cases from Apple as much as I love them are over priced and shameful gouging customers. These are decent, do the work and have a pleasant appearance near to the $80 cases at Apple.

author: Rachelle MIller
title: Five Stars
content: Fits great.

author: Aaron C.
title: Five Stars
content: Fits perfect, works like it should

author: Cheryl Snyder
title: well made
content: fits perfect

author: Lewis G
title: Excellent Product
