content: This is an excellent product and serves as excellent protection for my iPad Air I would recommend this product for purchase.

author: Lara Trynosky
title: Not up to par
content: I loved the lightweight feel, but the auto sleep function does not work.  This is the second I have ordered through Amazon that didn't work correctly.  In the first one I ordered the magnetic close function as well as the auto sleep function didn't work.  probably  just going to keep this one even though it is not what promised.  I will just have to turn it off manually.  I don't feel like researching a another and have it not function correctly .  I am disappointed though because I usually am very happy with my Amazon orders.

author: a reader from coconut grove
title: Did not last
content:
While this is well made and fits perfectly the quality is disappointing.
After a few months all the corners are cracking and product needs to be replaced.

author: Homer Simpson
title: not like the original cover by Apple
content: the touch of that cover feels smooth and rich but it is very light and thin. not like the original cover by Apple, this cover won't last as long i guess.

author: Claire N.
title: Overall I am very satisfied with this purchase
content: Overall I am very satisfied with this purchase. It is comparable in quality to the Apple case at a fraction of the price.  Sleep/wake function works well - still trying to get the stand to work as it should.

author: Andrew Rodriguez
title: Very nice case
content: This case is one of the best I have ever bought. Fits perfectly and doesn't add much bulk to my iPad Air . Keeps it safe and clean also allows me to stand my iPad up and watch movies easily. Mine did not come with the stylus pictured but personally I don't use it anyway . Great case in any event

author: Gary Labelle
title: Great value
content: This is a great case for the price. The cover provides a degree of protection for the front, back and sides of the iPad, without adding lots of bulk.

author: Ray Leonard
title: Love it!!!
content: I purchased the product for my wife's iPad and she loves it. The old one was worn out and this is a perfect replacement.

author: Heather LaSalle
title: Fantastic bright green color
content: Exactly as described. Fits my iPad perfectly. Fantastic bright green color!

author: thomas ryan
title: Poor quality, sending it back
content: The thin plastic strips that border the volume and buttons and switches on my iPad have all snapped in the short time I placed this on my iPad.  No drops, no removing and replacing the case.  Poor quality, sending it back.

author: Enoch
title: Overactive Sleep/Wake Function
content:
The sleep/wake magnet puts the iPad to sleep when I have it open.

UPDATE: I ordered a second unit thinking that the original was an anomaly. The second one was worse than the first one. I would not recommend this product to anyone. It defeats the purpose of having a smart case.

author: Spack02
title: Five Stars
content: Great fit... Great price.  Works perfectly.

author: Marianne
title: Great choice
content: Perfect fit for my 1st generation iPad Air. Not heavily padded but should provide the necessary protection for routine use. Has all the basic functions, auto shut off and typing stand and it it last a few years it won’t owe my anything.

author: Lori DeMario
title: Five Stars
content: Works great, love the color.

author: Xiomara B.
title: Great cover.
content: Love my new iPad cover. Thin but durable. Also very attractive.

author: Loving Fashion
title: The case is slim and works as described. I ...
content: The case is slim and works as described.  I would rather it had some type of padding on the back cover (which is why I gave 4 stars).  I will keep for now, but will be purchasing something with more padding to protect against falls.

author: Youknowwho
title: Five Stars
content: Very nice cover and back

author: CMJ
title: Great Value
content: So much less expensive than my previous Apple cover and appears to be of the same quality.  Very good buy at a very good price.  Also love the color.

author: B. Mui
title: Excellent
content: Perfect fit and very durable. I foresee this lasting a very long time.

author: M.P. Muno
title: works well enough
content:
Covers my iPad and looks nice.

The magnet on it interacts with my iPad poorly, though. If I have the case folded on the back to hold it in my hand, it will often shut off the iPad when the magnet comes loose. I can't be sure it isn't something I did, though - I've repaired the screen several times (the first time when I broke, the other times because the replacement screens go bad) and might have done something to the internal magnet.

author: Victor
title: Fantastic value, highly recommended!
content: Highly recommended. This is a solid case that does its job for an remarkably low price. The construction seems to be sound, and only now (after a month of use) does the cover show the slightest signs of wear (some creasing from folds). There are magnets in the cover that are strong enough to hold the "triangle" in place when my iPad is propped up, and overall, the set-up is very stable and functional. I've never had it unintentionally fall down.

author: DA
title: JETech iPad Air Case, good basic protection
content:
[ASIN:B00HRLUSRA JETech iPad Air Case Slim-Fit Smart Case Cover for Apple iPad Air iPad 5 with Auto Sleep/Wake Feature (Black)]
This case was adequate for basic protection of my iPad Air. The texture of the case was a bit smooth for my grip, but the 'smart-close/standby' feature worked fine, it was slim and fit the iPad Air perfectly. The case/stand design could be more robust and more protection might be added for the bottom edge of the iPad. The seller was prompt in all replies, answered my queries and accepted my recommendations. A decent case for the price, for your iPad Air, as long as adults are handling it.

author: Ross
title: Five Stars
content: great

author: Aleks
title: Great product, exactly what described but i also wanna ...
content:
Great product, exactly what described but i also wanna give a 10 stars to the shipping time frame, they are simply amazing, serious, I'd definitely recommend this seller to everyone !!
Great job guys !!

author: Denis
title: It works
content: For the price it why not! Had one similar lasted 3 years. It hardly went anywhere but home as I'm retired.

author: Kelly
title: I love this case
content: I love this case! I was looking for something that protected my iPad Air without feeling bulky and this case is perfect for that. It's very slim, the material is smooth and doesn't feel cheap at all, and it fits extremely well. All the holes line up well and the case was very easy to put on.

author: Neal
title: We like the cover - Good Customer Service
content:
We like the cover. It's good. We had a similar cover before (bought somewhere else) and the plastic on side broke. But this looks much sturdier and better.

Updated on 5/7/19:
We had a small issue with this JETech Case for Apple iPad Air 1st Edition Smart Cover with Auto Wake/Sleep. I called JETech customer service.  I did with Nick @ JETech. He was so helpful and provided me with all the details. Few  questions asked and processed my replacement request which I got today.  JETech Customer Service & Support is excellent.

author: Julia
title: Best case for a very reasonable price!
content: This is an outstanding case.  I can't believe the quality of this case, especially because of it's low price.  It has exceeded my expectations and I would not hesitate to buy again.  This case is better than ones i have paid 10 times as much for. It has become my main case for my iPad Air.  I received it when promised, in excellent condition.  All in all a good buying experience.  I would highly recommend this seller to everyone.

author: warm by the fire
title: Fits like a glove
content: Fits perfect

author: Nick
title: Perfectly capable case
content: Just got my iPad Air 1 a day after this came in the mail. I wanted to make sure I had a wake case with good reviews before I went into unboxing the iPad. It works really well, adds some heft to the tablet but that's to be expected, no complaints about the aesthetics.

author: Joel Dean
title: The Overhang Provides Additional Protection
content: These covers are great. They are BETTER than Apple's smart cover because they provide some drop protection. One of my users dropped his iPad Air twice while using this case. The corner of the case cracked on the first drop and then broke off on the second drop -- but the iPad Air survived unscathed. That's quite a feat for an $11 case. Yes, the cover does overhang the edge slightly. But, this is part of what absorbs the drop impact, so it may be a worthwhile inconvenience for some users.

author: Ron
title: Great Value
content: This case is a real value.  It is very light and feels good to the touch.  The auto sleep/wake works as expected.  Would definitely buy again.  I highly recommend.

author: Marcus
title: sharp edges made holding the iPad uncomfortable
content:
I wouldn't have bothered to review this cover, but since the seller insisted with repeated request, I'm giving them my honest thoughts.
My biggest disappointment with this cover is the way it fits around the iPad Air. The hard plastic leaves sharp and uncomfortable edges at the corners and just about everywhere your hands hold onto the iPad. So holding the iPad for any length of time was uncomfortable.
I was also unhappy with the lack of ability to watch the iPad in landscape mode on anything but a perfectly flat surface. Example, it's nearly impossible to set the iPad down on a bed or other soft surface and have it stay in position.
I have and use daily other, much nicer covers on a iPad 4 that work better than this flimsy cover.
This style cover is better than no cover and does offer some protection for the iPad, but in everyday use, it's a poor choice.

author: Asked & Answered
title: Perfect for iPad Air
content: This case fits perfectly on the iPad model A1474.  I bought one on Sept. 2016 and it finally started to chip apart a bit so I bought a new replacement.  For $12 you can't beat it.  It's not worth buying the more expensive covers - this works great!

author: Jeremy D.
title: High Quality, Low Price.
content: Recently replaced an older case I had for my iPad Air. This case is excellent. It has a hard plastic outer shell to protect the iPad and a screen cover similar to the iPad smart case. Given the price, I have to give it 5 stars. the hard plastic shell fits like a glove and the cover is decent. It is by no means equivalent to an Apple product or a Speck case but it is also not the price of those cases. If you are looking for something high quality at a very low price, give this one a shot.

author: Rabbi Block
title: Perfect Replacement
content: The brown Apple, leather cover served me well and lasted longer than I expected. However nothing is permanent, no matter how well made, and the leather started to delaminate. I wanted a simple, practical, no nonsense replacement. And I found it. My IPad snapped right in, turns on and off, and looks good. A simple, practical, and economic cover. Exactly what I wanted.

author: Daisy
title: Perfectly Protected for 1st edition ipad
content: I'm thrilled with this protective case for my first edition ipad.  My original case was actually more of a cover and did not have a back on it and stayed on magnetically. Unfortunately, it was always falling off and after many years it was dirty.  I'm so thrilled that I could actually find a case for this old ipad I got when my kids were little.  I really like that this one has a back on it.  I feel my ipad is way more protected with this case now. I'm amazed that this ipad has outlasted several phones and laptops  It was so nice they supplied a picture of where to find the correct model number because I had no idea which one I had after all these years.

author: Palenomore
title: It’s ok
content: Kind of cheap feeling but it fits my iPad.

author: LookingForBooks
title: Five Stars
content: It looks nice on my iPad, so I gave this a five.

author: Elizabeth A
title: Very nice cover for the price!
content: Needed a cover for a very old iPad. This one works perfectly. Fits well and leaves easy access to the buttons. Very reasonably priced.

author: Kevin
title: Low quality, poor durability
content: We bought two of these back in March 2018 (black & purple). The purple case started cracking at the corners after about a month (no drops or abuse) and receently has gotten so damaged that it’s unusable.  Even at this price point the quality should be much better.  I will say that the black case has held up well, but that said, my wife’s iPad (purple case) gets probably 100 times more use than mine, so I expect my case to start cracking soon as well.

author: Keith S
title: Great experience, thank you!
content: Received the iPad cover faster than expected, it fits on perfectly, and works well

author: James F Kelly
title: Corner grips are cracking and falling off. One Year of gentle use next to my reading chair.
content: With no travel or bounces, the corner grips are cracking and falling off releasing the iPad. Nearly fell out of the case. Not too happy. Would expect durability for at least a couple of years for usage like this.

author: Kelsey
title: Five Stars
content: Love this! Equivalent to Apple cover but much cheaper. Great texture and very slim! Highly recommend!

author: Amazon Customer
title: If you hold open your thumb will touch the screen
content: I bought this to replace one that wore out that I bought at Apple I thought it was identical but realized that the casing only hold the pad around the corners ( the other went all the way around ) so when I’m holding it in my hand my thumb hits the screen and activates the touch on the screen. But the fact that this was 1/4 the price I paid for the other one I can live with that.

author: Amazon Customer
title: Durable
content: Perfect fit

author: SH
title: Good quality and happy with purchase
content: Good quality case. Happy with purchase and would definitely buy more of their products in the future.

author: M. Ossa
title: It last a year
content: It could be a great product but is made of low quality plastic. Low quality plastic is unable to withstand long term stress. This is the reason the corners that hold the iPad in place become craked in a year.

author: carl krieger
title: Satisfied
content: It works like I expected. I previously had a more expensive cover. This works just as well. It is definitely a good value , and works in keeping your iPad protected.

author: David J Quigley
title: It broke after about two weeks!!
content: It's  broken already. I've had this for a few weeks and it is cracked already. I m the type of person who,takes great care with all of their electronics. With that said I have not dropped or put any undue stress on my iPad and this case is cracked already. I will be skipping this brand in the future. My last case lasted over two years, not two weeks. I would skip this one if you are looking for something that lasts.

author: Fortsports
title: Lasted Less Than 6 Months
content:
I actually like the case, how slim it is and the multiple viewing angles.  I also like the fact that it doesn't have a smooth surface so that you are less likely to drop it.

The problem is that in less than 6 months the case has fallen apart.  It is possible that my kids initiated the case destruction or it may just be cheap quality.  In any case I noticed that the two bottom corners started to chip away fairly shortly after I purchased it and at this point in time the case no longer holds the iPad in place.

I would like to give it a better review but at this point in time I cannot.

author: Chellie13
title: Worked great for 4 months
content: Had this case for 6 months, the good is: Fits perfectly, feels lightweight and thin which helps as I travel a great deal.  Within 5 months the corners broke off I started noticing when placing my ipad in my travel briefcase the cover would start to slide down causing it to "wake" up when upright.  I need to use a binder clip to keep it closed.  Now the magnets are failing and not working so it won't sleep with the cover on.  Time for a new one :)

author: Mitch Richmond
title: Satisfied Customer
content: Easy ordering, simple checkout, on time delivery, email confirmation of each step of the process.  No complaints, and to top it off the product was just as it was pictured and described.  To sum it up, very satisfied customer!!!

author: Jason
title: Great looking case
content: Very slim, minimal, and great looking case. The cover works as a stand, just like the one Apple sells but not nearly as expensive as theirs.  Very easy to install as well.

author: Dunthy
title: iPad Air Case, JETech® Gold Serial iPad Air Slim-Fit Smart Case Cover
content: Nice case. It won't protect the ipad air from being dropped, but very good for protecting from scratches. The stands are nice - but don't work well on your bed. Stand works better on hard surfaces.

author: Daniel Stybr
title: great case
content: fits air ipad great and very slim. My old cover was too bulky.  I use it for navigation in a private plane and less bulk is always a bonus.

author: Kare
title: Just as expected
content: We like that it is low profile, sleek and the way it stands. We haven't had it long enough to judge on durability but seems to be of good quality material.

author: Julio Valentin
title: iPad Air 1 Cover
content: The cover fit very well, it is light and a good price.

author: Kathi D
title: Perfect!!
content: I purchased this care for my new iPad Air.  It fits snugly and is extremely sturdy.  The front folds and makes a stand which I can use when viewing recipes while cooking.  The back cover is a hard material which protects the back of my iPad... So much better than just a front cover.  And it has the magnetic click and close, as well.  I love it and am happy that, after reading the reviews, I decided on this case.  It's PERFECT.

author: C. L. Clark
title: A win win for my iPad Air
content: I was looking for a cover for my iPad Air that would not add a lot of bulk to it. I searched several brands and decided on JETech. It was a great choice. The low profile is just what I wanted. The flip back stand creates a great viewing angle. And, to boot, the cover awakens my iPad when opened and puts it to sleep when closed. This was definitely a win win for me.

author: Maddy
title: Great Product
content: My husband bought this for his daughter's I pad and it fit perfectly and i like the fact that it fold over to cover your screen

author: Eric G.
title: Get this, not Apple's
content: Appears to be no discernable difference between this and Apple's own smartcase design, and for the price, it's twice as nice.

author: Florence Broderick
title: Great at first...
content: This was amazing when we originally received it, but after just a few months it has chipped on every corner leaving jagged edges and exposed areas of the iPad. I'm very careful with the case so I would say this is more of a quality issue than user error.

author: Amazon Customer
title: Finger prints
content: I don't want to see finger prints every time I pick it up. I have not found any cleaning solution as of yet to remove the finger prints.

author: Jay
title: Good products
content: Fits tablet well

author: CJ
title: It's pretty nice, and we're very happy with it
content: Have had this case for a year. It's pretty nice, and we're very happy with it. No issues at all.

author: A. Benge
title: Budget-friendly case
content: The case is pretty thin, but it seems to be durable enough. I wouldn’t trust it to protect the iPad if I dropped it though. Also it doesn’t come with the stylus as pictured.

author: Moooooom3
title: Great cover
content: I love these covers. Inexpensive but great quality. I bought a second one for my daughter's iPad.

author: Reader1002
title: This is a good case for the price
content: This is a good case for the price, although the purple color I ordered looked a little less bright and pretty than the color in the photo did. Overall, though, this case does its job (and syncs with the lock feature on the iPad) and is a good bargain!

author: Don Monteith
title: Great quality. Not flimsy like the garbage you usually ...
content: Bought this for my MIL and she loves it.  Great quality.  Not flimsy like the garbage you usually get at this price.

author: Mr. Boingo
title: Fell apart after about 7 months. My iPad falls ...
content: Fell apart after about 7 months. My iPad falls out of the case all the time. I have to be careful opening the cover or my iPad will slip right out.

author: Oromo
title: Four Stars
content: It started breaking off at the edge after a month of use.

author: Val S R
title: Great simple cover
content: Fits great and works perfect. Better than those cheap two piece covers i used to get.

author: Critical and Honest
title: Well made, solid, protects the iPad Air well
content: Very happy that the iPad air slipped right inside the cover. The cover is encased in metal with solid metal on the back of the iPad, with a flexible but solid rubber-like fold-out cover. Good job and happy so far.

author: March Hare
title: Very decent cover for iPad Air
content: Not much to say here but this case does its job well. Slim fit, easy to put on iPad. iPad turns as it should on when cover is lifted. I expect this case will last quite well.

author: A. Taylor
title: Great Case at an Incredible Low Price. Highly Recommended!
content: I am super fussy when it comes to my iPad cases. I admittedly avoided buying this one because I though the low price would mean low quality. Well, how pleasantly surprised I was when this one arrived at my doorstep. Built with the same quality, fit, and finish as cases four times the price. It fits perfectly and looks just as good as Apple own overpriced smart covers. Two months of use and it still looks brand new. I highly recommend this product. Fun colors too! Don't pass it up - this case is worthy!

author: sla
title: Well designed
content: I bought this for my mom as a new iPad user. As we were showing her how to use it, I felt that the cover was very much needed. It is durable yet light.

author: Faja
title: Case Cracks From Poor Tolerances/Material
content:
Purchased this for my iPad Air 1 (model A1474).  Initially happy it how snug it fit (tho cover was a problem).  However, like other users, I noticed a crack starting to form from only 3 weeks of use from the iPad stretching the case.  Looks like the manufacturer made the tolerances too tight and/or the case too small.  The material used is a lighter and softer plastic (almost foam-like).  They should have left off the small 3 millimeter pieces of plastic near the button and speakers to allow for the snug fit without the chance for breaking.  Eventually, the iPad stretching the case will force one of these weak points to crack far sooner than expected and you’ll have plastic digging in your skin.  Never dropped the case.  Wish I could buy the more solidly made $19.95 Photive case I had used for the last 4 years.  The other problem is the cover did not magnetically snap shut like my older case so the cover tended to flop around.

Had to go through the hassle of paying $2 for a padded envelope and returning a defective product to get my $11.99 back.  At least I didn’t have to pay for the UPS shipping.

author: Jaggers
title: Five Stars
content: A great case for my iPad Air!

author: Nochecito
title: Almost perfect.
content: This case is comparable to my original a Apple case. I did have to drill and file to lengthen the hole for the camera lens, but every thing else matched up to my old case.

author: Kenneth Osherow
title: This case fits the original iPad AIR are to perfection!
content: This case fits the original iPad are to perfection! The product is built to exacting standards and the quality seems durable and well made.  As I said, with so many iPad models available this case fits the original iPad AIR to Perfection!  You will not be disappointed and the price cannot be beat! It has a non slip feel throughout and make for fantastic protection for your original iPad Air Original.

author: Jo Anne MacWilliam
title: It fit my iPad perfectly!
content: It looks great and fits my iPad.

author: S. H.
title: Glad to find it
content: Perfect fit; nice feel with some tackiness; excellent value

author: JSKW3
title: Great case, looks slick
content:
It is impressive for a case under $10. The magnet holds shut against the iPad face and it looks super slick.
The inside cover is soft like it should be. It is only slightly less soft than the apple version, but not enough difference to worry about your iPad, let alone fork up the extra $70 for an apple one.
My only concern is at the hinge area- whwn you fold the cover around flat against the back and hold it in one hand, the cover is slightly angled off square.  Over time I wonder if the hinge will wear and the cover will feel loose even when shut. However, that is just speculation and the back cover snaps tight when installing.  Even if it break, I can get 7 or 8 to the price of 1 Apple cases and they may do the same thing.

author: Sara / Gull Cottage
title: Color is exactly what I wanted - case fits nice and snug and relieves me of worries should my ...
content: Color is exactly what I wanted - case fits nice and snug and relieves me of worries should my Air take an unexpected fall. Highly recommended to keep your device safe and secure.

author: RainRiverOcean
title: Not great
content: The blue was not bright at all, very muted, and the magnet is so weak the fold up kick stand feature is not very useful. I guess I should man up and buy the apple brand after all, blergh.

author: ckz
title: Excellent simple, folding stand case
content: I ordered this case in black. It arrived quickly and is exactly the simple cover-turned-folding-stand case I was looking for.

author: Connor
title: Great Product!
content: I disliked the texture on the back of the cover, the gray part, but other than that this product is really nice!

author: Becky
title: Not worth the trouble or expense!
content: Wet cheap plastic

author: MoonyPuFu
title: Perfect for carrying just what you need
content:
I will start by saying I hate purses because they end up crammed full of stuff I don't often use, receipts that should have been thrown away, etc.  Until this purchase I used a smaller wristlet wallet with a slot to slide a phone. It was ok but bulky with the phone inside and a bit annoying because it was either in my hand or hanging from my wrist.
And I dislike every phone case I've owned because I've managed to break every phone screen ( probably because the phone has not been in a purse :) ).
I spent at least an hour searching for a phone case, and although I was hopeful this would work based on reviews I was not overly optimistic it would work for me This phone wallet is PERFECT! The phone fits snugly in the case, the wallet snaps tightly ensuring the screen is protected and I can carry just what I need ( well, it's maxed out at 8 cards so maybe a little more).  Still room for cash.  The chain is not very strong but I've been careful and had no issues. I love that it can be worn over the shoulder or doubled up.  Talking on the phone and taking pics- easy, no issues.
Overall this wallet with my iPhone 6plus, 8 cards and cash is less bulky than my old wristlet with my iPhone 5.
I've only had this 3 weeks but it's holding up great!  For the first time ever I love a wallet/purse and phone case!

author: Gordo Marx
title: Five Stars
content:
Prompt delivery and Product was as described. Thanks.
Act to remove Money from Politics and Move to Amend.

author: ScotInTex
title: Good fit on iPad air version one.
content: Fits on the iPad perfectly (first version, not air 2 or newer) and certainly protects the tablet though, like all good cases, really adds to the overall bulk of the iPad. Too new to say anything about durability but the material certainly feels good. The main flap has the magnet to wake up the pad when opened, or make it snooze when the flap is closed. Nice.

author: Howard
title: Nice snug and secure fit
content: Nice snug and secure fit.

author: Prime Queen
title: Great, affordable case!
content: We purchased this case for our 1st generation iPad Air.  The case fits our iPad great.  It’s made out of a plastic with a rubberized coating, which helps it to not slip.  The magnet closure is a little weak but works.  The stand is pretty sturdy.  I haven’t been able to get the sleep/wake feature to work on my iPad yet, but it may be because we previously had the screen replaced.  Overall, this is a great, affordable case that we’d definirelh recommend.

author: Gary
title: Fantastic. Light and durable.
content: My favorite iPad case very pretty.  I dropped my iPad and this case saved it though the case was ruined bit any case would be if it falls on gravel.  It did it's job though.  The red one is super attractive.

author: Larry Thompson
title: Great bargain, well made..
content: So much better than my original Apple cover. The buttons are more accessible, the earphone jack and the speaker are uncovered, and the sound is better.. great customer service. I like mine so much I’m tempted to order a spare..

author: Sharon W
title: So I'm very happy with this product
content: Honestly I've bought enough of ipad cases that I'm always wary when I'm purchasing from a different brand. This time though, I was very pleasantly surprised, because this one, from the feel of the material, is almost an exact imitation of the Apple branded ones. Except, this one's a fraction of the cost. So I'm very happy with this product. Even if, overtime, the durability turns out to be not as good as the Apple ones, I'll just buy another one. By then new iPads will probably be out already anyway, so it'll be time to update regardless. To me, there's no difference between this and the official apple store ones.

author: Adam Bergeron
title: Poor Quality; Good customer service
content:
I purchase this case to replace a similar iPad case that had cracked at the corner near the function buttons. The previous case lasted through 2 years of normal use. This case only last 2 weeks before failing in the exact same spot.

Update: The seller contacted me and sent me a free replacement. Good customer service but let's see how long this case lasts.

author: Michelle
title: It fits perfectly.
content: It fits perfectly & is slimline. I absolutely LOVE IT!! Thank you!!

author: John
title: Pretty nice case!
content: Case was for my iPad Air that I have had since it came out. Fit great! Seems well made.

author: Alyssa
title: Looks great!
content: Light weight and provides good protection for my iPad. I got the blue and I really like the color.

author: Jose
title: won't recommend it after 7 months of use in my office ...
content: JETech® Gold Serial iPad Air Slim-Fit Smart Case Cover for Apple iPad Air iPad 5 with Auto Sleep/Wake Feature (iPad Air, Dark Grey) won't recommend it after 7 months of  use in my office it didn't last even if i didn't use it put to take important notes. also it gets really dirty the dark gray maybe it was manufacture problem but right know i won't recommend it

author: J. Schroeder
title: Nice quality and soft feel
content: This case is a quality case. Works well and is smooth with a nice soft feel.

author: Charlie Brown
title: Works perfectly!
content: This is my go-to ipad cover. The quality is good, last a long time, and is reasonably priced.

author: Amazon Customer
title: Five Stars
content: great value.

author: Ol' J.T.
title: Five Stars
content: A great product at a good price.  My wife is happy, so I'm happy.

author: Lulu
title: Sturdy and Attractive Protective iPad Cover
content: Love this cover for my iPad Air. Fits perfectly. I take my iPad everywhere I go and this cover definitely protects it.

author: CFour
title: Fast delivery
content: As advertised. Works for me so far

author: Deb
title: Really a pretty nice case but after just over a year the corners broke off.
content: Like others have already said, without dropping or misuse the corners where the front cover meets the plastic breaks off. I would have liked it to last a bit longer but at this price I guess one can simply replace it.

author: Cwilli
title: About this cover...
content: Ok...so this is my third cover for my ipad and I'm really liking this cover! What I like most is the back cover since I travel a lot for work I want something that will keep my iPad secure as I sit in airports around the world waiting for flights and so far this cover does just that! I like the red and different angles.  Buy it...I think you will be pleased.

author: BG
title: Good design but poor material
content: It’s the perfect case I was looking for my ipad.  This is my second one.  The first one I bought about six months back.  A few days back I noticed that two corners had broken and the iPad was falling out of the case.  I really like the case and it’s design.  But very disappointed that it didn’t last six mo this.  I’m hoping the second one would last longer.

author: Sharks90
title: You clearly get what you pay for....
content: Every so often a piece will break off the edge of the case and it’s NEVER been dropped! Now, it’s to the point of the iPad is no longer snug within the case.

author: Imtiaz Rahman
title: Very good case
content: Overall this is a very good case when compared to the apple smart case I originally bought. The one thing I was concerned about was the sleep/wake feature on it. My iPad has the zagg glass shield installed on the screen and I didn't know if the feature would work over that. It actually works flawlessly with no problems whatsoever. It would've been nice if the buttons on it were covered up like the apple case, but for $10 I can't complain. The case is also relatively slim which I really like as well. Would recommend this case anyday for someone who is looking for a slim profile case.

author: Scott H.
title: Nice case, very thin, looks great but not overly durable
content: Nice case, very thin, looks awesome and works well. It's not overly durable if you ever remove your iPad from the case however. The thin plastic around the area of the power switch cracked and subsequently broke off, leaving the iPad a bit less secured in the case.  I haven't decided if I will order another case of the same type again or not.

author: Rhonda
title: Rose Gold covercase
content: Bought this cover for my new iPad and I love the color, feel of it, ease of putting it on. It’s a nice case. I received it in just a few days of ordering it.

author: Ovie123
title: Sleep Mode didn't work right
content: Product didn't sleep when cover was closed or wake when it was open. But if I flipped the cover all the way open to the back side of the tablet, it would shut off. Very awkward to try to keep that cover open while it flops around.

author: KontryBoy706
title: Great Case!
content: This is a very decent case for the iPad. I had a different case that I bought when I got my iPad a few years ago. It had worn out and I stumbled upon this one... at $10 this is a steal. Sleek, low profile, wake/sleep function, has grip to it, can fold into a stand...what more do you want? Good job JETech

author: KatMama
title: Great low-cost option with sufficient iPad coverage
content: I've used the JETech case for a week and so far I'm really impressed, despite originally wanting an Apple Smart Cover/Case and only having leather options. The JETech cover doesn't have a magnet for auto sleep/wake, but its not an issue to manually turn the iPad on and off as needed. The thick plastic back and plastic/microfiber front are impressively well made and hold up to being used 12+ hours a day and traveling in a laptop bag on business trips. The cover folds up to be used as a stand and is very sturdy (doesn't unfurl while being used, even with some nasty turbulence on the last flight). I'd highly recommend this product to any iPad owner - don't be scared off by the low price! At ~$13 you can get multiple colors to coordinate with your outfits.

author: Red Foot
title: Great cover. I've had it over a month now ...
content:
Great cover.  I've had it over a month now and it's holding up very well after plenty of use.  It gets my 5 star approval rating.
Update:  Less than a year later the corners have begun to crack and split. I can no longer recommend this cover.

author: kalexandra
title: exactly what I wanted. It replaced my old IPAD ...
content: exactly what I wanted.  It replaced my old IPAD case that finally fell apart.

author: Robert Carrillo
title: Great Inexpensive Case
content: I bought this to replace another case of mine that broke, I like this one much better as the "Smart Cover" is attached to the back piece. Matte black shows some fingerprints but they are easily wiped away. I would buy this again

author: Tamika Westmoreland
title: Great quality and deal
content: Great quality and deal

author: David Thompson
title: Just as offered...
content: Sturdy, easy to hold. Exactly as advertised.

author: Don Tirrell
title: perfect for iPad Air model 1475
content: is as advertised. Solid replacement for my previous worn-out cover

author: DerekNewyen
title: Cutout
content: Its fits really nice and feels really secure! The only problem was the top microphone cut out was not precise so it covers the now! Otherwise the case is great. A problem just came up and the thin part around the power button snapped and it is really annoying not even a month! Now the corners are starting to crack down 1 star after a few months there is a huge piece that cracked off. I didn't even drop it or anything it just cracked off bad product. Not buying anything from them anymore bad quality

author: Nancy Robbins
title: It's a good cover thought I had hoped it would have a ...
content:
It's a good cover thought I had hoped it would have a better way to use as a support when standing on side for reading.
The way it has been designed is not sturdy enough....

author: Raja
title: Corners broke!!
content:
Poor build quality!!
I had a case from different brand previously (same $10 bucks) and it stayed intact for 3 years except for the wear and tear on the leather cover on top. This case was bought in Nov'17 and in 4 months - two corners broke off. Now my iPad will not stay in the case, in-fact my iPad came off from the case and fell down while I was holding it. Now just to protect my iPad, I have removed the case. How Ironic!!

author: Omar
title: Fits, but magnets won't hold the tablet when folded in reading mode
content: The case fits great, but I think they didn't place the magnets correctly because it won't stay in place when it's in 'stand' mode. I can feel the magnetic force, but it's just not strong enough. Might return for another one.

author: Charlene C. Scott
title: I like that it has a hard cover that the iPad ...
content: The product is as stated.  I like that it has a hard cover that the iPad snaps into and it is secure.

author: Oliphaunt
title: Chips for no reason I can see.
content:
It's a beautiful colour (I got the green), and appeared to be well made when I put it on my Ipad Air 1st gen.. However, less then 2 months into very gentle use (just around the house, no kids handling it, no drops, or even rough setting down), tiny fragments of it were falling off. A crack had started on the edge of one of the cutouts, and propagated far enough to allow 2 fragments of about 2-3 mm to break off. This is near the on/off switch, which I usually don't use, preferring to just close the cover instead.

So, despite the looks, and nice fir, I can't give it a higher rating, and really, should give it 1 star. I do love the colour though!

author: arpopa
title: Great product,excellent customer service
content: Fits perfectly,works as advertised.Their customer service was very helpful with a replacement due to wrong size ordered,did not have to return to amazon.Very professional

author: Miss Kerbin
title: Fits Great
content: Fits iPad Air One perfectly, even better than the one I bought from Apple. Larger cutout for headphone jack is nice.

author: Amazoner
title: It's a good cover
content: Just got it last week. Impressed so far. Only thing I don't like it catches fingerprints and its pretty visible

author: MJ of SC
title: Does the job!
content: Good cover. Great price. Suffice the need for a cover for iPad. This is not a protective cover. Great price.

author: RL
title: More protective
content: This is a great case. Much more protective than the one-sided it replaced.

author: Ben E.
title: Five Stars
content: Super fit for IPad Air 1.

author: Deb
title: Did its job
content: Just received my second cover. The first one cracked when I dropped my iPad. iPad is fine though! This cover is lightweight and you can't beat the price. I would give it 5 stars if the cover made a better easel.

author: Peter Yee
title: ... my wife's iPad Air and she says she is delighted with it
content: I bought this for my wife's iPad Air and she says she is delighted with it.  The cover seems pretty similar to the (no longer available) Apple covers of this type.  It fits well without any movement of the iPad within the case and doesn't add much bulk, so the whole thing works with her new T-stand as well.  Couldn't be happier.

author: Taylor Appleseed
title: You get what you pay for
content: Case is decent for the price paid. Biggest issue is the magnets. They aren't strong enough to hold the cover on resulting with the top having a gap above the screen. Most of the plastic sides have already chipped as well. Try not to leave the case in the folded position because it holds the memory.

author: Irv Miller
title: Perfect for protection
content: This item is light weight and covers the ipad perfectly. We use ours for the Square system at events and when not in use this case protects it.

author: Kristen Dalton
title: As expected?
content: Perfect! Just what I needed!

author: Eric Snyder
title: iPad case fits like a glove
content: Just got it so I did not rate the durability, but nicely made and fits the iPad perfectly.

author: Nishit
title: Looks and feels great!
content: Does as it is described to be. I am happy with the grip that both the back and front offer with its smooth matte surface. Non-slippery, non-glossy finish feels good to the touch. The interior feels like soft flannel/microfiber protecting from scratches. The iPad fits effortlessly and has a snug fit in the case without adding any bulk.

author: Pacodog
title: Not very durable.
content: This cover worked well for awhile. It cracked probably after a fall. The thin plastic case is not very strong.

author: svenske
title: Great buy worth purchasing
content: Great buy worth purchasing.  Fits like what they turm clamshell with a cover when closed turns it off and gives good protection to your iPad.  Would buy again. 5 stars

author: Emma
title: Five Stars
content: Very good! This is a the third I bought.

author: Customer
title: Much Better Buy Than at Apple Store!
content: Very light weight, nice matted smooth feel, fits securely and covers my iPad well, pretty color. Pretty much identical to the ones at the Apple Store that are a LOT more money. Shipping was very fast. Only problem is that it stains easily and I haven't figured out how to get stains off (alcohol on cotton ball doesn't really work).

author: Julie Murphy
title: It fits an early version Ipad Air
content: It fits an early version Ipad Air

author: Sarah
title: LOVE!!!
content: This is one of my best purchase! It is exactly what I want. I need a simple case, the cover can bend over so I can fit it in my tablet holder. This is perfect! Love the GREEN!

author: Wayne E Rauschuber
title: Five Stars
content: Great price performer.  Works as expected

author: Ashley
title: The material is nice and matte and doesn't really show fingerprints
content: Fits amazingly well on the first generation iPad Air. Previous cases I had that were similar to this one began falling apart after heavy use, I often toss my tablet into my bag quickly without regard. The material is nice and matte and doesn't really show fingerprints, either.

author: BigG
title: Good
content: Arrived quickly after ordering. So it does seem to shut the tablet off when closed. Will check to ensure settings are correct. Otherwise looks good, this is my second one I like the thin design.

author: Lisa V
title: The corner broke off within the first month and became useless when it cracked all the way along the backing ...
content: The plastic backing of this case is very cheap and brittle. The corner broke off within the first month and became useless when it cracked all the way along the backing - not even able to hold the iPad anymore. The front part of the case that covers the screen is fine, but don't expect the back piece to protect your iPad.

author: Izzie
title: These are very nice covers for iPads for a much more reasonable price ...
content: These are very nice covers for iPads for a much more reasonable price than at the Apple Store.  (Sorry Apple, but.....)  Good selection of colors and last quite well.

author: ricdic
title: iPad Air case.
content: The iPad Air case fit perfectly, thanks again. I will definitely order from you again.

author: Judith
title: One Star
content: Took to long to get it was very cheaply made

author: Mary
title: Inexpensive case, nice quality
content: It's a nice case for the price I paid.  Quick delivery was a plus

author: Sandman
title: Protective Cover for Ipad Air (original version)
content: This cover fits perfectly and does its protective job well.  It turns off my Pad when the cover is closed.  It is smart looking, not slippery in my hands, and fits my needs perfectly.  The only problem I am having is inserting the charge cable in the dark (I read in bed at night with all the other lights off).  My last cover only had a small opening in the bottom so it was easy  to find and plug in in the dark.  This cover has a very wide opening (probably to enhance the speaker output), but the charger opening is more difficult to find by touch alone.  It will get easier as I get more familiar with it.  I do like this cover as it snaps on and holds the iPad tightly.  I like it.

author: NOLAMannc
title: Not as nice as Apple case but good for the price
content: Not as nice as Apple case but good for the price.  The rigid plastic back does not provide as much protection as I would hope.

author: MDH
title: Excellent Quality
content: Better than Apple's and excellent quality!

author: Pam Calley
title: I like the fact that it covers front and back
content: The case is just wanted I wanted to replace the old one.  I like the fact that it covers front and back.  My old one just covered the front!

author: Ed M
title: Excellent product at a good price.
content:
Excellent product at a good price.  Protects, turns on and off when opening and closing.  One minor thing would make it better.
The camera lens gets covered when the case is flipped open.  It would have been clever to add a hole for the lens on the front cover so that when it is flipped the lens is not covered.  (minor issue unless you use the ipad ALOT for pictures)

author: Joseph A. Cardillo
title: Didn’t last a year
content: Ordered on December 18, 2017 not even a year old yet and two out of four corners are cracked.  The rest of the cover has held up but the corners have broken.

author: rch
title: JETech case
content: Exactly as expected.

author: Diane M. Churilla
title: Ipad Aire Case
content: The case snapped right onto the Ipad and all openings are well placed.

author: Deb Darnall
title: Five Stars
content: was what I expected

author: Finchie
title: Good product
content: Can't beat this for the price.  Excellent delivery service!

author: Sharon Wasson
title: I like the slim look of it
content: Just received the JETech case yesterday.  Put it on my Ipad Air and it fit perfectly.  I like the slim look of it.  The only thing I wish it had was a place to store the stylus.

author: Schnacka
title: Cheap plastic that breaks on its own
content: All four corners disintegrate after a while, without any drops or bumps. The plastic starts to soften and eventually breaks off. My iPad is stationary, I don't carry it around, and after 3 months, little pieces of plastic pieces fall off to the point where there is no corner support and the case is rendered useless. Be prepared to replace this frequently.

author: Florida Shopper
title: The inside cover is gray and will get dirty over time like the last one did
content: Photo showed it black inside and out. The inside cover is gray and will get dirty over time like the last one did.  Really like the design, just not the gray.

author: Amazon Customer
title: Works well.
content: Love it. Sleek, expect it to hold up.

author: Austin C
title: Magnet Messes Up the Tablet
content: The case is nice and fits the tablet well. The problem that I have with the case is that the magnets are too strong and it was messing up the sensitivity of my Ipad Air and it was also causing the IPad to randomly lock up. I thought that it was a software problem with my Ipad and when I finally figured out that the case was the problem it was past the 30 day deadline to send it back. I would not recommend this product. It is a great price but not worth the annoying tendencies that come with the magnet being too strong.

author: PB
title: Five Stars
content: Protects better than just a cover.

author: Jeanne S.
title: Good Enough
content: I really like the feel of this cover  except for the sharp edges of the sides. Also, the 2 positions for standing it up are not ideal:  the vertical position is too straight-up and the diagonal lay-down position is a little too low for optimal typing.  But for the inexpensive price, it's good enough.

author: Jana Cooper
title: I would not recommend. I'm not sure how well this would protect ...
content: We've had this for less than 6 months and two of the plastic corners already started cracking apart. This happened just by opening it. This has only been used by adults so no dropping or rough handling. I would not recommend. I'm not sure how well this would protect in the event of a drop when it cracks just by opening it!

author: Ash Weeks
title: Poor quality - get what you pay for
content: Case looks fine, just like its more expensive counterparts. Within two weeks, pieces of the plastic corners started to snap off. Despite this case never being dropped ( I doubt the protection is that good) or put into a bag etc. The corners are all but gone, and my iPad can sometimes slip out, making this case 100% useless.

author: Amazon Customer
title: I wouldn’t buy again
content: Already falling apart and we ordered end of May.

author: Kneecee
title: Easy to use
content: Love this lightweight and protective case.

author: J. S.
title: Falling apart after 7 months
content: I've had this case for about 7 months and it's badly cracked in all the corners.  I've never dropped it and it hardly ever leaves the house but it's basically falling apart.  Other than that, I like it but now i have to replace it .

author: Oxana
title: Pleasant to touch
content: Very good price! High quality material and pleasant to touch.

author: Humberto Lucero
title: Good stuff
content: Everything is OK, it is a very nice case, I'm very satisfied, I strongly recommend it; Amazon always means quality.

author: Toastybros
title: Was promising
content: The case was solid at first, until it stopped fitting my ipad properly, the edges don't hold up anymore on the case and it really doesn't seem to be built with the best quality of materials. I guess that's what a $10 ipad case gets you

author: B Sant
title: Nice case!
content: Fits as described and works well!

author: zj
title: Would have been great but stinks!
content: Nice case but has a fishy odor to it- thought it would go away but hasnt after a month. Waited to write this review- sorry will not recommend!

author: Heather Kohler
title: Doesn't fit older IPad Airs. Had to send this ...
content: Doesn't fit older IPad Airs.  Had to send this back as it was too small for my iPad.  There wasnt an obvious size description either.

author: Francisco Formanowicz
title: Four Stars
content: good.

author: Bonald
title: They were gorgeous but only good for a year or so because they got kind ...
content: When I had my iPad 2, I always had an expensive fabric case, either Michael Kors or Vera Bradley. They were gorgeous but only good for a year or so because they got kind of dirty. I recently got an iPad Air and was having trouble finding a suitable cover. Because of the slight difference in size between the Air and the Air2, none of the cases I tried seem to fit exactly right. I bought this case as a temporary measure, thinking that eventually I would find the perfect cover. Turns out THIS IS THE PERFECT COVER! I could not be more pleased. In fact, within a week, I went back and bought another one for my husband's iPad 2, and it is just as awesome.

author: S. P. Hamilton
title: took some time to receive but all is good
content: just what I wanted

author: Shirley Roaden
title: I really liked this iPad cover
content: I really liked this iPad cover.  The only reason I didn't give it a 5 was the hole for the camera didn't quite line up.  Other than that its great.

author: Mike T.
title: Light weight snap in case.
content:
Super tight fit and light weight snap in case. Accomplishes what I want in a cover, protection and turn off this IPad Air when I close the case. Recommend this case

Revised...May 15, 2016.  The case broke at its weakest point near the three button side. Requested replacement and it was honored. I do like this case.

author: Jillian
title: Five Stars
content: I love this iPad case. It's protective and very stylish.

author: Bobo
title: great product for the price
content: Nice case. Knocked my iPad off the table the same day I got it.  Survived just fine!  The edges are a bit hard/sharp where I tend to hold the pad  Shuts off when cover closed.  Nice product

author: Deb
title: Perfect
content: Fits great and the cover works perfectly.

author: Morgan
title: Good quality, price and functional iPad Air case!
content: Thank you for a great iPad Air case.  Your shipping, packaging and product met all expectations.  Well done!

author: Shaino
title: Nice “cover” but the built in case is crappy plastic and doesnt last 9 months.
content: We like this cover but it doesn’t ladt very long. My wife really likes the cover color and built in case, but it usually last 9 months then we jsbe to order another one.

author: TessB
title: Good case and a good value
content: The case fits the new Ipad(5) very well and looks nice too. I'm happy with the case and would buy it again.

author: mimamma
title: Great cover
content: This case is wonderful for my son's mini IPAD. It is very durable (he has dropped it a few times and its been great), easy for him to use, and the color green is GREAT,  but I think it's just a tad darker than the picture (still neon green, but not as'bright' but that's a good thing. ..I like it)

author: Gigi girl
title: Very nice looking and good quality
content: I recently purchased this case and I'm very pleased with it. The case seem to be of good quality and is sturdy.. I have bought similar case like these from other sellers and it did not seem to fit properly and eventually broke at the edges. However this case stemmed to snap on perfectly ant with a nice tight grip. Lastly shipping was fast.?I am very pleased with this purchase  and definitely recommend

author: Carol
title: Wouldn't recommend this if you're looking for a protective cover for ...
content: Recently purchased for my husband's new iPad. My daughter and I have same one our iPads for over a year. Exactly what we need for adult use to protect iPad and not add bulk. Wouldn't recommend this if you're looking for a protective cover for children.

author: V. Mos
title: Floppy flap
content: The quality is great, looks and feels like it is made to last and the iPad fits perfectly.  BUT the front flap does not stay closed making the sleep mode to not work properly!  Does not have the magnetic flap so it just flops open when you move or grab it!  I noticed it coming on in my car from the bumps in the road at night I can see the iPad lighting up. I have to shut off the iPad when not using so it will not continuously go of and on.

author: Karyn Steinfeldt
title: Great case, great price!
content:
Very satisfied with the product.  Lightweight, color true, and thin.  Just what I ordered!
I would definitely buy this again.

author: Brandon Mokofisi
title: I liked the look and feel of this case
content: I liked the look and feel of this case, but it has this crazy flaw that when I tip the top of the ipad towards me, it shuts my ipad down.  This happens every time I tip it down and randomly when I move it in other directions.  I took it out of the case, and didn't have a single problem.  I've never had this happen with any other case.

author: Daniel E. Castner
title: Very pleased!
content: This colorful case provides protection while propping the device up to facilitate typing or tapping.  Very pleased!

author: Leon Alvarado
title: Great for the price, just ok in quality.
content: This is the second case I buy. I love the design and how it attaches to the iPad. It is very slim so it looks great. My last one started to fall apart after a while. The front cover started to delaminate and the silicon-like material won't adhere to almost any glue. I kept glueing the top's layers but eventually that didn't even do it. Maybe the issues have been corrected with my second one but I won't be certain until some time passes. The good news is that it is very cheap to replace as opposed to other cases.

author: Meagan Eishen
title: I have 2!
content: I’ve bought two of these cases for my work and personal ipads! It’s such a good quality case and is really lightweight so it doesn’t bulk it up too much. Yet it’s strong and I love the triangle folding it’s capable of.

author: Hancock Chan
title: Great OEM quality case!
content:
Great quality! Excellent fitment.

And decent price!

author: jeff5267
title: Five Stars
content: very nice... fits iPad well... no down side

author: kat seibert
title: Four Stars
content: No problem to date, works as expected.

author: Courteney
title: Better than the apple brand
content:
The quality of this was amazing! JUST as nice as the apple brand case like this.
LOVE the price on it also.

The only dislike I have is how dirty it got very quickly.

author: Brian
title: Okay, but turns the iPad off when the lid completely opened and folded around the back
content: Okay case, but when you fold the cover back completely it turns the iPad off again. I would have returned it, but it was for my ten-year-old and he didn't seem to mind. He gets around it by folding the last flap away from the edge of his iPad so that it doesn't tun the unit off when he opens it.

author: Farmer Doug
title: A very good cover
content: Still perfect after 18 months

author: Raven
title: Questionable case.
content: It fits snugly but the access for charging is too small, and it must be taken out of the case in order to charge it.

author: Stivo
title: Not Great!
content: I am disappointed in this protective case because the top flap is too large.  It doesn’t fit properly, moves and hangs over the device.  I will probably pack it up and return it and look for something else.

author: Panchi
title: I recently purchase the iPad Air Case and, while ...
content: I recently purchase the iPad Air Case and, while in general, the iPad Air 2 fits very well in the case, the opening for the camera does does not align well at all. Approximately two thirds of the camera "eye" is covered by the case. In fairness, after making the purchase, I saw the small print that indicated it's not compatible to the iPad Air 2.

author: Junko Yoshikawa
title: Durbility
content: Case fits perfect.  I did not receive something look like pen shown above photo.  Wondering what it is that wasn’t included in package.  I can’t tell about the battery life and durability yet.

author: M R Albert
title: easy to use
content: Fits well, easy to use. Nice.

author: Papaczarn
title: Great product, Even Better Price!
content: I am so happy that we didn't pay the absurd prices for an iPad case at the Apple Store.  The JETech Gold Serial iPad case works perfectly, is solidly constructed, and looks very nice.  I can't believe we thought about buying an Apple case for almost $80.  Do yourself a favor, buy the JETech case for $10 and save the rest.  You will be glad you did.  And in case you are thinking this, I don't work for JETech.  Just real happy with the product and the price

author: mfemalecustomer
title: great!
content: great product for the money, it looks even better than the apple brand that are way too ridiculously expensive!

author: Plods with Beer
title: As advertised
content:
Gotta love generic forms for ratings, so here goes.

Material quality:  The material has a great feel to it and helps grip.

Battery Life:  Gave it 5 stars because if it did have batteries, I'm sure they would last a long time.

Durability:  I've had it 4 days and it hasn't broken.  Love it!  If this changes, I'll be sure to complain.

author: Mandy1990
title: OK Case
content:
This is a OK case. It is tight around the tablet which is nice but the fold over part is to light weight. There's no way this case stays up right to be folded.

It is a nice sky blue color but picks up every finger print or mark you put on it. I do plan on buying a different case.

author: Joaquin
title: Great cover!
content: Great fit, slim design and a very convenient price! I fully recommend this product!

author: K. Meeks SC
title: Great Low Cost Option
content: I love how this cover has the thinness of the original Apple cover and has the surround case around the back of my iPad Air for "bumper" protection. Once folded over, the magnets in the front cover form a secure hold. So secure, I am typing this on my iPad in the standing position. Its only fault would be that it is easy to not get the magnets aligned just right for it to hold in stand mode. The magnets do very well in cover mode. They keep it closed tightly even when I've just tossed the iPad in my purse. Overall -- good money spent.

author: Astrodonkey
title: Three year lifespan
content: Lasted almost three years of pretty heavy use.

author: Ron C
title: Good case
content: Case fits perfectly.  It is nice because when you open and close the case it turns the screen on and off automatically.  It folds to prop up the iPad nicely.  This is a good light duty case but it is not designed for impacts.

author: Cara Case
title: it just seems to be of poor quality. There are too many other cases on ...
content: It is already chipping on the corners and I haven't even had this case for 4 months yet. I have never dropped the ipad, it just seems to be of poor quality. There are too many other cases on the market, find one that is better made.

author: Simeon Amburgey
title: A soft touch stands out in a crowd of cold cases.
content: There are so many shell/smartcover hybrids out there so I thought I would take a shot at JETech. I was pleasantly surprised at the feel and texture of the case. It had a nice soft touch to it which made it inviting to use. We will see down the road as far as durability. Many cases seem to become brittle but the JETech seems to have a bright future ahead.

author: Joanne
title: iPad Air Case
content:
iPad Air Case is very functional, doing everything the apple smart case does, for a much cheaper price. It protects from normal wear and tear. I've dropped my iPad off of my bed, and out of my hands while standing and it hasn't had any damage.

Very pleased with my purchase.

author: Nick Ueber
title: Outstanding
content: A really nice product that is outstanding in design, use and customer service. Perfect fit for my IPad Air that is sturdy, light and attractive. Very pleased with all aspects of this transaction.

author: Zhigang Bai
title: I really love this iPad case because it is very thin and ...
content:
I really love this iPad case because it is very thin and fits well. The case is this and smooth and the cover feels really good. Everything is exactly as described by Amazon. The case is highly recommended!
One more thing to mentions, it gathers fingerprints easily.

author: Edo
title: Update - Cracked for no reason after a couple mongs... No longer: So far this is working great. Nice fit -
content:
Updated. Had to drop my rating on this. Was really happy at first. But even though  my iPad sits on my desk and gets no abuse at all, no dropping, traveling etc. I noticed that part of the frame around a button has cracked. It isn't a spot that gets touched - just seems like poor materials. It is too bad this seemed like a great deal and was working well.
Original:
Bought this to replace a leather case that was a lot more expensive but fell apart. So far this is working great. Nice fit, good alignment, light, thin - just what I needed.

author: Andrew Chu
title: Basically, pretty basic. In a good way.
content:
5 or so years removed from my iPad Air 1st gen, I decided to go in and purchase a new case to replace the old one (a roocase origami). This JETech case ended up being perfectly fine and functional. The port cutouts are good, the magnets are functional, (although unable to hold the front cover in place when open and swung onto the back), the material feels good (if not a tad cheap).

It's not definitely not a premium product in terms of craft or feel... but for a bog standard basic iPad cover? It's definitely worth a buy and performs well enough to last for at least a couple more years.

That's to say, it will most likely outlive my half a decade old iPad Air.

author: Adele M. Zawicki
title: IPad Air Case
content: This case fits my iPad Air perfectly. It is well constructed and, in fact, is nicer and cheaper than the original IPad Smart Case I purchased at the Apple store.

author: LAE
title: Five Stars
content: Nice quality. Feels like leather. Worth the money!

author: john s
title: Durable.
content: Great cover and stand

author: Jim And Judi
title: Nice and cheap
content: Very protective but due to the flap front it got stuck in small spaces but otherwise you should get it its hard soft on the back folduble on the front and soft on the front very nice and cheap

author: Amazon Customer
title: Do not buy
content: I am not pleased with this at all. Cheap and does not work for me

author: Nbrgrl
title: Good deal for ipad air cover/case.
content:
Looks and fits well for the money.
Sleep function works fine.
I would give it 5 stars if it held the stand positions like the Apple smart cover its patterned after but for $11.00, i think its awesome...definitely worth it. And super fast shipping!!!

author: Roxann Fast
title: Great value.
content: Great cover for the price. Very practicable and easy to use.  The camera eye was the only cut out that was not perfect but easy to fix.

author: Cara Hernandez
title: This case works great and the cover puts the iPad to sleep
content: This case works great and the cover puts the iPad to sleep. I prefer this to the Apple case due to the Apple case being made with leather and this brand is all synthetic per their description! It's a little soft and seems like it might become scratched easily, but no scratches yet!

author: D. W. Bondurant
title: Nice case at a good price
content: The case fits and looks good.  Just be careful to make sure you are ordering the right version for your iPad.  I was confused and ordered the wrong case initially.  The case was returned for a full refund promptly and the new case was delivered so very happy.

author: Thomas R. Wenzel
title: I-pad cover workers as stated.
content: I just started using this I-pad cover. It appears to work up to my expectations. No problems so far.

author: Barbara A Findlay
title: Fits my ipad air 1 perfectly.
content: Arrived quickly and as described.  Very satisfied with product.

author: Deborah E. Bifulco
title: Works great
content: I got this to protect my iPad Air and am completely satisfied.  It's lightweight, has kind of a "grippy" surface so doesn't slip, and turns the iPad on/off with ease.  Also a snap to put on the iPad.  Very satisfied!

author: MZ
title: be aware of the cracks on the go...
content: do not buy it, I regret I bought it. Only 6 or 7 months, there are cracks at the corners, one time my ipad almost fell onto the ground, thanks to my agility, I saved my ipad from free dropping onto the ground.. I will get another brand.

author: Ryan & Nicki
title: It's what it needs to be...
content: Fits the ipad well, protects the corners (which is important for me because of my kids), and serves well as a stand.  Good product, all around.

author: snowday
title: One Star
content: Corners broke within the month. Need to buy a new one. Disappointed

author: Richard J Morgan
title: Excellent case.  Does what it's supposed to. Lasts long.
content: I bought this case to replace my son's 3 year old case from the same manufacturer.  The old one was still working well but it was stained and gross and has marker and crayon on it.  Otherwise it was remarkably whole.  Most cases come apart at the glue joints or they warp.

author: ann clasbyl
title: Great case, great service!
content: I paid $75.00 for a very simulat smart case cover from Apple, the cutouts to turn my IPad off and on did not match up on my iPad... Needless to say, if I had to power down or turn the volume up or down I had to remove the case.. My fault I never took it back.. I ordered this one for about $10.00, it fits perfect!! I received it within 3 days.  Very happy!😄

author: S. Katz
title: Five Stars
content: Good fit and materials seem reasonable.

author: Beth Wenger Johnstone
title: great
content: Fits well. Works as advertised.

author: Peter T.
title: Five Stars
content: Good quality cover

author: Darrin Reid
title: Great quality, great price
content: This is the second iPad cover that I have purchased from this company. The first one lasted over 2 1/2 years. I simply needed to replace it due to where in tear, on my part not the company.  These protectors hold up extremely well. The reason I had to replace it, I never had to take my iPad out of the cover in order to use it.  I will continue to purchase from this company. The product is excellent quality. Great price!

author: David Donen
title: satisfied
content: So far this i-pad cover is good, my wife likes it better than her old. As long as the cover does not wear out and rip, like the other brand it'll be fine. The shocking pink is nice.

author: Staci
title: Perfect cover at a great price!
content: Fits perfectly on my iPad Air, no issues, it's very thin and that's exactly what I wanted. It does have a hard shell the the iPad sits in and did protect my iPad the one time I dropped it. Initially I thought that the iPad would pop out of the cover and it has not, it sits securely in the case as if the cover has gripped the iPad.

author: Shana a.
title: Pretty color, soft and durable
content: Beautiful case! Looks, feels and works just like the $60 ones at bestbuy. Husband bought with my iPad last month. No issues very soft and easy to handle. It also stands up the iPad well.

author: Anne e. mathers
title: Totally satisfied.
content: Good quality for price.

author: Justin Bieber
title: Just paid for itself. Its thin but tough!
content: Just dropped my iPad from the top of a locker (about 7-8 feet). It was so loud that a janitor ran inside the locker room to make sure no one was hurt! The case cracked in multiple places but the iPad survived. In other words, the case took the blow. Totally paid for itself! Ordering another one now.

author: Steve
title: Super nice I pad cover
content: A very well constructed case. It fits perfectly, and the color is perfect . Just what we expected. I highly recommend this cover.

author: khoury
title: Perefect for my aging ipad
content: It’s light weight and does the job well.  Arrived in one day with great pCking...it’s what I eant. Thanks

author: Kellie Praydis
title: Just As Advertised Great!
content: So far so good. Haven't been able to actually use my iPad due to long wait to recover old Apple Account. But but your case is great!

author: John Orban
title: I love this cover.
content: OK, this is the third one of these I've bought. I'll be buying another one in a week or so.

author: Aaronazon
title: Broken in two spots....so far...
content: The backing broke the first time I put in my iPad.  It was a small chip in the bottom corner...not a big deal, but now the piece above the volume buttons has broken off completely.  My iPad is very lightly used...hardly ever leaves the house.  I bought a Jetech because my 6S case is just right...do not recommend this iPad case though.

author: J. Taylor
title: New Ipad case
content: My old Ipad Air case failed.  I couldn't get a new one at Apple.  This one is great.

author: SeattleMPH
title: great light weight case.
content: I bought this for my mom for her iPad. So far so good. Not much to say about it.  It does what it's supposed to. It is very nice that you can fold the cover back into a stand for the iPad.  She uses that a lot for watching movies. Love having the cover turn on and off the screen. Another plus is that the case is really thin and lightweight!

author: Lauro A. Braganza
title: Ok iPad cover
content: Average product

author: Jon
title: The quality of this case is terrible. It has a matte finish but it quickly ...
content: The quality of this case is terrible.  It has a matte finish but it quickly gets rubbed off on the edges so that it is glossy.  The case plastic that holds the iPad is incredibly thin and brittle.  The corners broke almost immediately without being dropped or abused.

author: martin bryan aguas
title: Five Stars
content: excellent case!

author: DJ
title: Great case for the price
content: I've only been using this case for a couple of weeks, but so far it has been great.  The fit is excellent, and the sleep/wake feature works perfectly.  Only time will tell how durable the case is, but I am very happy with it.  I can't imagine why anyone would spend the $$ for an Apple case when this is virtually the same for a fraction of the cost.

author: Garman
title: Great case, fits perfectly
content:
I bought this one to replace one that the cover had worn out after several years, this one has fallen apart after 5 months.
Vendor send me a replacement and it is great,  fits perfectly and very slim.

author: Amazon Customer
title: 5 stars
content: This case is perfect!! I was skeptical at first, because of the price, but I tried it on the ipad as soon as it arrived and it fits perfectly! It's sophisticated and looks awesome. Definitely recommend!

author: Cdiddy123
title: Cracked in 2 months - Poor quality and no warranty
content:
Case cracked in several spots within 2 months of ownership, despite no abuse, dropping, etc.  Just poorly made.  I contacted the manufacturer/seller for warranty replacement, but was told no dice.  Luckily Amazon's customer service made it right.

You get what you pay for in this case.

author: Ryan
title: Three Stars
content: The side starts to crack after 1 month's use.

author: Roxanne Craig
title: Buy it!
content: I bought this along with an Anker Tempered Glass Screen Protector to replace a Griffin Survivor case on my iPad Air because I wanted something less bulky, but I still wanted to protect my iPad.  I looked at several cases and read several reviews on similar products and I am VERY glad this is the one i chose! This is a great case...I absolutely love it! It was so much cheaper than the Apple version and works just as good in my opinion! I have found nothing that I do not like about it. It fits perfectly on my iPad. Great case for a great price! Buy it! You won't be disappointed!

author: KenC
title: Perfect Fit
content: I purchased this item to replace the cover that came with my used iPad. I’m really happy with it as the fit is perfect and the design is as good as anything on the market. I highly recommend it, and will buy more products from this vendor!

author: DJ
title: Three Stars
content: Nice case, but doesn’t hold the IPad strongly, slips a lot, which is super annoying 😩

author: Loriya
title: Five Stars
content: Love the color!  I have the lime green.  So far works great with my Apple Ipad Air!

author: Kari
title: Happy customer
content: Very happy with this purchase so far. My iPad fits in nice and snug,  and I like the way it feels.

author: Bruiser
title: The case seemed sturdy but it is almost like its melting apart
content: This case has gradually been falling apart since I got it. Two of the corners have completely came off, there is a crack across the back and coming from the camera hole. The cover flap no longer stays flat and the iPad will no longer stay locked into the case.  The case seemed sturdy but it is almost like its melting apart. It's never been dropped.

author: Jack W.
title: Slim and stylish
content: Very slim and keeps the form factor of the iPad. Cannot attest to its protective quality as I haven't dropped my iPad yet but it doesn't seem entirely protective, hence why I deducted a star. Although, in this price range you can't expect it to be a tank/shell!

author: jtaienao
title: Perfect fit for iPad Air
content: Product arrived as described by seller.

author: Stump
title: Cover for IPad Air 1
content: Exactly what I needed for my IPad Air 1.  Fits great!  Very satisfied.

author: Reviewing DWHE
title: Some good, some not so good.
content: This is an ok case. Unfortunately it was preceded by a case that snapped shut with a better magnetic grasp. My other case, however, was too bulky as it included a separate keyboard. The cover on this case is floppy, has a trifold cover, and cannot stand on its own. I probably didn't read that part thoroughly, so my fault there. The holes do line up with the separate function buttons.

author: munkeyhoots
title: Hard transition if you are used to Otterbox like case
content: This is a decent iPad case, but a bit flimsy. I previously used Otterbox cases so maybe that's why I feel this way. If you are an Otterbox user and thinking of switching to a lighter folio type of style be forewarned that it's a big transition. I just couldn't get used to the cover flap always getting in the way when I wanted to use the camera for taking photos or FaceTime. It also just felt flimsy (although much lighter!). It's really a personal choice, but for me I like to feel like I can have some grip on the iPad because, heck, that thing is expensive!

author: sheila cox
title: Love the Look and Feel
content: Seems to protect my iPad - with an added screen protector.

author: Leonel Dominguez
title: Ir is fine que brand new
content: Ir is fine que brand new, hpwever I had a similar case before and when left ínside the car in the sun, the lips holding the iPad tended to loose grip and the Ipad ended sliding off the case. I'll be more careful with this one.

author: Oktem
title: Very slim, functional and durable
content: Very slim, functional and durable

author: Akg
title: Good quailtiy
content: Its very good so far.

author: Michael A. Roman
title: A high quality choice
