content: Really love this case.  I can't believe how much I like it given its low cost.  It replaced a very similar but more expensive case that just didn't last long.  The cover is good quality and it is lighter than my prior case.  Buy one, you won't be disappointed.

author: cowpig
title: Awesome fit
content: Bought this for grandma fits perfectly, made her very happy!

author: Amazon Customer
title: Nicer then Apple original
content: Clicks in solidly (IPAD Air), better then the magnetic one that Apple sells, more protection with the wrap around case. Materials seem good.

author: Gabi
title: Good only if you're not clumsy and are very careful
content: This case is very nice if you're an extremely careful person and never drop your iPad, and you're looking for a nice looking cover. However, if you are prone to dropping things often like me, do not get this product. I dropped my iPad once while in this cover and the screen shattered terribly, which is an expensive fix. The plastic part around the lock button also broke after a little use, and the soft plastic on the back can easily get scratched. The bottom plastic part also cracked and broke off, causing my iPad to no longer fit snugly in the cover. Overall would not recommend this cover for children or clumsy people, it does not protect the iPad at all.

author: MichaelParrish
title: Good iPad Air cover for the money
content: Great case.  Customer service from JETech was great and quick to resolve a small issue I had.  Fits the IPad Air snugly but unlike some cases the secure hold doesn't require a crowbar if you opt to take it out.  Cover/stand holds the tablet nicely.

author: meekyung chung
title: Thin and lightweight protective cover that doesn’t hold your iPad secure!
content: This is my second order. The first one was for my niece and it was just what she wanted. I had a heavier cover with keypad for a long time and decided to go with your lightweight one instead. Well what I got looked used, it would keep my iPad secure as the iPad slipped out twice within the first few hrs. Also there was NO pen or stylis that you show in your ad.

author: Shahla
title: Very durable
content: Looks nice n is durable.

author: mzdxjx
title: Perfect Fit for my iPad Air
content: Nice replacement for my original Apple leather case.  Also much easier to keep clean.

author: Patrick Mugan
title: Simple and efficient
content: Does the job. Fits well and covers the screen nicely. I'd recommend it if you're looking for a light case that protects the screen.

author: Tommm.
title: Five Stars
content: It does not provide very much protection

author: christine
title: I really like how thin this ipad cover is
content:
I really like how thin this ipad cover is.  It's easier to put in a purse when it is this thin and it doesn't put a lot of strain on my hands when I hold it.
Delivery was very speedy.  Thank you.

author: Ariana J. Findlay
title: flimsy, broke on day two
content: the case broke in two separate places the day after I took it out of the package; because of this, the iPad doesn't stay in the case anymore. it also doesn't really stand the iPad up very well.

author: Cameron McFadden
title: Get what you pay for...
content:
Having an Apple case this one seemed to be the closest as far as design and protection without spending the upcharge for an actual apple case.

One fault it has is the hinge type design is much thinner and weaker than the Apple case. When moving or picking it up the front flap slides around, making me assume this weakness could potentially lead to it tearing at some point.
The inside of the front flap is covered in a soft suede-like material to protect the front of the Ipad. However, the inside is hard plastic, unlike the Apple case. This makes me uneasy as just placing the Ipad inside doesn't offer much protection for the back of the ipad.

All-in-all for $11.99 this case does a good job of mimicking the Apple case, but lacks in the durability and protection.

author: Diana Felker
title: Five Stars
content: Fits ipad 5.

author: Temptones
title: Lightweight and easy to use.
content: The cover was received the next day. It’s for my wife and she really likes it . The previous one was more cumbersome and not as easy to use. My opinion is that the PU material is far more functional than the faux leather , it is thinner, lighter and easier to carry and use. The magnetic sleep mode feature is also very nice. I would recommend this to anyone seeking to protect their IPad . I might get one for my Ipad Mini when my current one gets too beat up.

author: Diane King
title: It works
content: Good price, arrived on time.

author: CLCR
title: Not a Great  Fit for Apple Ipad
content: Look great, but wasn't a great fit for Apple Ipad, return and decide to purchased an Apple Ipad smart case ,

author: W. R. Wakefield
title: Avoid....at least the green version.
content:
A simple, inexpensive solution for how to protect an iPad Air, this is like 1/3 the price of Apple's leather smart case. Plus, you can wipe it clean with a damp cloth.  I was skeptical when ordered; now I'm a fan.  You can buy this 3 times for the price of the Apple unit which, being leather, looks pretty ratty after a year.
UPDATE:  We bought 2 of these, one black and one green and the green one has totally failed after a few months.  I don't know if it was defective or the colorants in the plastic affected it but it has totally failed, with chunks falling off...and after no abusive handling.  Of course at this price I suppose you could pitch it and buy another but that's not the point.  I WOULD NOT recommend this product

We reordered the same case and this one looks fine, just like the original one, but we don't know whether it will break in the corners like the first one did. Only time will tell.

author: R. B.
title: I ordered this case two months before Christmas for my ...
content: I ordered this case two months before Christmas for my son. When he opened it had a defect and the lid wouldn't lay flat. So Iooked on JETech's site and it said I was beyond the return window. So I contacted them directly and told them that I had bought it two months ago but it was a gift that just got open and had a defect. JETech then asked for a picture of the cover so they could understand what I was saying. After I sent them the picture they wrote me back and said they would send me another one. I recieved the new one about a week later free of charge and it fits and works perfectly.  Thanks JETech for making it right!

author: Jason
title: Great deal
content: Nice case. The folding piece takes a little while to break in. The magnetic closure is good, not as strong as Apple's, but good enough to get the job done.

author: William G. L.
title: Great fit
content: Fit like a glove

author: jwcbc
title: Better than OEM Apple
content: I like this case much better than the OEM Apple case (I have 2 OEM cases for my other iPads). I like the fact that it's one piece, protects the back, nice texture and durable.

author: CMS
title: Excellent case and cover for the price
content:
Excellent case and cover for the price. My only complaint is that the coating on the back case is starting to wear off in two places.

Update! I feel the need to update this review as I have noticed two cracks in the case despite having not dropped this product. One crack is at the top right where the power button is located and the second is at the bottom left corner. This should not be happening after five weeks of careful usage.

author: P. Vaidya
title: Looks good, fits perfectly!
content: The cover fits the IPad perfectly, and works fine. The product was delivered quickly, and packed securely. Very happy with the purchase.

author: J. Dillinger
title: good for the money
content: I like this slim cover and the fact that it protects both sides of the ipad.  But know you are getting what you paid for.  It's cheaply made, but I wasn't worried about quality as I use this only on occasions where I need to use it for presentations and want a lighter weight case.

author: Justin
title: Poor quality plastic
content: Fits iPad Air. Nice sleek design and the sleep/wake cover works as described. My reason for giving it only 1 star is because 3 of the 4 corners have cracked and broken off. Also the cover doesn't support the iPad when you fold it to stand it up. It doesn't stay upright like it shows in the pictures. I can't ask for much protection when paying $10.99 for something but why it starts falling apart it doesn't offer any. Save your money on this product.

author: Steve-O
title: This case is a poor protector of my iPad
content: This case is a poor protector of my iPad. The corners chipped off and after one corner chipped off, Isomehow banged a dent in the bottom corner. I don't know how, I'm not rough with it, I baby my electronics, and this case did me no good.

author: FLHRCI
title: Chinese quality all the way
content:
Bought this case to replace the original one that I bought one Amazon. This one is poorly made compared to the old one. The magnet is so weak that it does not stay closed if you have the home button on the right side while holding iPad in your hand..

The seems are already starting to get thin, will likely fail by Christmas.

For the price I did not expect much, and that’s what I got.

author: Kevin Mackin
title: Five Stars
content: Great fit

author: Rainah Daniel
title: Good product
content: Love the case fits perfectly. Only downfall I find a little inconvenient is when the flap is opened to the back. If it's completely flat it turns the screen off. I have to keep it like the picture to make sure it doesn't turn off.

author: Engr1000
title: Corner protection is minimal.
content: Nice, light case with a good feel about it.  It has a surface that helps in holding it, not slippery but not rough.  However, the corner protection is thin, just barely covers the corner, and the iPad looks very vulnerable.  I would not recommend it.

author: kkh
title: works as advertised
content: We have had the product a couple of weeks and it does work as designed.  It seems to be well made, so hopefully it won't have to be replaced.

author: Consume and be Happy
title: Already the edge is broken after a month of almost not using the ipad!
content: Already the edge is broken after a month of almost not using the ipad!

author: Amina
title: Worst purchase ever
content: I bought this product two weeks ago for my brand new iPad Air. But I am very disappointed with my purchase. Instead of protecting my device from accidental damages, the back cover holders just crashed the display when I dropped it. Now, I have a new iPad with crashed display.....

author: Hopey
title: Love love love it
content: Just got this ... Fits beautiful and love it‼️

author: Monty Gordon
title: Great buy
content: I like this case. Appears as sturdy as the more expensive cases. I love the red.

author: E. Lucas
title: Already cracked
content: The price was good, if you don’t mind throwing it away. My iPad rarely gets used but the plastic backing of this case has cracked in 2places. Time to discard this one and get something better.

author: Bryce J Cox
title: Perfect for adults who are very careful with their iPads anyways.
content: Great little case for the money. Fit and finish is very nice. This particular iPad doesn't leave the house nor is it used by any kids therefore a great deal of protection wasn't necessary. This offers just a small amount of protection for those once in awhile type of brain farts but primarily just something to cover the screen while not in use. Folding it to make a stand is quite nice too!

author: James
title: Great case that's as good as apples.....
content: Great case. Better than the original Apple case at a fraction of the cost. Great seller who ships quickly. I highly recommend!!!

author: Frank Musco
title: great fit, good quality
content: This is my second case from JETech, last one for my iPad 3 and this one for iPad Air.  Both are very good quality and the fit for each is perfect. Very happy with this purchase, as with the last one.  If and when I purchase an iPad Pro, you can be sure I will order a JETech case.

author: Fior
title: Love this case!
content: This is a greatly priced, super light weight case. Great fit, soft material makes it easier to grip and not drop.

author: Sheridah Carpenter
title: Nice product!
content: Very lightweight.  My daughter loves it.

author: G.G. Miller
title: Exceeds expectations
content: Great fit.  Works fine.  I have not dropped it yet, so no comment in that area

author: Misty 6
title: Lasted less than 2 weeks
content: In less than 2 weeks one of the corners chipped off and left a sharp edge.  OK, I had dropped my iPad and the IPad was not dinged, but after one drop the case proved not usable,

author: Oscar
title: Great for iPad Air 1st Gen
content: This case perfectly fits the iPad air (1st Gen). The slim profile is exactly what I was looking for, protection without it looking clunky. The soft inside cover doesn't leave marks on my screen and the folding stand function works fine. Very fast shipping.

author: Amazon Customer
title: PURPLE
content: THIS CASE CHANGED MY LIFE! SO GOOD AND PROTECTIVE! I FEEL SAFE WHEN THIS IS WITH ME! PURPLE PURPLE PURPLE!

author: Amazon Customer
title: Great for the price!
content: This is my third case.  It is a great product for the price.  The only reason I did not give it 5 stars is that the corners tend to break after long term use.  I has my last one for over two years when the corner cracked and eventually broke.  I ordered another.

author: Tellie Seford
title: Excellent quality
content: I bought this as an economical replacement for an older iPad cover. For the price, I wasn't expecting something of such high quality. Honestly, it's better than the Apple cover that my boyfriend has, at a fraction of the cost. It fits perfectly, is "tight" around the edges, and the sleep mode works as it should. We shall see how it holds up in the long-run, but I couldn't ask for anything better for now.

author: Amazon Customer
title: Nice
content: Great

author: Sonny
title: This case is all i wanted in a case
content: I am writing this review to let you know how much i love this apple soft shell case.  There is not one thing i do not like about this product, it has lived up to everything i have heard and read about it. Wish I had gotten this when i first bought my i pad years ago. Thanks for the fast delivery.If I ever need another case i will be buying from your seller again, hopefully i won't being needing a new one.

author: Darrell
title: Not happy with the quality of this case
content: I've had this case for about 3 weeks and it's already broken! The hard plastic that surrounds the iPad has cracked and a piece is broken off. Not happy with the quality of this case!

author: kyle mathieson
title: Super simple and easy!
content: Fits perfectly on my iPad Air first generation. It will not fit other iPad Air models!! It’s easy to use and easy to put on.

author: Hilary A
title: Didn't hold up as well as I would like
content: Within 5-6 months of purchase, the top layer of the cover began peeling back around the corners. Did not hold up as well as I would prefer, and while it protects the ipad well from drops, I probably would not purchase it again.

author: Naomi May
title: Cover
content: Very nice. I recommend this cover to help protect your iPad.

author: Hermosa
title: Fits perfectly.
content: This cover fits perfectly and is what I needed. Slim and lightweight, it protects the device.

author: lynn
title: great case
content: great case , my son loves it for his ipad air

author: Jamie Tyler Waugh
title: Works as it should...so far...
content: Not much to say. It works as far as I can tell. Solid secure fit and it appears that it will protect the iPad really well. I have the iPad Air 1 that this is made for and it snapped together easily.

author: Jarred Payne
title: Case works great - no complaints
content: Case works great - no complaints - inexpensive and has 2 standing up options

author: Anna
title: Great case but not well built.
content: I’ve had this case for a few months now and I really enjoyed it. I’m starting to notice the seems are cracking already though.

author: J. Boswell
title: Good product
content: Thought I posted this already. Works great, as advertised, came promptly, excellent support from the company.

author: Jacob Stevens
title: Great product and service. One recommendation
content: This is a quality case. If I had one complaint it would be that there are only 3 segments on the Smart Cover which means that the stand function is only supported by magnets instead of the folds of the cover doubling over on each other like the last apply cover that I had, but for the price and service this product is great!

author: Kari Black
title: Great Product!
content: This case is exactly as described. It is sturdy, well-made, and the color is vibrant. I’m 100% satisfied with my purchase.

author: Elena
title: Like it but it doesn't help protect the ipad in ...
content: Like it but it doesn't help protect the ipad in the event of a fall. Take my word for it.

author: Katie Klinger
title: Five Stars
content: Excellent quality!

author: Carol
title: Light weight, but strong
content: I’m very happy with this iPad cover.  It feels good in my hands, it’s easy to take screen shots, and it appears to be very durable.. I got the bright red color, which is pretty and makes it easy to find my iPad.

author: Mima
title: Great for an inexpensive cover
content: Great cover for the price. Turns off iPad when closed. Padded inside cover top. Covers back of iPad, also. I’ve had the $80 leather covers. They wear out quickly. This one is inexpensive & can be easily replaced. I had it for two years before it ctacked, which was my fault. Recommend if you want a sturdy, inexpensive cover.

author: Juan Gutierrez
title: YEEEET!
content: Bought this for my mother, she definitely loved it, and was exactly what she was looking for! Slick design, very soft and comfortable to the grip of the hand. I love JETech, I've bought many things from them like cases for phones, screen protectors, computer cases, ect. What's not to love about a nice quality brand for the price? :)

author: Karen Barnes
title: Happy
content: I previously purchased a different case from a different seller. The case would not stay shut and my battery would run down. This case is what I wanted, exactly as described.  Great price!

author: Bowdrie
title: It fit the ipad as expected, but the corners ...
content: It fit the ipad as expected, but the corners are so brittle that they started breaking within only a few weeks.

author: Jo H
title: Great Product!
content: iPad cover fits my older iPad perfectly!

author: DennisB
title: ... case fit perfectly and seems to feel and work better than the official Apple case
content: This case fit perfectly and seems to feel and work better than the official Apple case.  Easier to plug the power connector in and to find the various buttons on the sides of the iPad.  Very good price for a very nice case.

author: NICHOLAS MILLER
title: Five Stars
content: Good this is  pretty good product I would most likely buy it again if I needed to. It's smooth and feels like some kind of crazy stingray skin or something

author: Rhino
title: Great solid case.
content: I like this case better than the one I bought from the Apple store years ago.

author: Will S.
title: Not bad but an annoying design flaw
content: It's okay for the most part. Only problem is that when I fold back the cover behind the device, something is triggering the magnetic sensor to lock the iPad. Just annoying but a nice case still.

author: Dennis L. Bauer
title: Works well
content: As described

author: S Khan
title: I loved it! it is similar to the apple store
content: I loved it ! it is similar to the apple store case

author: tshylo
title: Their "Fold" model is the one to buy.
content: I suspect that it works as well as other cases, and at an attractive price. However, the edges were uncomfortable when my iPad was held in the portrait position. I replaced it with the Logitech Fold and am extremely happy with the choice.

author: VansEI
title: Nice product
content: Fits very well, not obtrusive, good grip and function. If it holds up, I’d say perfect. Good price.

author: Sydney
title: zokay
content: Does everything you need a case to do.. but the prints on the front, they are there forever 1

author: chrissj
title: Fits ipad and is nice looking
content: It fits the ipad and protects it.  It's also nice looking.

author: Aspenexcel
title: Great product for a great price
content:
This case is perfect. Feels great and fits well. The magnetic screen unlock works great and so does the folding cover to stand the iPad up.

I can’t speak to longevity or durability yet. It honestly doesn’t get a heck of a lot of abuse.

I’d recommend this to friends.

author: Fernando Walls
title: The pruduct seems great. It has a great look and feel
content: The pruduct seems great. It has a great look and feel. I was positively impressed that this item has a liftime warranty after you register it. Thumbs up!

author: D. Weeks
title: Five Stars
content: Excellent Quality highly recommended as good or better than OEM case. Very Happy!

author: Mohammad Rizvi
title: Best case you'll find! Feels smooth too!
content: Love this case!!!! Especially the magnet that snaps the cover straight and flush with the back when fully open.

author: Porsha
title: Better than expected!
content: Love it! I have the the Apple Air and I am very happy with this purchase. It was fast and packaged great. The Smart feature works like a charm and shuts my ipad down when shut as it should,  the material is good quality and feels great and sleek. My favorite part is the back is protected and it does not have a cheap look at all! The PRICE IS PERFECT! I bought another for a Christmas gift!

author: Mitch
title: it's like the apple ipad cover but with the addition of ...
content:
very slim and light wieght. it's like the apple ipad cover but with the addition of a back cover. has a very good feel/texture to it as well.

the one thing that I don't like, same with the Apple ipad cover too, is that the folds don't really give you many options to prop up the device for hands free reading or propping it up to watch a video. i've only been able to get it to sit in two non-optimal positions. One is almost straight up and the other is slightly off parallel to flat.

author: Jane Johnson
title: This cover is just like the name brand
content: This cover is just like the name brand, but such a better deal. It is the second one that we have gotten we like it so much.

author: Laura Brown
title: Good solid protective ipad cover
content: Item is solid and protects the iPad well.

author: Pat P.
title: Five Stars
content: Perfect fit for my iPad air.

author: Sai Deepak
title: It all looks good with the images and ratings
content: Defective product. It's not manufactured to fit an iPad air properly. At least that's how my piece was. And they obviously do not care to check the quality of what they are sending out. It all looks good with the images and ratings.. Totally disappointed that I have to ship this back and get something else.

author: Paul Harmon
title: Great case!
content: Great case.  Perfect fit.  Will be looking for more colors for my iPad 4, iPad Air and iPad Pro 9.7.

author: Dorothy Gillman
title: Five Stars
content: This a update to a previous review, the product is a great fit but it does not last.  The retention corner plastic has broken on  3 sides and will not keep the i pad secure,  The i pad did get dropped 1 time from my lap to the carpet but you would think it would be able to with stand that impact.  I have a case similar to this on a mini i pad that has been on there for 2 years and thought it was the same one, obviously not.

author: oMaMori
title: Perfect case for iPad Air no other choice
content:
Looking great and feels good.
This iPad Air will be my last device for Apple experience.
Man JETech case make this iPad Air into looking great device.
Price, design, and performance good good good.

author: BB
title: It’s a great product it keeps your iPad safe
content: It’s a great product it keeps your iPad safe

author: LURO
content: It actually does NOT fit the iPad Air. That is to say, the camera hole is skewed. You can't take pics when the case is on.

author: Park person
title: Nice inexpensive case.
content: The case is exactly as advertised and was about 12% of the cost of the Apple equivalent that I was replacing. The original that I bought with the iPad got very beat up very quickly and was around $80, so I think this will be at least as serviceable for for less money.

author: Patty Ross
title: Very pleased
content: Much better quality than the last one that I purchased from another seller.

author: Toby
title: Perfect Fit
content: Purchased this to replace my old worn iPad Air case. Fits perfectly. I like the wide opening for the headphone jack. The previous model was too small which required removal of the case. Texture feels good and solid. Recommend and would buy again

author: Dragos Bratasanu
title: Perfect and beautiful
content: It matches perfectly the ipad and is light and beautiful. Perfect I'd say

author: Kindle Customer
title: Exactly as described
content: Exactly as described

author: Richard L. Martin
title: Excellent - As Advertised!
content: Excellent Product. A PLUS!!!

author: Tyler King
title: Two Stars
content: Breaks way too easily.  Can't reccomend.

author: Rhonda
title: Great buy!
content: Exactly what I wanted.

author: Waukesha04
title: Solid case for Ipad Air
content: The case was just as expected. I like that it shuts the Ipad off and turns it on when you open it. I haven't had any issues at all. Can't beat the price.

author: Amazon Customer
title: Perfect fit & protection
content: Perfect fit

author: dwhaga
title: not much padding
content: I purchased the black case which shows lots of finger smudges.  also, when I set down my iPad there is a audible “thud” which sounds as if no case is present (so not much padding in this case)

author: Cleide da silva
title: Perfect!
content: Just loved it!light weight,brilliant color and so cute!and protects my iPad as I expected!and the price is the best..you can not find one like this around for that money!

author: Michael B.
title: Very good
content: This is a matte black, very slim smart case. Just what I’ve been looking for. There’s not much protection if you happen to drop it, but I mainly wanted it so the sides of the iPad aren’t so slippery.

author: Daoud Oudo
title: JETech case
content: Good quality as expected, I bought black and I think gray color is better but I still happy with my selection.

author: Shawn
title: There are better "cheap" cases out there.
content: Perhaps if it doesn't get much use it would be okay, but I use mine every day and there was a clear coating on the back that gives it the nice texture that it has, within two weeks that started coming off and it would leave flakes of it behind on a table for example..  Also I do take my iPad out of its case regularly and the corners didn't hold up to that, two of the corners after 3-4 months were broken.

author: HWALKER
title: Lightweight, Fits Perfectly, and Seems Durable
content: This is a very nice case for the Apple iPad Air 1st Edition. It fits just right. It is also aesthetically pleasing and not bulky. I chose the color black. My only criticism, and it is a minor one, (wish I can just take a half-star away) is that it gets a little smudgy on the back panel.  I will see how it holds up in terms of durability-- in the months to come.

author: K. Matthews
title: Poor Quality, Avoid
content: Shocked at how many positive reviews this gets. I actually bought this case twice in the last several months thinking the first one I got was a fluke with so many positive reviews. Both cases cracked at the corners with everyday use and no drops within the first week. Honestly, cracked doesn't do it justice. The corners chipped off day after day until the point the current case won't even clip on and hold the iPad, and to the point where it hurts to hold since the corners are so jagged.

author: G.I. Guerra
title: I am very pleased with this purchase
content: I am very pleased with this purchase.  It is a very nice looking case and it fit perfectly. I am planning to buy another one.

author: Mary Henderson
title: Love thecase
content: The case fits my iPad Air perfectly.  I looked at the Apple brand case, but just didn't want to spend the money!  This one is great, and you can't beat the price.  Would order again in a heartbeat!

author: Lahde Dah
title: Sharp looking
content: Sharp looking and functions very well, especially for the price. Looks almost exactly like the ones from Apple only much less expensive.  Recommended.

author: c4victor
title: Just the right balance
content: Great product  - tolerances and fit are very good.  Material is a soft touch feel with magnetic contact working consistently.  Good color choices on screen which are accurate in real life. Also does not increase overall weight too much...a great product for a very fair price.

author: Coleen H.
title: I love this, I got it in grey and it ...
content: I love this, I got it in grey and it compliments my silver iPad Air perfectly. It's light and thin and the quality is good. It's easy to manuever because it's not bulky. I have no complaints.

author: Lakay
title: Two Stars
content: Edge breaisveasy

author: Rochelle Lang
title: Super Happy
content: Love, love, love this case. Light weight, exact color as described, and the best part is that my iPad automatically shuts off as soon as I place the cover over the screen. This case is no longer available for my iPad Air in either the Apple Store or in the Verizon store, so I was beyond ecstatic to find exactly what I wanted via Amazon.

author: Eli
title: Wonderful Case!
content: Amazing case! Fits perfectly and low cost. Absolutely amazing how wonderful this is. Works like a charm for my grandpa!

author: Julie Chung
title: Great for the price
content:
I have used this case for a couple of months now. I have only ever bought cheap cases (usually <$10) which has led me to buy quite a number of cases in the past due to their affinity to breaking. However, this case has held up the best. I will update this post to reveal how long it lasts.
PROS
-- is not bulky
-- great price!!
-- strong magnet on foldable sleep/wake cover (meaning when you prop the iPad up using that foldable over, it stays put unlike some cheap ones that collapse easily)

CONS
-- none to speak of yet!

author: Ángel Armando García Pons
title: Perfect
content: Awesome

author: Runnergy
title: Fantastic case and cover for iPad Air 1.
content: This case is amazing. The finish on the back cover is the a matte coated with great grip. The cover turns on and off the iPad. It only has a trifold design,but has no problem keeping the iPad up even sitting on my coach. I highly recommend it. Way over exceeds my expectations.

author: Amazon Customer
title: A good protective case at a nice price
content: Looks & feels good!

author: David Kempfe
title: Exactly what I wanted
content: Great fit

author: cari
title: Sturdy case, lightweight
content: Quick delivery and nice product (very light)

author: Robert F. Valente
title: Great Case, Great Price
content: I used this case to replace the ageing Apple case I bought when I bought my iPad a few years ago because the Apple case completely came apart. This case is designed exactly the same as the Apple case and it is about a third of the price of the Apple case - great value! This case functions perfectly- the sleep mode works great and it looks and feels like my old one, only newer and while not heavier, just more substantial. I love it! Highly recommended!

author: Cousin Vinny
title: Felt and looked nice but corner cracked unexpectedly
content: Have had good experiences with JETech products. This one felt and looked nice. However, after using for a little over a month, the upper right hand corner by the power button cracked and a couple small pieces of plastics came off :-(

author: Donald Fitzsimmons
title: Great Quality for the Price
content: Awesome case. I've purchase more than one for various iPads. The quality is really good for the price. It feels like a true Apple accessory.

author: KyleW
title: Easy to break the plastic corners around the buttons
content: The corners break easily

author: Ana Perez
title: Love this case!
content: This case is so bomb. Sleek, soft, and look amazing on my iPad air. I especially love how it completely covers my entire iPad unlike my old apple case although it still looks super sleek and thin, but now protected. Got mine in red :) Love it!

author: MAWEILAND
title: Light and pretty
content: Light to hold but does the job. Bought popsocket and they hold to the back.

author: Carolyn
title: It’s a great red!
content: Perfect fit for my I pad and loved the fact that you gave me exact details so I would mot make a mistake in my order

author: Kelli
title: Good case..
content:
I was a little hesitant about this case because of the price. I thought it would be flimsy but I was wrong. I've been using the cover for about a month  and it has not disappointed.

The fit is snug and the openings are in all the right places (for speaker, headphone jack, buttons, camera etc). I'm satisfied with the level of protection as I have dropped my iPad a few of times (not from a high distance) and there are no traces of physical damage. I use it every day, mainly as part of my job so it gets hauled around a lot and the case is still in great condition. Also, both the front and back of the cover are matte, which is great since that means no unsightly fingerprints. I've spilled stuff on the cover as well and it wipes off with tissue or a damp cloth.
The front flap is magnetic as advertised and does come in handy when I use the iPad for Netflix or Youtube and the Auto sleep/wake feature does work. I have the purple and it is as gorgeous as displayed by the seller.

Will be purchasing another one and recommend it highly.

author: BMG
title: Good product
content: Works great for our needs

author: DAS
title: Exactly as expected
content: Only owned this about a week, but it works great so far.  The sleep mode function works.  The case is very light weight and seems sturdy.  And the stand works well.

author: David M.
title: Excellent
content: Excellent as advertised and very reasonably priced.  Quality is top-notch and it fits perfectly.

author: Cristina
title: Not as described
content: I've had Apple brand cases on my other iPads so if I compare them to this one, this case feels very poorly made. The sleep/wake closure does NOT work. I am most disappointed about that so this case will be getting returned. It is not worth $15.

author: Dazyruz Alpha
title: Muy buena
content: Le queda perfecta a ipad air gen 1

author: jw320
title: Good fit. Good quality
content: Good fit.  Good quality.

author: randy shelton
title: This is the best iPad air case you can buy
content: This is the best iPad air case you can buy. Not only does it have every function my apple case does it has more. I have had it for one month and I could not be happier with my purchase.

author: Tiffany Reed
title: Color not as shown
content: Shipped quickly and fit well but very disappointed because color pictured was Tiffany blue and actual color was powder blue I would not have ordered that color

author: J P Thomas
title: Okay, but nothing special about this cover
content: Bought for my husband.  He likes it, but the cover is made of a hard plastic and seems a little warped.  It took a while to get it snapped on. A place for his stylus should be nice.

author: Paul Locke
title: Great low cost iPad case
content: The original case for my iPad loosened up to the point that it would no longer turn the iPad off when it closed.  The new $11 JETech case works just fine.  It was delivered within 2 days as promised.

author: Mike Maro
title: Review
content:
This case is great. Seems well made. The only problem I can see and it's a big one is that the camera hole does not line up.
I was going to send it back but decided to keep it. What I did was to drill out the hole and make it a little larger. All is good.

author: Jordan
title: Great case
content: For the price you can't beat this case. Fits perfectly, looks as good as the Apple case I bought 2 years ago for 3 times the price.

author: Darveshg
title: One Star
content: Had to travel couldn't replace it. came broken at the top

author: BethOz
title: Very Durable. Nice Cover.
content: Perfect replacement to the flimsier one I had. This is much more durable and rigid. Since they've gone to a 3 way vs 4 way fold they don't hold the iPad up like they used to, but this one seems to work well. I'll followup if anything changes. Very happy with purchase.

author: smiley_girl5
title: Definitely good value for a sturdy product
content: Works and fits well so far, nothing special. Definitely not worth spending the extra $30-$50 on an Apple brand case, in my opinion. I actually ordered my last iPad case from this company, and used that for almost a year before upgrading. No complaints; the iPad was used often and regularly thrown in my backpack and showed almost no signs of wear.

author: Mummer
title: Lifetime Warranty
content: Great case and I like the feel when using the iPad

author: Family of Five
title: Great value, material, design, and color.
content: This is a really good value.  The case is a perfect fit for my iPad.  It is identical in shape and design as the Apple leather case (I paid $99 for that new), but costs about 10x less.  It is a plastic/polymer case, but is still soft, but a little bit stiffer than the original leather case.  Overall, I am very satisfied with the purchase and my iPad "looks like new" again!

author: Amazon lover
title: Well made and exceptional customer service
content: I will be truthful and say I ordered the wrong case.  My ipad is a pro not an air.  The case slightly covered the camera lens.  The company was exceptional with their customer service but due to the fact my credit to be received was minimal, I am keeping the cover.  It is well made and does fit the ipad but just barely covers the lens though.

author: Fountain-head
title: Should be advertised as a Temporary case.
content: Awful, flimsy, case that ended up in bits ... despite only being unfolded on the arm of my favorite couch.  Literally never moving more than 12” for its entire lifespan.

author: Jimmy P. Tucker
title: I like
content: this is raw second review I've wrote, I like it

author: Bob Allen
title: Great protection
content: Case was very sturdy and fit well

author: Brittany R.
title: Great product, seems to be high quality and good ...
content: Great product, seems to be high quality and good value for the price. The fold back front isn't as flexible as the Apple version, but for the price it's great.

author: Sara W.
title: Nice case for ipad
content: This ipad case works well & doesn’t add much bulk.

author: Xin Zhou
title: A perfect case for iPad
content: a perfect product, I appreciate their good job on making such amazing case for iPad Air, I am using it everyday and no complains, when I bought something like that, should appreciate manufactory's hard work.

author: Mario
title: BAD PRODUCT!!
content: The hole for the camera and flash partially covers the flash resulting in photos with a shadow. The construction was careless in the specific need of iPad air. BAD PRODUCT!! DON'T BUY IT!!

author: Madhu
title: Very delicate...
content: Very delicate plastic is used... won't suggest it...

author: Cathryn Gomes
title: Ipad
content: Product is great

author: Robert
title: Percfect
content:
A very well made, well fitting thin, book cover style case.
Fits the 1st gen air perfectly.

author: Amazon Customer
title: Only expect a few months of life
content: Lousy.  The plastic frame breaks even with careful handling.  I take very good care of my devices, so this case never had any kind of impact, yet it cracked on the top and bottom of the right side edge.  This morning I noticed the top crack and a couple of hours later it broke while in my hands.

author: gene F. Cole
title: Perfect fit
content: I was afraid I couldn't get a new cover to fit my older iPad, but this is a perfect fit.  I hope it lasts as long as my last one

author: Dennis Bowsher
title: Five Stars
content: Looks nice an works well.

author: Enid K.
title: Good case--lightweight and convenient sleep function
content: Good case--lightweight and convenient sleep function. After several months, the corners cracked and the case was not secure on my iPad. With lifetime guarantee, the seller replaced quickly without hassle. Great customer service and once again, enjoying my case cover.

author: Amazon Customer
title: Great buy!
content: Great peoduct

author: Lindsay Mitchell
title: Four Stars
content: It works very well....Replaces one I have for nearly 2 yesr..

author: Pamster
title: Color
content: Love the color and design!

author: Head
title: Great case/cover! Great price!
content: I just received this case/cover for my new iPad. So far I like it very much. It's light and seems to fit very well. It has adequate protection around the edges and all the buttons are easily  Accessible. It's comfortable to hold. I would recommend this case.

author: shepard
title: Brittle plastic?
content: this case was great for a couple of weeks. Then I started to see cracks in the plastic body forming and little pieces started falling off. After a month, one of the corner edges had completely broken away and the case would not stay on any longer. With all the positive reviews, it seems like I might have received one from a bad batch of plastic.

author: Brian B
title: Very good quality and fit!
content: Simple, good quality. Excellent replacement for my very well-used original Apple leather case.

author: elvis
title: ok
content: ok, for a cheap case. but it broke in less than a month and my ipod kept sliding out.

author: EspressoMan
title: Broke within 2 weeks - do not buy
content: Broke within 2 weeks. I did not have time to place a complaint before my 30 day window and now I cannot return it.

author: MaryAnn L.
title: Great iPad case
content: This case is excellent, lightweight, easy to put the iPad into, it has the wake/sleep feature, and easy to set up in 2 Heights.  I really like this cover, and would buy another in a heartbeat, if I needed it. I'd recommend to anyone look for a great iPad case. I'm glad I found it on Amazon...the price was excellent, too.

author: Thomas J. Weadock Jr.
title: Highly Recommend
content: Performs as advertised and fits like a glove. My wife is very happy with her new case! Just as good as if not better than a similar Apple product and at a lower cost!

author: JR Stanton
title: Ok for limited protection
content: Nice, slim case, very lightweight, but probably would not protect from impacts very much. But, for screen protection and minor bumps, it's just fine.

author: Douglas Thorley
title: So far I like it and the price
content:
Just put it on today but it fits well and is not bulky. So far I like it and the price!
Well you really get what you pay for it is 3 months later and it is cracking and breaking on the edges, not good. I am concerned that the ipad might fall out of this cover!
Well Jetech, sent me a new cover, so nice, but it's just the same and after 3 days it is already cracking again! Darn I so wanted to like it.🤔

author: Eimeemie
title: I love this case
content: I love this case! And that's saying a lot because I've owned quite of few in my short years in this world. It looks premium, it feels premium, and it snuggles the iPad very well. I am worried, though, that since the case doesn't slip over the iPad completely, it will be more susceptible to scratches. But I guess time will tell.

author: michael
title: but the case is fine.
content: I thought that the stylist came with the case as shown on the website. I never received it, but the case is fine.

author: Amazon Customer
title: INSTRUCTIONS FOR AUTOMATIC ON/OFF COVER
content: First cover returned and second cover almost returned because neither would turn iPad off/on.  No  instructions accompanied covers! Last minute idea was CALL APPLE.  One minute solution:  Josh instructed to change lock setting to "on".  (1) SETTINGS (2)  DISPLAY AND BRIGHTNESS (3) LOCK/UNLOCK.  Lack of instructions cost both us and Amazon much time and money!!

author: Alida
title: it fit perfectly and I was very happy with it
content: I bought this case in early 2017. At the time, it fit perfectly and I was very happy with it. Unfortunately, it appears that the fit is slightly too tight. Within 6 months, the plastic around the perimeter of the case by the screen began to crack. Now, entire sections of plastic are missing and my iPad won't stay in the case. It was a good case while it lasted, but too bad the fit wasn't right.

author: J.D.
title: Nice at first; poor quality over time
content: I really liked this product at first, especially for the price, but in 21 months it is CRUMBLING. I barely take my iPad out of the house, I’m the only user, and I use it gently (never once dropped it), but still this case is just absolutely falling apart as if someone took a hammer to it. It’s cheap in cost and in materials. If you want something cheap to cover the screen while not in use it’s not bad, but this is NOT a viable protective case.

author: R. Adams
title: It still works just fine, but it seemed to be a bit less ...
content: I had a corner snap off after a couple of weeks of use. It still works just fine, but it seemed to be a bit less durable than I was hoping.

author: Dave
title: simple, grippy, great fit, great value.
content: simple, does not slip in my hand, and fits VERY snugly to the iPad Air.  just what i needed for a slim case, and at a very low price!

author: Amazing Iceman
title: Good quality case, slim and light.
content:
This is the third case I buy from this maker. This is a slim and light, good quality case.
Will protect your case against scratches and bumps, but may not protect it against high impact.
That's no problem for me, as I don't want to get one of those cases that will make my iPad thick and heavy.

author: Amazon Customer
title: Fragile materials.
content: This seemed like a great product at first, but after a few weeks I noticed the corners were broken mad cracked. I figured I must have knocked it around some, so I bought a second one. Within a few weeks again the corners were broken and cracked, and I was certain I had been more careful. The plastic that the back is made of just isn't strong and/or flexible enough - the stress of simply holding the iPad caused it to crack and break. By the time I got a new one (this time shelling out a for an Apple brand smart case) the iPad would occasionally fall out if I didn't hold it carefully enough. Very disappointing.

author: Max
title: works great on our older iPad from 2014
content: not expensive and works as well as one we bought originally at Apple store

author: fuel2u
title: Ordered, received and used
content:
As advertised.  Fits the iPad Air like a glove.  Auto shut off and on works great.  Seems to be quality built.

Fast delivery and it well packed.

author: Jolene koehler
title: Ipad case
content: It's fits great. I lIke a lot. Thanks.

author: marco
title: Four Stars
content: Ok for the price

author: ryleemax
title: Good, but could be better
content: Overall so far so good. It is a basic cover similar to marware. Only issue I have has is that when folded and propped up for viewing or typing, there are no grooves for the folded cover to be secured into, hence the occasional falling over while in use. Not bad for the price.

author: Amazon Customer
title: Not the best but it worked
content: Floppy stand

author: H. Malbec
title: Great Color!
content:
I use this but it is not as hefty as I need. Great color.
Does not exactly fit without small surgery with exacto knife.

author: Bill T
title: Good product
content: This cover is much thinner than the last one I had which also makes it lighter. It is similar to the iphone case I have. It seems to work very well.

author: Kelli
title: Nice product, but the magnetic strip that should hold ...
content: Nice product, but the magnetic strip that should hold it closed are not as strong as I would like

author: Klb
title: Very pleased
content: As advertised. Lightweight, works great. Really glad I got it. They gave a great detail of what iPads it would fit. Got it in a day. Recommend this supplier

author: Aaron
title: Five Stars
content: Works perfect. Great price

author: Lori Kopyar
title: Poor quality plastic
content: I wonder if most folks write their reviews when they first get a product.  At first, this product worked as intended and if I had written a review, it would have been good..  However, after a month of very minimal use the plastic case that actually holds the iPad, chipped on three of the four ends.  Now the case doesn't really hold the iPad and is, essentially, useless. I know the case didn't cost that much, but it should last longer than it did.

author: slor83
title: Love the 💚Green💚
content: Looks & feels good. I'm replacing it with a $80 leather Apple iPad case. I'm disappointed in Apple that I paid so much when I could have just bought this.

author: John
title: Four Stars
content: Camera Hole doesn't align correctly.

author: R. Marsden
title: no protection on corners.
content: Not durable enough for me on the corners.  Initially I thought it was the perfect case but the hard shell back is too brittle.  If you are hard on your device and it is dropped frequently, I don't recommend.  I've already broken out two corners in two months.

author: Timothy Fairbanks
title: Case
content: Awesome

author: Angel
title: HIDEOUS COLOR !!!
content: The color is hideous in person. It would work as a normal case to protect your Ipad against scratches. I would not recommend this to anyone that's looking for a cute case.

author: ivanka vinaga
title: the quality is perfect and the color is grate
content: I received the item in time, the quality is perfect and the color is grate, dive fit properly but I gave only 4 stars because the back of the cover is covering a little bit the back camera, and when you make the pictures from the right side have like a shadow from the cover on each picture.

author: Michael Sigmond
title: Ideal case for iPad Air.
content: Fits perfectly.  Feels really well made.

author: Glenn
title: Great value and high quality
content: This fits my iPad Air 1 perfectly.  I needed protection for my iPad Air 1 and I saw this on Amazon.  The front cover folds back into a little triangle that allows my iPad to stand up on its own.  I'm glad I got protection for my iPad Air 1!

author: TracyC
title: Cracked in less than a month.
content: Ordered Oct 2 and now Oct 26 the case already has a crack in the corner (maybe it was there when I received it and never noticed). I only use my iPad in bed to read, so how could that happen? Fit is okay, but the magnet isn't very strong. The magnet doesn't hold it up well when in the prop position. Disappointed in this purchase.

author: Carol T
title: Snug but opening for camera is misplaced
content: I had to create a larger hole to the side because the camera of my iPad was partially obscured by the case.

author: Michelle
title: Only lasted 3 months, order this instead.
content:
Was not a good fit, ended up cracking, order this one (Zeox) instead: https://smile.amazon.com/gp/product/B01AFRSHZM/ref=oh_aui_search_detailpage?ie=UTF8&psc=1
The ZEOX is 10x better quality and fit. I'm super happy with what I replaced this JETECH one with. The JETECH would gave been ok, but it never fit properly, even though it's advertised as made for iPad Air. The Zeox fits perfectly, has a better overall feel to it and is all around a better product.

author: Anne boris
title: Securely holds iPad
content: Replace my old thick leather case. I like that this on is thinner and doesn’t seem like it will break down like the leather one did.

author: Heather
title: Bright purple and slim
content: I really like this product. It is light weight and fits perfectly. It is easy to put on my ipad. I love the bright purple color. I like the magnetic top. It arrived fast and in great condition.

author: Alonso F.
title: Five Stars
content: Fits perfect

author: Beanjapan
title: Good quality. Not as great as apple case
content: Good quality. Not as great as apple case, but certainly a great bargain and far better quality than I expected. Has also held up well.

author: random_user
title: Too Good To Be True
content: You get what you pay for, I guess. I bought this in December and 4 months later in March, it's already broken near the volume switch and has various chips and cracks in other places. Guess I'll pay a little extra for a better one.

author: L. Beyerle
title: Just a nice light weight cover for my iPad
content: Just what I was looking for, no bells or whistles. Just a nice light weight cover for my iPad. It protects the back and the closed cover puts the iPad to sleep. It does not come with the stylish pen that it shows. I don't no why they even show it.

author: Retspin
title: Don't waste your money on the grossly overpriced Apple branded cases
content: Don't waste your money on the grossly overpriced Apple branded cases, this one is great and it seems durable enough to last a long time. I have bought several cases from different brands for my iPad in the past and I have found this one to be the best of all of them.

author: Pablo Jimenez
title: Great product
content: Nice durable case it protects my ipad in all corners and the magnet on the lid is a nice feature to keep it closed

author: daniel
title: Good for ipad
content: Fits like it should

author: MsMe
title: Not for iPad Air2!!!
content: I purchased this case for my iPad Air 2 and did not realize that it was not compatible.  It fits the Air 2, however the cut out for the camera is not accurate, so DO NOT PURCHASE IF YOU ARE LOOKING FOR A CASE FOR THE iPAD AIR 2. Despite that, the case works just fine.  It works as a smart cover and shuts off the iPad once you close it.  The black color is very nice and it cleans very easily.  I only gave it four stars because the interior portion of the case is light grey, not black, as I wanted. Other than that, this is definitely a product that I would recommend.

author: Ajax
title: Great Smart Case Cover
content: Fits great and looks very attractive. It arrived in 3-days!

author: Tom
title: Great for an older iPad.
content: I got this because the Apple cover I bought nearly 6 years ago finally wore out.  I like a cover because the iPad without a case is slippery and can easily be dropped.  I didn't want to spend a lot of money because I believe the model I have is going to be dropped from support in another year or two.

author: james pomarole
title: Good value for money’s
content: Fit product like a glove

author: Love
title: LOVED IT
content: AMAZING. Simple, matte, and cost effective! I love it, just buy it. If you're looking for a simple case that is sophisticated looking and won't burn a hole in your wallet, this is the iPad air cover for you. Just do it already! Click purchase! I looked around for a couple of weeks until I found this.

author: Trena Girouard
title: Good cover, good price
content: Cover fits my IPad Air really nice. It isn’t bulky which I like. If you bought the Air then you want your cover to protect but also not make it heavy. I like that you can use it to tilt your iPad just a little. So it’s just right for sitting at the kitchen table.

author: Claudia Council
title: Great case for iPad
content: Received earlier than original delivery date.  Great case for iPad.

author: Sheila M.
title: Good for light protection, but a fail otherwise...
content: Cover is sufficient for light protection, but if you expect it to support the iPad in any upright position while working on the iPad then keep looking beyond this cover. Very disappointed though as the folding cover does not provide nearly the support for the iPad as indicated, I spend more time propping the iPad back up than not and the quality isn't there that I expected after reading the reviews. Glad I didn't pay any more than I did for it and still on the fence on returning it only because I'm not finding much out there for the model of iPad I have.....

author: Ashley Norman
title: Only had it a few hours, already ripping.
content: Just arrived today and I put the case on my iPad, and already there's a tear in the flappy stand part. Super disappointing, my old version lasted for like 5 years, this one is already broken :(

author: Katia Gresh
title: Very Nice
content: Very nice product - I like that it allows me to prop up my iPad so I can take notes during class. I picked a lighter blue color and I've had it for a little over a month and it's starting to get dirty - this doesn't bother me much but if it would bother you I recommend you get a darker color.

author: T
title: Five Stars
content: Great product

author: Missy Gail
title: Great case for work
content: Sturdy functional case!

author: R. Demir
title: good case
content: awesome case for my new ipad air. i like that the cover folds over so i can use it as a stand to watch netflix. the case also locks the ipad when you cover it

author: lmb5
title: Great price, high quality.
content: Great iPad case, exactly like the Apple Smart Cases/Covers, for a fraction of the price. I don't notice a difference at all from the Apple brand. Will see if it lasts over time, but so far I am happy.

author: goodinta
title: Fits fine
content: The item fit fine and the magnetic cover works fine

author: Fritz
title: Easily cracked corners. Would not recommend.
content: The plastic seems to be a bit too hard and brittle on its backing, did not hold up to cracking and splitting, especially on the corners. I tried to reach out to the vendor but did not get a reply. I've had many ipad covers before that were much better, and I guess one gets what one pays for. would not recommend this cover.

author: PC
title: Ipad air case review
content: Received this a couple of days ago. So far, its great. Great color and lightweight. If it protects when I drop the iPad, it will be perfect. Hopefully, I won't be testing this feature!

author: Kindle Customer
title: I have to work a little with it to get ...
content: I have to work a little with it to get it to stand up, but it fits my iPad perfectly and protects well.

author: David Donofrio
title: Works great
content: Case works and fits great. Only had it for 2days. Hope it lasts.

author: MG
title: Works well at price point
content: Works well for the price... the clamshell design is a little bulky especially compared to the original Apple Smart Cover. But at this price I like this cover and would buy it again (but I assume it will live longer than the iPad!

author: Renee
title: The sleep/wake up feature works well and it fits nice and snug
content: The sleep/wakeup feature works well and it fits nice and snug. The biggest problem - it constantly falls down!! I would not recommend this product.

author: Thomas Vitaz
title: Cheap!!
content: It was just what I was looking for, but the Corners are cracking off after only less than three months. Once I put my iPad in, I never took it out and never dropped it. The corners are breaking off arbitrarily.

author: C. Burdett
title: Simple but excellent case. Thin and unobtrusive
content: Simple but excellent case.  Thin and unobtrusive, which is what I wanted, but it should provide good protection.  Very fast shipping and good customer support (I had to return a cased to get the correct one).

author: KimmyC
title: Just as good (actually better) as my expensive brand name iPad cover!
content:
I wasn't sure about the quality of this case since it was pretty cheap (it was $11.99 when I bought it) but it had good reviews and I decided to try it (and would send it back if it wasn't good). Surprisingly it is indeed a really good case for my iPad Air. I had a purple case that we bought originally with the iPad at BestBuy for $45 so I thought this one for less than $12 couldn't possibly be as good as that one, The old one was a brand name that I forget now, but this one is just as good as that one, and actually better since I like that it has little grooves that allows it to stand alone and my other case didn't have that. This case isn't as thick as the other one, padded,  but I like that it's thinner actually. The other case was a bit bulky for my likes. This case will power on and off the iPad with opening and closing of the cover as my more expensive older one did and it's overall just really a good iPad cover. I gave my iPad Air to my husband and thought he may like black instead of the pretty purple one I had on it haha, and I am glad I went with this one!

It was easy to slide my iPad Air into and all cutouts are just right for camera etc. I also picked this one because there's no frame around it that holds it in which I saw some others. Those with the frame seem to have issues at times as it sometimes blocks things on the screen (according to the reviews I read) such as a sensor that is able to detect when the light in a room is dimmer and therefore the iPad display will brighten or lighten accordingly. The case is easy to wipe off if needed and doesn't show oily or greasy fingerprints like my old case did so I like that about this one too. I couldn't find anything that I don't like about it so it gets 5 stars!

author: Judasdog
title: plastic chips in corners
content: I don't feel like I'm rough on my stuff but this case has chipped and pieces of plastic have broke off around the corners by the volume and on the bottom near the left corner. It still works fine and I won't get a new one until this one won't stay on anymore. I just try to leave it on most/all of the time. For the price, it does its job.

author: Amazon Customer
title: Buy this one!
content:
I've had a number of iPad covers. This is absolutely the best designed and excused cover.
Perfect!

author: Edith Smith
title: BEWARE!  You get what you pay for!
content: This case arrived timely & looked good but the hard plastic corners broke off within 10 weeks making the cover useless.  I've emailed the seller direct since it is over the 30 day period for returns (how convenient for them) and will update this review when I receive their response.  I would NOT buy from this seller again if they don't satisfy my issue.

author: Amazon Customer
title: Do not buy
content: We have had the same simple keyboard case for four years and never had a single scratch on this iPad. One day after replacing the case with this one, the entire iPad has shattered. We purchased this as we needed something a bit thinner for travel and literally had the iPad in a cushioned section dedicated for an iPad in a backpack and only moved it from the bed to the carpet to load up the next day. So frustrated and disappointed that a simple lack of shock absorption in this case caused our iPad to completely bust.

author: Gary Mitchell
title: Not great
content: Feels cheaply made and does not offer very good stand angles. It is also sensitive to fingerprints. I originally had the case that came with my iPad, so maybe I’m just spoiled but that was all leather and of high quality. This is basically a case (no pun intended) of getting what you pay for....

author: Loc T.
title: Good product
content: Fit perfect with my ipad aiir

author: AENMom
title: Does the job
content: Customer service was excellent.  I received the wrong size and was able to quickly get the correct size.  It's not as sturdy as my old case, but it does the job and holds the iPad in the protective case.

author: Keven Vicknair
title: Inadequate protection for iPad Air 1
content: Doesn't protect the edges of the iPad so ultimately a useless cover and I need to purchase a better one. Maybe made for iPad Air 2 definitely not for iPad Air

author: Carol R
title: Not Great...
content: This is an unfortunate "copy" of the Apple iPad cover, with one huge difference.  The cover on this product has only three folds instead of four like the original.  The three folds don't stay in place so it's difficult to get the cover to support the iPad upright as it's supposed to.

author: Jon Curwen
title: Fine Replacement Cover
content: Rapid delivery, as advertised. Apple's confusing iPad naming system may be reason camera does not align with opening. May be my bad for misreading listing and ordering incorrectly.

author: TN
title: Seller worked hard on my behalf to make sure I was happy!
content:
Very satisfied customer - I ordered this case understanding the old saw: "you get what you pay for". The case arrived quickly and a small portion of the frame around the iPad broke as I installed the case!

I didn't go all crazy, I simply explained my problem to the seller. They bent over backwards to replace my item and got a new one to me in no time flat.

IMHO, integrity and commitment to your customers are at least as important as your products in the long run. I have my new case and it's working fine - & I am left feeling like a valued customer. 'Nuff said.

author: jamestream
title: Five Stars
content: Fits perfectly and has nice feel

author: Sharpli
title: Great Service!
content: No problems. Case fit exactly and order arrived on time.

author: Susan Egbert
title: I HIGHLY recommend you choose a different case.
content:
All of the corners fit my iPad Air except one (the top left corner). I worked for a while to get it to fit. Finally, when I applied a little pressure to the top left corner it cracked the glass of my ipad screen. VERY frustrating.

I HIGHLY recommend you choose a different case.

author: Antsy
title: Bent my iPad
content: This is the second JETech case I bought for my iPad Air. The old one was getting worn down after a year and a half of heavy use and the plastic near the power button also just broke off on its own after a year. I thought it was a great case, looks nice, magnetic lock works, stand worked when placed on hard even surfaces so I would've probably rated that 5 stars. However, this new one I got, I had to almost force my ipad into because it didn't easily click in like the old one. And now I see that the iPad in the case looks bent as shown in the picture and I'm afraid to try and get it out, out of fear that I'll bend it even more trying to remove it. So while I think it's still a good looking case, with great functionality, I feel like they either changed the design dimensions slightly or I got a defective product. Now that I'm looking at the most recent reviews, I'm thinking I got a defective product from a bad batch, as there seem to be some recent complaints, but there are also a lot of great reviews.

author: Toad
title: This is my second one. The 1st one I ...
content: This is my second one.  The 1st one I had for a year and dropped my iPad.  The casing broke but my iPad survived.  Works as advertised

author: Bailey
title: Case Fits Well, However The Condition It Came In Wasn't Great
content: The case fits well on the iPad but upon opening it I noticed the case was out of the original bag and the protective foam was laying on the opposite side of the box. The first thing I noticed on the actual case was a small tear/rip on the top of the case and upon further inspection the bottom corner was severely bent. The case fits well and is easy to stand up, but the packaging was flimsy and the condition of the case is much less than what should be expected.

author: hunter_z
title: Very good product.👍👍👍
content: Received my order today. I love it so much. Slim and light weight. Perfectly fit of my IPAD Air first gen.

author: Thomas Cook
title: great
content: great

author: StElmosFire
title: Four Stars
content: A present for my wife, She really likes it.

author: Petein SONJ
title: Five Stars
content: Great case -- even better than the Apple original for the Air (easier access to controls). Highly recommend

author: Andy Casper
title: Great case and perfect color!
content: The case color is accurate to the photos here on Amazon and overall the case is great!  More than that, the company is quick to respond to questions and concerns.

author: Conrad E. Haas
title: IPad Air Case
content: Exactly fit my needs.  The blue color is very beautiful.  Lucky me.

author: Miguel_R
title: Quality for a great price!
content:
What a great case, fit my iPad Air perfectly.

The case feels sturdy and build quality is high.

Great item for a great price!!!

author: Sharon A. Groh
title: good quality, great price
content: Thank you!  The new cover for my ipad air is working just fine.  Reasonably priced and easy to use.

author: Kindle Customer
title: iPad Air case,JETech cover for Apple iPad.
content: I like your cases I do not order any other product now they are quality products, durable.  I probably wouldn’t have ordered another case but I bought another iPad. If I could I would order all your colors to switch to all the time.  As it is I ordered 2 more when I didn’t need to.

author: BMK
title: highly reccommend
content: Excellent product!

author: Stephani C
title: Frail and wont last long
content: Its made of cheap plastic which started to crack and break within a few weeks. I bought it in March and it is now late May and I have had to buy a different, better case. Although I am not a heavy ipad user, it's probably better for people who don't actually use their ipad very often at all.

author: Tattoo
title: Seems ok for price
content: Case arrive yesterday seems ok for the cheap price but how long it holds up reminds to be seen.You know that old sayin you get what you pay for.

author: Danielle
title: Almost perfect
content: Awesome product. Arrived fast, fit nicely, then I noticed that the camera hole doesn't line up so half of it is covered making the rear camera unusable.

author: MarioLeon
title: Five Stars

Original Review:
A really nice solid cover for the iPad Air.. love the texture of the case.. doesn't make it too bulky.. does a pretty good job as a stand.. Meets my needs.. Thanks for the good product..

title: but it does a great job protecting my iPad from normal wear and tear
content:
This is an elegantly simple case that works exactly as described. It protects my iPad from scratches and serves well as a stand for watching videos, or playing games, etc. It keeps a thin profile for the iPad. I'm do no think it would offer significant drop protection, but it does a great job protecting my iPad from normal wear and tear.

The materials is a sort of vinyl/plastic, but it's held up well. I am very pleased with this purchase!

author: Angel T.
title: Love love love

The cover does not stay connected to the back unfortunately so it moves around when you're holding your iPad but for the price, you can't beat this case! One downside is that the material of the back gets yucky (from the natural oils on your fingers/hands) but it can be cleaned easily.

author: pgood
title: Less than expected.
content:
Case is very thin and appears cheaply made. Outside of case is slick and a bit difficult to hold on to. Previous reviews state the matte finish isn't slick, but I definitely think it is. The case offers barely any protection and is primarily decoration. Considering the price, I still think I overpaid. I wouldn't buy again. Time will tell if it is as cheaply made as I fear. Case does fit the Air exactly and opening and closing the front flap does turn the iPad on and off as advertised, hence the 2 star rating.
Update. 2 weeks of use have shown this case is a POS. Plastic back broke near upper right corner, iPad no longer stable in case. This from daily use, not dropped or mishandled. On its way back. Now a 1 star.

author: Amazon Customer

author: SaraynaStar
title: It Was Better Than I Expected
content:
I was a little hesitant about this case because of the price. I thought it would be flimsy but I was wrong. I've been using the cover for about 3 months and it has not disappointed.

The fit is snug and the openings are in all the right places (for speaker, headphone jack, buttons, camera etc). I'm satisfied with the level of protection as I have dropped my iPad a few of times (not from a high distance) and there are no traces of physical damage. I use it every day, mainly as part of my job so it gets hauled around a lot and the case is still in great condition. Also, both the front and back of the cover are matte, which is great since that means no unsightly fingerprints. I've spilled stuff on the cover as well and it wipes off with tissue or a damp cloth.
The front flap is magnetic as advertised and does come in handy when I use the iPad for Netflix or Youtube and the Auto sleep/wake feature does work. I have the purple and it is as gorgeous as displayed by the seller.

Will be purchasing another one and recommend it highly.

author: Amazon Customer

I used to worry about the
Screen but w this very affordable item I’m worry free.
Our kid used iPad as camera first day we got it she was out in front yard. Yikes! Screen cracked! It was not having case to protect.

author: Pierre
title: Awesome!
content: For some reason, I didn't notice it included the "back" case as well, as I was very happy when I received it! I put my iPad Air in it right away, but had to remove it after a few minutes to check something, and when I put it back, it didn't sit in competely right—I had to fiddle with it for a bit, even remove it to insert it again, until I got it right. Otherwise this is just awesome. It's even sturdier (at least, it looks like it!) than the original Apple product that sells WITHOUT THE BACK and costs four times as much!

author: Melanie Wilson
title: Love it!
content: I can't believe how great this case is considering the low price! It's exactly what I was looking for. The pink color is a nice baby pink and the material feels so smooth and seems easy to keep clean. I also love the grey lining. Definitely recommend!

author: Dustin Barton
title: Everything you need and nothing you don't.
content:
Not that one more review is necessary but I have to say I'm impressed. I've dug through dozens of cases at the Apple store, at Frys, and at Best Buy and I did not find one that was as simple and elegant of a solution as this one. Furthermore, it's competition cost $30 or more. It feels great in the hands, it's super thin, and there are no rough edges.

Before this, I had a Dodo case on my previous iPad which was $70 and it was pretty classy (it was the same one the President had on his iPad) but the bamboo frame broke. Also, I don't want to be paying $70 (or $90 for the new multi-angle case) extra every time I get a new iPad. Who am I trying to impress?

One thing that was unexpected is that the microfiber interior of the screen cover is grey whereas in the photos it looked beige. I would have preferred beige but at this price point I can't complain. I could buy one in every color for the price of my previous case.

author: JC in CO
title: It looks and feels great. The cover makes a great stand - I ...
content: It looks and feels great. The cover makes a great stand - I love my red. I just wish there was some extra cushion around the corners for my occasional dropping but otherwise I'm very pleased.

title: Had to re-purchase but new one seems to fit better.
content:
This is a re-review of the product. I purchased my first one in 12-2016, and it started having problems within months (can't remember the specific time). By late 2017 parts of the hard plastic molded cover started chipping off, and sometimes my iPad would come out of the case.

The replacement that I received a couple of weeks ago is different. It no longer has to snap in place to hold the iPad (I think that is what caused the other one to crack and chip). It seems like a better fit. Hopefully it will last longer than the old one. However, for the price even the old one was a good value. I definitely recommend it.

Hard shell case is too brittle. A corner broke on one 28" fall onto a thickly padded carpet, so it would no longer fit securely.
Too much cover swivel because fabric 'hinge' is too floppy,

Positive: Truly lightweight. Hard-shell case had a very precise fit (until it broke).

author: ChicagoBrian
title: Great case, but a weird hinge.
content: Great value, nice feel, good fit. My only issue (and this may be for all cases) is that when holding it in the open position the iPad tends to drop downward while the cover part that is now folded back stays put in your hand. This causes a twisting of the "hinge" part. When you open the cover and fold it back on itself the cover stays straight in your hand but the rest of it twists and pulls downward.  This may be because there isn't a hinge on the case, but rather a flexible cover that's attached to the hard plastic back. So it's just like a piece of firm fabric that wraps over from the back to the front and doesn't provide any stability from twisting in the "hinge" area.

author: Amazon Customer
title: Exactly what it should be.
content: Product arrived quickly and as described. Quality appears to be very good and is a solid alternative to the Apple branded cover. The back is a little plastic-y but the front flap is perfect. Customer service reached out via email three days after order arrived to check if item was received and if there was anything that could be done for a better experience. Very satisfied, would recommend seller and would order again with no issue.

I don't even have to remove it to use the camera feature because all the openings are in the right place.
