The only thing missing is the option to rotate the device to portrait. Of this I was aware in advance and it is not such an important feature. Otherwise I am very pleased! And the prices is great.

author: steve
title: Nice. Stylish!
content: Came quickly,very happy with after 5 days!

author: K.
title: Great Case to Protect from Light Wear and Tear.
content:
MY EXPERIENCE WITH THIS CASE
I've ordered this case three times now, so I am definitely a satisfied customer. It fits closely to the iPad and doesn't add much bulk at all. I dislike bulky cases whether for my phone or tablet. I mean...what's the use of the newer models getting sleeker and slimmer just to plop on a huge bulky case on them that makes them look as if I am carrying an older model anyway?  The magnetic snap close feature is wonderfully efficient and inconspicuous. I like that it shuts off the screen upon closing saving precious battery life.
Previously,  I had cases that required an elastic band or button to snap it close. Yuck.

WHO THIS CASE DOES NOT WORK BEST FOR
This case is NOT for those who are usually rough, tough, and/or clumsy with their $500 pieces of technology. This case will not protect your iPad from 5 to 6 foot drops on hard floors. This case will not protect iPad from outright carelessness. This case will not protect your case from unruly children bent on destruction.  What this case does protect your iPad from is: major to minor scratches; short drops (less than 2 feet) on carpeted floors; and dirt for the most part.

WHO THIS CASE WORKS BEST FOR
This case is for the usually gentle and careful owners who want to keep their iPad looking like it's right out of the box and only have the occasional mishap where it may slide off the bed or couch onto a floor of fluffy carpet.

ONE CON FOR ME
The only caveat to this case for me is how dirty the inside of the front flap can get after a while. You have to keep cleaning it or get a new one when it gets too dirty.

author: The HackMan
title: A pain to use
content: I do not like this case at all. It snaps onto my iPad so tightly that it's nearly impossible to take off. The most annoying part of this case is that, if I tuck the cover underneath the iPad while using it, it abruptly locks the screen at unpredictable times. Then I have to unlock the screen to get back in. I will be looking for a better cover.

author: CY10L
title: Pink is not bright pink, more dust or rose
content: This is husband’s account. I bought the pink. It’s not the bright pink I thought, more of a dust or rose pink but I still like it.

author: Marc Kashinsky
title: A lightweight snap-in case for an iPad Air; at a very attractive price!
content: This case certainly does what it says.  It fits easily but snuggly around my iPad Air.  I just got it and am giving it a try, I hadn't realized that the iPad snapped into the case so repeatedly taking the iPad in and out a lot would probably not be advised and, I assume, would loosen the fit.  Otherwise, it is very light in weight.

author: Amazon Customer
title: Great case for the price
content: The case looks great and works great so far. It's very thin, protective enough against scratches although I don't think the case will protect against a significant drop. The openings for the buttons are thankfully large enough that fat fingers don't get in the way of operating the iPad. When it's on display mode, the iPad is pretty sturdy and won't tip over. Overall for the price, it's a really solid case.

author: Andrew Ewing
title: I loved the case at first and it seemed like a ...
content: I loved the case at first and it seemed like a great value until the first time my iPad slipped off my lap. It fell from about a foot and a half off the ground and not only did the hard shell of the case crack but my iPad was damaged as well. I understand this is no otter box but the way this case is designed leaves all edges of your device exposed. I have since bought a Fintie case that covers more of the iPad and think it's a much better solution with the same functionality

author: Michael Harris
title: Incredible value!
content: This case replaces my leather Apple iPad Air case ($80), which my dog recently used as a scratch pad. Ouch! The JETech case isn’t made of leather, but is similar looking and very durable, with all the essential functionality of the Apple case. It’s an incredible value and highly recommended.

author: MSgtRet
title: No complaints
content: Works just like the one sold by Apple

author: VIC722
title: Nice..
content: Received the product promptly. Installed it on my Ipad immediately. FIT ABSOLUTELY PERFECTLY within a micron of an inch! Nice...Thank you Amazon. Very happy.

author: Jadon piha
title: Great iPad Case!
content: This is a great and protective product for my iPad. It is not that magnetic though so it is not that strong while standing up, but it still stands and you just have to turn the case front into a triangle and then push your iPad back and it works fine. If your looking for something that has a stronger magnet do not buy this product. This case is well made and I completely fell in love with it.

author: Elizabeth T. Frederick
title: Better than the one I had before
content: The iPad cover I bought is great. It fits my ipad perfectly and is heavier than the one I had before. It is well worth the money I paid for it. And I got it a day early.

author: Steve Sawyer
title: Color not accurate representation
content: I like the product, but the color was not accurate.  The image was teal but the actual item is a baby blue color.  I would have chosen another color had I known.

author: Patrick McElyea
title: Case Cracked my Screen
content: I’ve been using JETech for a few years. The case I had for about 3 years finally broke so I ordered a new one to replace it! The one I received didn’t fit. The case was so tight that my iPad got stuck in the case. The pressure from the tightness of the cases caused the screen to crack. I am super annoyed with JETech.

author: MJ Bokhari
title: The Worst!
content: Worst product! This is the second one I bought back to back because the first broke so quickly. It didn’t take a few days for it to fall apart as well.

author: Dan N.
title: Decent case ... cracks at 4mo of use
content: Had it for 4 months and the corners of the plastic are beginning to crack, particularly where the case connects to the power button and the aux connector. This is after moderate use for college, in and out of backpacks and etc... otherwise it's a decent product for what you pay for.

author: David
title: Good Product, Accomplish with everything it's supose to do.
content: Good Product, Accomplish with everything it's supose to do.

author: Furrnace
title: Good case, good service
content: This is a great price for a great product! The case had a crack on the corner and the plastic had broken around the power button cutout. But I contacted JETech and they promptly replied and sent me a new replacement free of charge. Good service and product. I recommend it if you need something to cover the back as well, and want a minimal look while still looking sleek.

author: Dave
title: Plastic corners broke soon after started using.
content:
The plastic that covers the corners of the iPad, cracked/broke soon after I started using this.
This is without dropping it or abusing it in any way.
After one year of use both of the corners near the side that folds, had completely broken out, preventing the iPad from staying in the case.
I sent an email to tech support, and was told that my case was a few days out of warranty, and that they would not provide a replacement.
If you buy one of these and have a problem with cracking of the plastic, contact tech support right away, and you might get a replacement.
If you wait like I did, you will be out of luck.

Other than the broken plastic, I like the design, and will buy another one to replace it.

author: Gene
title: Buy this or any JETech case
content: The best case on the market at the best price. Light weight, perfect fit, looks and feels great.  I have bought several of these covers for different iPads and all were just what I wanted.  You can pay more, but you won't get more.

author: pardjoy
title: Looks Good
content: Love it. Works great, looks good. What more could you ask for?

author: Lydia P
title: Good product
content: Not the best quality but covers my iPad well. The stand holds it up well, the magnetic top stays, and the auto sleep/wake function works great. The corners are covered too.

author: Jacqueline Jenkins
title: iPad Case
content: Fits the iPad Air nicely. I love this slim case. I would recommend this product!

author: James W. Edwards
title: Love this case!
content: My original Apply cover was deteriorating so I looked for and found this one. I wished I had used it earlier. Very nice design that protects your iPad well.

author: M
title: A good but not great case
content: Bought this for my aunt.  Works great.  Fits fine and was easy to install.  Sturdy material but feels rubbery to me.  She loves it but I would prefer something with a better tactile feel.  Prefer leather cases myself.  Looks like it would be easy to clean.

author: KD-D
title: Beautiful color, fits perfectly
content: I don't know yet if it's durable, but it looks well-made. I love the red color, the price was right. I think I would order this again.

author: Booklvr
title: Five Stars

author: Antonio M. Pruna
title: Excellent case
content: Fits my iPad perfectly.  Nice looking and provides adequate protection.

author: M. Neubauer
title: Functional and inexpensive
content: This case replaced my failing, but expensive, Apple front cover. I also had a clear rear snap-on cover. This single unit gives similar protection for about 1/4 the cost of my previous solution. While the back has a pleasing feel similar to the Apple unit, the front has a decidedly cheap plasticy feel to it. But the magnetic on/off function works fine, and it gives me a decent grip, and protects the screen. The trifold front also works slightly better than the original Apple unit, mostly because it's attached to the rear instead of magnet to the side. Bottom line, cheap and functional.

author: Jaime Fernandez
title: Great value! Highly recommended!
content: I've purchased many iPad and iPhone covers over the years and these have to be some of the best no better value between quality and price.

author: Sharon Ptashek
title: Broke after 1 week of usage

author: AbbyL

author: Norman Graewe
title: Seller is highly recommended
content: Quality, weight, color!!

author: Deadpool1
title: nope, nope, nopitey nope nope.
content: i hate this case, i hate this case so hard. actually im still mad at my husband for buying it for me. this case is crap.

author: Rustam

The case is a beautiful blue color, not quite as green as pictured. It is of good quality and pretty much as I expected. I think it will offer good protection for the corners. Went on easily. I am a happy customer.

author: eastcoast

Sometime the rotation on the iOS gets stuck... not sure yet if there is a gyroscope problem or software problem, but the problem corrects after you power off and then on again. Would buy again!

title: Defective glue on cover

author: Rajaa
title: Great product great price
content: My son loves it !

author: Tom

author: Sheri Ketarkus

content: Just received this and my new iPad Air. So far so good. Only improvement I'd make would be a way to close it more permanently (like a snap).

author: Alex
title: I love this case and it looks so good on my ...

author: Portia
title: Five Stars
content: Fits perfect!

author: Curtis "Bear"
title: One awesome case for your ipad,  half the price!
content: Love this case!  Fits so pefectly and the color Red looks awesome against the white ipad. Protects my ipad Air perfectly and the front flap securly stays shut when not in use or closeAir all hole and openings are the right spots. Thanks for a great product at an awesome price Jetech!!

author: Tiffani Murphy
title: GREAT PRODUCT, BUT disappointed in color.
content:
I received my iPad Air Case today (December 2nd) via Amazon Prime. The shipping was fast and my package arrived in A+++ condition. PRO: I was very impressed with the quality of this iPad case. It looks very similar to the Apple iPad cases, only this one is a fraction of the cost! I like how the back cover has a hard texture to help protect the iPad. I actually thought it would have the velvet feel like the Apple case. I like the backing on this case better. I like how both the back and front offer a positive grip with its matte, smooth surface. It's soft to the touch and definitely will work in protecting the iPad. The interior has the feel of a microfiber flannel protecting the iPad's glass from scratches. There is hardly any bulk added to the slim device.

However, I will be sending this item back. I was disappointed in the color of my iPad Air Case. According to the picture, the case looked like a vibrant, bright purple. Instead, I received a very deep, dark purple. This was not the color I was expecting for the price I paid for it. I plan on purchasing another case in a different color (blue). Hopefully the new case I purchase will be the EXACT color as pictured on Amazon.

author: Brian
title: Great JeTech Case
content: Another great Jetech IPad case. This is the second case that I have purchased from JeTech and they both have been very high quality and very nice looking. They fit and function perfectly and you can't beat the price.

author: M3
title: The case fits great except the camera hole partialy blocks the view
content:
The case fits great except the camera hole partialy blocks the view, I had to open it with a file.
There is a thin foam layer on the inside of the cover, the color should black to match the case yet it is beige.

author: Brian E. Forschner
title: Great product. Fits perfectly.
content: It was the exact size I needed and came quickly.

author: Beachgal

The small outline access to the power button seems prone to break, but it does not affect the functionality of the case.  Just bought two more.

author: Tom

author: John P. Szafraniec

author: Shawnb2
title: Close But Not Quite
content: I have purchased their products before and liked them. This one is just off the mark for me which is why I only gave it 4 stars. I know this model of iPad is getting to be on the older side so companies have moved on to the new and more current stuff but I have 2 marks that I was a little disappointed in, one more than the other. The lesser of two issues I have is the felt liner inside. It just doesn’t feel up to the standards of other cases I’ve owned even in the same price range. The felt is very thin and not very soft feeling as I’ve experienced with other brands. It’s still fine and I’m sure does the job, but it is a small mark in my book. The bigger issue of the two is the magnetic cover and the auto wake feature. The magnets are very weak and it doesn’t always wake the screen much less keep the cover closed like it should in what little bit of use that I’ve used it since I received it.

author: JOHN HASTINGS

author: Nonrev902

content: I went to Best Buy a couple weeks ago and purchased a very similar cover for $40 and was not pleased at all! I promptly returned it and purchased this JETech case for $11.99 for my Ipad Air (1st gen).  It worked great and was a perfect fit! Very pleased with this product. Way to go JETtech!

author: Amazon Customer

author: J Di

The smart magnetic closure is a good feature to have also. I've seen similar products in stores for several times the cost. I was amazed how reasonable this case is, more so when I received it and found it to be of such a good quality.  I'm quite happy with it and happier I didn't have to spend a lot to get it. Highly recommended for your iPad Air.

author: mean tina
title: iPad case
content: Great iPad case.  Works great.  Shipped fast.

author: J. Clover
title: Solidly built.  Has the feel of a book, but it is also great in landscape mode.  Well worth the $.
content: I mostly use my iPad in book-type mode, and it is perfect for that.  It has the feel of a book.  It also is easy to use and works well in landscape mode.  Solidly constructed.

author: Dave

content: When the original Apple case wore out, I didn't want to pay their price again so this seemed like a good substitute.  It has worked out nicely so far and has all the original functionality at a fraction of the price.

This is my second JETech Case - for a new iPad Air.  Great quality, terrific price, fits as well as the $40 Apple version. I've had good luck with durability; the JETech Case I bought over a 1 year ago for an iPad Gen 4 has outlasted the Apple case I previously owned. Couldn't be more pleased. Thank you!

Update: 3/26/16 - I had a problem with the new one; it cracked within a few weeks. Problems occur and it's how the vendor resolves them that will make or break the experience. This vendor was very responsive and sent me a replacement at no charge. You can feel confident buying this product.

author: myoreo

Stand in a good angle  for me to watch video on my iPad, but one thing I don't like that much is  sometime it is not firm/magnetic enough for the triangle shape to hold the iPad, it just will fall down on the surface. Other than this, everything is perfect for this case.

content: I liked this because it was lightweight, but it is really a pain to hold. It’s slippery and easy to slide out of hand, which makes me very nervous. The cover is made of some strange material that allows every fingerprint to stay on the case, making it look dirty. I have been using this case for about 4 hours and I’m ready to take it off. I keep having to clean it, but nothing actually removes the fingerprints.

author: BeautifullyInc83

Fits my 1st Gen iPad Air like a glove, the quality is impeccable, the color is EXACTLY what I wanted and the shipping was fast and efficient. The sleep/wake function of the cover is a +. Highly recommend this case to others, you won't be disappointed!

author: Thomas

content:
I purchased this version specifically because I was looking for all black.

I had another model that had a grey cloth interior and it would show dirt. When I received this case it too had the grey interior, not the black interior shown in the picture and video.

author: Carole
title: Nice Fit
content: The cover is working very well for my IPad. I am pleased with the product. Seems to be a good choice.

author: J. Ross
title: Good company to order from
content: Product fit my daughter's tablet as promised and it came with a paper that stated if it didn't fit they would replace it and a number to call for the replacement.  I was glad to order from a company that cared about whether or not the product fit the ipad properly.

content: As expected. Fits well

author: Amazon Customer
title: perfect fit.
content: Snapped right on, perfect fit.

author: Amazon Customer
title: It was ok. Not very robust. I just ...
content: It was ok. Not very robust. I just dropped it once by mistake from a 2 feet distance to the ground, but the edges were broken. Has to be handled carefully.

author: Kathleen Dutra
title: Good value
content: Pretty color and very nice material. Looks like the leather one I got from Apple.

author: samnme
title: JETech iPad Air case
content: Have been using my new case for several days now and am completely satisfied. Everything is as described and fits perfectly. Recommend this case. I had a case from Apple and it fell apart. This one is more substantial,so I am expecting it to last, but with a lifetime warranty there should be no problem.

content: Provides good protection for the iPad Air.  The cover is more slick than I expected which causes it to slid on smooth surfaces; it is harder to pick up with one hand but otherwise, it is a well-fitting cover and gives the iPad a nice look.

author: Ahmet Oncu

author: Novasystems

author: Justins Are Cool

content: Fits really well - snug and tight and the cover closes well.  Excellent value for the money.

author: Linda O.
title: iPad Air case
content: After learning that there is a difference between an iPad Air COVER vs. iPad Air CASE, I found that JETech had the perfect one. It arrived quickly and fits the original IPad AIr. It was 80% cheaper than the first one that I purchased.

author: K S
title: Nice for the price!
content: I like the design of this case.  I only wish there was a pouch inside for little notes, contact numbers and addresses etc. My previous case  had that and I used it often.

author: pocholo torres

content: The holes for the volume and lock button make it difficult to press without having to slightly reach with fingers.

author: CCNev
title: I Need Not Have Worried
content: The originally-purchased Apple case for my iPad Air was worn out and is no longer available for purchase from Apple.  I was concerned because the JETech case is so much less expensive, but I need not have worried.  It fits my iPad Air perfectly.  The access slots (camera, on/off, earbud port, etc.) are all correctly located, and provide more useable access than did the Apple case.  It is a little stiffer than the Apple case, i.e. not as "rich" feeling, which may indicate a little lesser quality of materials.  But who cares!  The JETech case will probably last longer than I have use of the iPad.  And if not, I can still buy two more JETech replacements and not have spent as much as I did for the original Apple case.

author: bettaFan
title: Very Nice Item!!
content: Would highly recommendl!! Great for protecting and using with your Ipad.! love it!

author: Kathy Heselbarth
title: Convenient
content: Convenient

author: S. ward
title: Not durable at all.
content: I've had this case less than a year, my iPad spends 90% of its time in my briefcase, and it's already falling apart.  Corners of the plastic are brittle and coming off so at this point it's offering screen protection but zero drop protection if it lands on any of the corners.  Seeing as its lived in a protective compartment I am very disappointed in the lack of durability even for 10 bucks.

author: Seyed K.
title: It looks and fits perfect
content: I absolutely love it it is a slim and Fits perfect

author: Jeremy Lindsey
title: Works great
content: Fits perfect, goes in easy, feels good when holding it and seems to provide good protection (haven't dropped it yet or anything). When it's folded back all the way (flat on the back), it's started to stretch the seam a bit, so the cover is not square to the iPad itself when I have it open. When it's closed, it is perfectly square and stays that way. I just have a little OCD kick in as I'm holding it to take notes and draw (with stylus).

I was surprised to find it had a back (the "official" version just covers the front and connects to the IPad with a magnetic spine) and I find that is nice feature. The IPad fits snugly into the cover and is comfortable to hold. Like the Apple cover, this one folds to support the IPad like an easel. Nice solid base. This is an excellent buy.

author: Jrob

author: M. S. Kubota
title: Worth about as much as I paid.
content:
At a quick glance it's a nice looking cover.  The finish for the most part is smooth and even.  But upon closer examination it appears to be relatively cheaply made.  The rear of the hard shell has a nice uniform finish, although mine arrived with a chip/blemish in the rubber coating near the camera hole.  The rubber coating on the shell is actually a little slippery so don't expect to get a lot of grip out of this.  The inside of the shell is hard plastic with no lining of any kind- not a shock at this price point.  The edges along the border where the shell meets the screen are a bit rough and unfinished in some parts so it's not the cleanest look.  The iPad fits fine- snaps right in and the holes for everything (camera, mics, etc.) are close enough.  It feels very secure.  The folding cover works as it should, locking the iPad; and the fit is also good here.  The outer plastic on mine looks like it separated a bit (or never molded quite right), but it's not a big deal.  The inside lining seems like it will protect the screen from scratches.

In all, it's worth about the ten bucks I paid- maybe even a bit more.  But it's nowhere close to the quality of the Apple covers.  For me, it was a cheap experiment and I'll probably just breakdown and buy the Apple cover.  After all, we are talking about a $500+ piece of hardware.  Not a bad deal at all- just know what to expect!

author: Jeremy Mulder
title: Price. Protection. Value. A Story of a Case's Life Well Lived.
content:
When my original Apple Smart Cover for my iPad Air finally ripped, I began looking for an alternative case/cover combo that would protect my iPad, look just as good, but hopefully cost just a fraction of the price. I came across the JETech iPad Air Slim-Fit Case, and decided that I couldn't go wrong for the price. I ordered it, not sure what to expect.

The case arrived and I pulled it out of it's nondescript packaging. I was immediately struck by how nice the case felt in my hand. I expected it to have the feel of plastic, but it actually feels more like a suede type finish, very similar to the Smart Cover that I originally had. It is smooth, but sufficiently grippy in my hand. The inside of the "cover" portion was made of a micro-fiber like material–again, just like the Smart Cover–that not only protected the display but also may have provided a similar "cleaning" effect as it moved around on the screen.

I put it on my iPad and was pleasantly surprised to find that it fit perfectly and added very little bulk or weight. A simple "snap" in place, and it was securely on. The cover closed exactly as it was supposed to, and the iPad woke up and went to sleep as I opened and then closed it again. So far, I was impressed.

The real test, however, was whether or not it would protect my iPad from my children, of which I have several. Would this case withstand their incessant thievery of my iPad, their greasy and grimy fingers as they unscrupulously tapped on the display to find the latest episode of "Disney Collector", or their propensity to drop the iPad every time they walked into the Kitchen? Only time would tell.

I don't recall when I purchased this product for the first time. Several days ago, however, I came home to find that one of my precious offspring had dropped the iPad on the tile floor. It was laying on the counter when I came home. A loving sibling of the guilty party was quick to inform me of the infraction, menacingly–even, perhaps, enjoyable–telling me that her sister had "broken the iPad". But she was wrong. The iPad was NOT broken. The case had broken. A small, corner had chipped off, and as a result, the case no longer snapped on to the iPad.

Nay, my daughter had not broken my iPad after all. In fact, what she had done was prove that this case had done precisely what this case was purchased to do: it had protected my iPad from what would no doubt have been a cracked screen, had the case not taken the blow on it's behalf.

I immediately signed in to Amazon, and bought another JETech iPad Air Case. If it protected my iPad once, it could do it again. When it arrived, the old one went into the trash can. Job well done, my friend.

author: Moohorns
title: Decent case for the money. Easily cracks if dropped however
content: Fits nice and snug. Very thin and minimal. Nice texture. Best cheap iPad Air case on Amazon. I should note that dropping it does fairly easily break the case around the buttons. First time I dropped mine it cracked. However, it is only $13, I cannot complain too much.

author: Elizabeth Chase
title: iPad cover
content: Orders wrong size. Easy return!

author: R2-D2
title: Dissapointed
content: Disappointed by the cheap material. My old case was much better and felt softer.

author: Andrew Zufall
title: Excellent value
content: This case is GREAT. Fits the iPad Air 1 perfectly and even fits fine while using a glass screen protector. Works just like the Apple Smart Case (closing it locks the iPad) for a fraction of the cost. The quality seems fine and it feels good in the hand. I really like that it covers the back of the iPad as well. Perfect for putting in a backpack or brief case and not worrying about scratching the iPad.

author: Bryan Wayne Harej
title: Perfect fit, works as advertised
content: Perfect fit, works as advertised,....soft leather like feel. I had purchased another brand in the past but it was no longer sold in Black on Amazon and gave this one a try.  Glad I did.  Openings and fit is great.

author: Jack
title: Good product. Does the job at a very nice ...
content: Good product.  Does the job at a very nice price.

author: Nathan Wright

author: IslandGirl

author: Armen Kirakosian
title: Great product for the price.

author: Trisha Almond

author: Ron
title: Ensure you are ordering the correct unit. Use the model number that is written on the back of the Ipad
content: I haven't had this unit long but, so far it looks  and fits great.

author: Kerri Carter

author: Dev B.
title: Good Case

it does an ok job protecting your ipad.
i own 3 ipad and they all have diff cases and after a few falls, this one holdup ok.
There some dents and scratches on the side were there's no protection, but the screen is still intact and working.

author: Cd
title: Looks good!
content: I bought this for a 1st gen iPad Air that my husband won in a drawing…assumed it was a 2013…not really sure as the box just says iPad Air. The cover works well except for the cutout for the camera. It's not fitting exactly…slightly off to one side therefore blocks the camera a little. Cannot really say if it's the cover or our inability to know what model of Air it is. My husband doesn't mind either way…he is going to make the hole slightly wider with a drimmel…should be fine. The texture & ability of this cover to protect seems fine. He likes the fold effect to enable the Air to stand up. It looks like an Apple cover but is slightly lighter in weight. Perfectly adequate for its intended use. For the price, I would recommend.

author: Kindle Customer
title: perfect product great service
content: Perfect in every way. No straps or snaps or bulk. IPad just snaps securely in and looks nice and reasonable price. It arrived almost instantly. The case is along the lines of the one I like for my kindle by poetica. For my purposes this is ideal.

author: Drjones
title: great protection
content: it fit great I felt safe letting my grandson hold my Ipad air.

author: Karen Mccoy
title: The Greatest Case Ever!
content: This iPad air case is the greatest!!  It performs as well and looks as nice as others I have seen for more than twice the price!  I highly recommend it to anyone needing a case!

author: templink

author: marilyn bara

author: olga

author: S. Weiser
title: Too fragile
content: I now have had several of these.  The first one lasted several months until I dropped my iPad--case did what it was supposed to.  My iPad survived the approx 4ft fall onto concrete--but the case broke in several places. Ordered another--the corners almost immediately broke off in normal use.  Ordered another--same thing happened.  So..in my experience, this is just too fragile.  Definitely a bargain price..but you get what you pay for I guess. On the plus side..iPad fit perfectly and this is very light.  Barely noticeable.  If they can make the corners stronger, I would order again, even at a higher price

author: chris
title: Just as described
content: Fits perfectly. Very sleek and not bulky.

author: Ellen
title: Case is okay
content: Case is okay, but not the quality I was expecting for the price.  Hopefully it will last a couple years.

author: Wayne W Weber
title: Five Stars
content: perfect fit

author: Amazon Customer
title: Five Stars
content: Great and Cheap.

author: Kindle Customer
title: Five Stars

author: Jonathan

Great case, perfectly fits my iPad Air. Features that i like:
1) Smart case - so iPad turns off/on as you close/open
2) Comes in various colors
3) Covers both front & back of the iPad

Under $10 the price would have been perfect. Giving this a 4 star as i bought this for $14.99

author: Amber

author: rvm4

author: jam

i purchased this case in january. i bought this jetech case because my previous case started falling apart and chipping at the corners. i was really impressed with initial quality & fit. the case has a nice rubberized feel and the microfiber protection for the display works well.
last week i discovered one of the corners had a 1/2 inch chip missing. yesterday another corner chipped off. i try to be pretty careful with my electronics, so i'm not sure how this happened. seems like this is a fairly common problem with the ipad cases. sure wish i could find something durable.

I can fix that with an emery board but I wish I didn't have to spend that time fixing what could have so easily been done during the manufacturing process.

author: Brian K.

Looking back I would have coughed up the extra $$$ and get one with more premium feel. Also b/c it's not made for the Air 2 my camera is slightly covered.

Pros:

Cons:

author: Don
title: Best Cover I have had
content: Liked the cover from time I first slipped the iPad into it. Good fit, really like the multiple tilt adjustments. It closes nicely and stays closed while being transported. I use it daily but only have only had it a couple weeks, but I believe it will hold up for a long time to come. It does not swivel to be used in portrait position but never use it that way anyway. Openings are perfect for volume, charging etc. Was worth the price, had one of the cheap covers but only lasted a little over a year.

author: Buyer

content: Looked a bit tight of a fit originally, but once it clicked in its the perfect fit. Replaced a prior worn out case and made the ipad look like new.

author: Pamela
title: Meh
content: This case was just alright. Color was as pictured and shipping was fast... I like to carry my iPad in my purse or backpack and I feel like this case does not offer enough protection. The back cover especially is cheap plastic that bends, which made me paranoid about my iPad bending with the case. Overall it's okay if you don't put you iPad in your bag. I ended up buying a Speck case for a little more, but it is definitely better quality and offers more durability. I feel you pay and arm and a leg for an IPad you might as well get a quality case that offers protection. I saw some mixed reviews about this case fitting the IPad Air A1567 and wanted to state that,This case DOES NOT fit Model A1567 iPad Air! I tried it on my bfs and the camera hole was off.

author: John
title: Stylish and Functional
content: Love the case. It protects my iPad just fine and gives it a clean, modern look and feel which was a big selling point for me. Love the functionality in terms of propping the iPad up. I have no complaints and am really happy with my purchase!

author: John Zappala

content: Was very disappointed with this movie.  Have loved all of his movies but this one disappointed...can't put my finger on exactly why but was not up to his standard

author: NZKIWINZ

This case fits like a glove and no one can tell that it is not the official Apple kind. The only downside is the magnetic stand thing does not hold perfectly. This is not much of a problem as it still works, I just think it might give out sometime. The inside is soft and gentle on the ipad, as well as the front cover smoothing away smudges. My last case (which was much more expensive than this) actually scratched the corner of my ipad, but I can't see that happening here.

All in all, it is a super affordable case that gets the job done.

author: Thao
title: Good value and great case.
content: Nice case and what I expected.  I was looking for as lightweight as possible and this covers the front and back without too much bulk.  I don't expect to drop or abuse my iPad, I'm not sure the case will handle it if dropped on a hard floor, but it's good protection for throwing into my purse without a lot of added weight.  I also like being able to fold the case halfway back in a triangular shape when viewing in portrait mode and using the case as kind of a handle.

author: Bob R
title: But it!
content:
Great fit and great quality. Can easily see why it is highly rated. Only wish there was a bit more texture on the back of the case, had a leather case previously and liked how it would not slide, this the plastic will slide but much better than most I have tried in the past.
Just buy it you will be very happy

author: PDitty
title: Dense back cover, more durable
content: This is a new cover for my old iPad, much better quality, thicker back cover makes this one really durable, thank you!

author: Robert R. DeVito
title: Great product
content: Ordered for my wife's Ipad air and she loves it.  It wakes the Ipad up upon open, nice feature.

author: rlyeaton
title: Ipda Air Case
content: Get slim design case to protect you iPad and have full easy access to use. Auto turn off feature keeps your battery use efficient.

author: Robert Fisher
title: Improvement over last case
content: Durability to be determined but suspect it will be very good.

author: MJO
title: Good product
content: Good product.  This is the second I’ve bought. First one lasted through lots of abuse

author: Sid
title: Good value
content: Good value

author: Amazon Customer
title: Love it!
content: This is a great, light weight, thin case for my iPad Air 1st edition.  The color was exactly as shown online.  Love everything about this case!  Highly recommend it.

author: Cinci
title: Nice case at a very affordable price
content: Nice case at a very affordable price. I cannot say anything about wear and tear as I have only been using it for 3 weeks. Nice product and it protects my investment

author: Tammy
title: I originally bought a really bad case for my iPad
content:
I originally bought a really bad case for my iPad, so I was looking around my classroom for better ones. A classmate gave me the link for this case cuz I really liked it.
The cover is smooth, looks fairly protective, and is pretty. I like the sleep/wake feature a lot. What I don't like is that the stand isn't sturdy and it sometimes unfolds, dropping my iPad.
Still is a much better case than the one I had before (Targus 360 view, not sure exact make/model) and www great for the price!!

author: Anthony Tatasciore
title: Lightweight and flexible.
content: Lightweight and flexible.

author: Ian Weeks
title: I was very disappointed in this item
content: I was very disappointed in this item. The corners cracked and broke very quickly and under very light use. Unfortunately, I would not recommend that other customers purchase this item.

author: Customer
title: Four Stars
content: Great

author: Jesmie
title: Research the IPad version to purchase the right cover
content: It seems like a better product than the original Apple cover I purchased. It has a shell for the back part of the iPad that snaps in. Make sure to research the version of iPad to purchase the right cover.

author: Amazon Customer
title: Simple Ipad 5 case that works
content: Had some trouble getting a case to fit. This worked perfectly out of the box. A simple great product, I highly recommend the Case Cover.

author: TS
title: Nice Airpad case.
content: Very good and sturdy case. Fits the iPad Air1 perfectly. Almost like a genuine apple smart case. The only thing I don’t like is if dirt gets on it, it is very difficult to get it off. However, it is still a very good case for the money.

author: Jean MR
title: Good for the price!
content: I purchased it in pink. The smart cover function works perfectly. It’s not as thin or light as the original apple covers, but it works fine, looks cute, and has a great price. It did arrive with a weird smell that hasn’t seemed to go away, but you only notice if it’s really close to your face.

author: Warren Egger
title: Perfect!
content: Exactly what I was looking for. Fits perfect, auto sleep/wake works, light and simple, and the price is great. Lifetime warranty. My first one cracked on the top and bottom left corners. I emailed the company and they sent me another one free of charge, no questions asked.  Regardless, I would have purchased another one no problem. Great customer service.

author: Perry Y
title: Lighter than original one with magnetic strip.
content: Looks good, should last for a while.

author: JD
title: Great
content: Great product as advertised, would highly recommend.

author: Customer
title: iPad cover
content: Bought this to replace my mom's iPad cover that broke...she loves it so far. The dark gray is as it looks in the picture, dark, almost a shade lighter than black.

author: cdb
title: Junky
content: If you are looking for just a cheap cover this is it.  Very flimsy and cheaply made.

author: Chloe
title: Lasted over 1.5 years!
content: Have this case for ~1.5 years.  iPad has dropped and this case has been a life saver.  Great to hold iPad up in 2 directions.  After 1 year, the case corners begin to chip.  The soft side of cover prevents scratches, but doesn't really continually clean it.  Durable case and easy to clean.

author: Aunt Karen
title: Full screen access
content: Second one if these I’ve bought. Love that I have access to full screen since iPad snaps into case. Cover folds into a stand.  And, of course, I love that it’s purple!

author: Este
title: Fits perfectly
content: I like the smart case which switches the tablet off.

author: Amazon Customer
title: 3.5 out of 5; but good value for the low price...
content: 3.5 if I could...previously owned the Apple full leather version of this case, and it is much better in comparison. But it was around 4-5 times the price, and is not currently available. The JETech case works as it should, and the material texture & quality are fine. One complaint would that the seam on the cover where the edges of the inside and outside come together is fairly sharp. When holding the case for a prolonged period, it feels as if this edge cuts/digs into the skin. All of this said, for the price, it is a decent purchase.

author: MrMoBetta
title: Waste of money
content: Got me. Waste of money

author: C.S.P.
title: As nice as Apples for a lot less $$
content:
Nice slim case, similar to Apples but a lot less $$
Time will tell how it hold up but initial impressions are great!

author: sceneIT?
title: Great cover for an awesome price
content:
This cover was recommended by a coworker and it works as intended. Only issue is that the cover when folded into a triangle shape to hold it:
The triangle seems to collapse more easily than my old genuine Ipad cover for the older ipad.

author: Dalaisama
title: Wonderful Replacement
content: Bought this as a replacement to the leather case offered by Apple.  The Apple case, while made of nice leather, didn't make it through 1 year before it started to come apart.  This case, so far as I can tell, is a better quality case than that made by Apple.  Nice snug fit with molded plastic to protect the edges.  It doesn't feel quite as nice as leather to the hands, but the upside trade-off is that it feels like a more protective cover to care for your investment.

author: Chris
title: Cheap garbage cracked in less than a month
content: I know it's a cheap case, but after less than a month of using it, it's cracked in three different places. I've had cheap cases before and usually you can get six months or so out of them. This one is complete garbage.

author: wes68
title: Fits perfectly
content: ... and looks nice. That's all I need.

author: codeorama
title: Great iPad case and the price is amazing as well.
content: I purchased this case for the magnetic cover only. I had no idea that it also has a protective case for the back. Excellent product and great seller. Couldn’t be more happy.

author: Russell Boulet
title: iPad Air cover
content: It was time for a replacement so this time I figured I'd get a different color.  Went with purple.  Like the color, quality is good.  Shuts down when closed.  Delivery was faster then expected.

author: Amazon Customer
title: It’s perfect
content: This case snaps in place easy. I like how the material helps you grip your iPad so I doesn’t slide out of your hands. It’s exactly what I wanted.

author: tampa girl 14
title: Great so far!
content: I've had this case for a few days and it's great. Smooth cover and back. Stand works well. Very happy with it.

author: Deb G
title: Same as the covers sold by Apple at a much lower price
content: My first cover was purchased at an Apple Store when I bought my IPad Air.  I like this cover just as much and it is a lot less expensive.  This is the second cover I have purchased from this vendor

author: D Walters
title: Fits excellent
content: Excellent product !  Excellent price.  Will buy more!

author: Brockway
title: Falling apart after 3 months
content: The case fits well. It looked good when I got it. I have had it about three months now and the edges are frayed and splitting apart. The narrow strip of plastic near the on/off switch has broken off. I would not have purchased it if I had know it would start falling apart so soon.

author: Jessie R. San
title: Broke after 1 week
content: The case is thin and the opening where you adjust the volume broke after having it for only 1 week. And we are very careful with our stuff (we were not rough with it). Wish I would have tried to return it but I think it may be too late.

author: Krishna
title: Excellent quality Ipad case for a really good price
content: We have been really pleased with this product. The quality of this case is even better than the Apple Ipad case that I had earlier bought, which lasted for a couple of years. Only time will tell how long this one will last bit the quality of this case looks superior to the Apple case.

author: T. Fox
title: High quality
content: I bought this to replace an Apple leather case which was getting worn and breaking down. At fist I thought the new case did not fit well, but it just took some force to pop the speaker-port corner into place.  Fits like it is welded to the iPad now!  Feels nice in the hands and the magnetic cover works like the apple case. Cover is a little too stiff but I think it will get more supple over time.  I have the dark gray case which looks great. Overall happy with the case, especially at such a reasonable price.

author: Amazon Customer
title: Junk
content: Lasted a couple weeks and the plastic corner broke letting the iPad come loose from the cover.  This is a piece of junk, it replaced an Apple cover that lasted years.  This thing lasted a couple weeks

author: Seth
title: It would be nice to have a thin layer of felt on the ...
content:
This case does fit the iPad Air 2 BUT the camera cutout/hole does not. See attached picture. The case partially covers the back-facing camera lens which crops into the image and creates a very large top vignette. So this version DOES NOT PROPERLY WORK FOR IPAD AIR 2 (5th Generation - Latest/Newest iPad Air).

Also just a side note, The interior of the case (the part that the back of the iPad is constantly resting in, is made of hard plastic. There is no soft material so I can only imagine that over time it may rub/wear the back of the iPad. This is only a theory because I did not keep this case long enough to find out because I am returning it. It would be nice to have a thin layer of felt on the inside to protect the iPad from possibly scratching/wearing over time.

author: Jojojoshua
title: stylish, simple and effective
content:
The case is stylish and soft, I love it. I had a case before but it's hard on the back and much thicker than this one. Also it covered all the buttons and it's hard to press anything.

This one is simple and effective, I highly recommend it.

author: Susan M Laffin
title: Exactly as pictured.
content: Great product for the price. Fits great.

author: Mal
title: My iPad shattered while wearing this case...
content: I guess I should've expected less since it was cheap. I dropped my iPad Air and this darn case fell off as the iPad is falling through the air toward the concrete. Needless to say my iPad screen is shattered and the corner is bent, so it may not be repairable. Unless you plan on NEVER ever even running into the possibility that you might drop your iPad, you need a sturdier case than this one.

author: Lady Coop
title: Cheap Case
content: It didn’t even last a month!! Top right is broken!!

author: ::Sara::
title: I love my new one
content: I had to replace my old one (not sure if it was this brand or not, it was years ago) as the cover was peeling away from the magnetic part (just from so much use, not the cover's fault), leaving it exposed - and just worn out looking.  I love my new one!  I preferred a one piece cover (there are some that are two/three pieces to snap together), so I really like that this one is one piece.  It's super simple to attach, and the quality is defnitely high/thick/sturdy.  It's a matte color (I got red), and performs just as expected.

author: Chris
title: What a great case for the money
content: What a great case for the money. Yeah it makes the iPad a bit heavier, but the iPad is so light it makes no difference. This is cheap and durable and it also has the appearance of being a legit case.  Great buy to protect your iPad investment but not shelling out a lot of money for a nice case.

author: Amazon Customer
title: I really enjoy this case and believe it does a really good ...
content: I have been using this case for about three months now on a daily basis. Nothing has broke on mine, but it does show minimal signs of daily use on the side of the case that bends when opening. I really enjoy this case and believe it does a really good job protecting the iPad. The magnet does stay on the iPad nicely. The magnet is not as strong as the Apple version when you are holding it upside down, but you are also paying significantly less for this case. Overall, very nice case for the money.

author: bobsie67
title: Five Stars
content: Best cover for my iPad at a very good price.

author: Ken B
title: Not a durable case.  I'm replacing after only 3 months.
content: After a few months of use the plastic on the case is breaking in different parts.  After 3 months it does not hold my iPad and I have to buy a new case.

author: McCabe
title: Great price
content: I wanted something simple and fairly priced, and this fit the bill.  The case works as designed; I worried it would be able to hold up my iPad in landscape viewing but it's not a problem.  I have only had it a few days and will update if anything goes wrong.

author: Jeff Cheung
title: Waste of money!
content:
When I received the case, it fit well and seemed to be well made.  The iPad seemed to be randomly going to sleep with the case, but I quickly realized that the magnetic cover causes the iPad to go to sleep when opened like a book.  This is completely asinine as that's how our family uses the iPad -- with the case cover folded behind the iPad.

Other than that, the case has basically fallen apart less than 3 months later.  Save your money and get a better case.

author: IOSIF
title: Recommendation 5 stars
content: I was very satisfied with my first slim-fit smart case,very sturdy,flexible.Unfortunatly I dropped and cracked my iPad trying to get my luggage from the airport ( everybody was pushing and shoving),so when was the time to replace the iPad cover,I choose the exact same one as before.so...JETech iPad Air Case Slim-fit smart case takes a highly recommendation with 5 stars.

author: Kevin F. Shanahan
title: Good product for price
content: Nice product. Durable, convenient to use and excellent fit for my model product

author: sunshine
title: it is great
content: I love it I am using it with my iPad Air 1

author: Jacob
title: Good
content: Perfect fit and good quality. Highly recomended

author: anthony
title: Great cover for my ipad
content: Great product great price

author: Classical Blue
title: Better than original
content: Excellent replacement. Fits perfectly. Built better than original.

author: Pheezy
title: First case was to small. So they sent me another.
content:
Unsure if I got a bad batch or what. Saw the product got great reviews. But mine was slightly small for my iPad was a really tight fit. So tight two of the corners have already cracked in less then a month. I thought maybe this case just fits really tight but I did have to use decent force to get the last corner to snap on.

**Update**

JETech sent me new case. Think previous one was just a bad batch. Case fits perfectly. And isn't tight. Quality is still good.

author: Gary L.
title: Fits perfectly.
content: Exactly what we were looking for. We ordered a cover from another supplier it did not fit very well but this one is perfect.

author: Adowa
title: Awesome Case! Fits perfectly and definitely protects my iPad
content: Awesome Case! Fits perfectly and definitely protects my iPad. I already dropped it once while walking through the airport, and no damage due to this case.

author: Autie11
title: Bought this again because I liked the first one.
content: Very nice and slim pad. A repeat purchase after 20 months.  I dropped my iPad several times with the first case, and the case protected it every time.  However,  after several drops a corner of the case broke.  I bought this one to replace it.  I would have given it 5 stars if the corner hadn't broken.

author: Thomas Robinson
title: Five Stars
content: Looks like new,works great.This is second ipad I have bought from Amazon.Would buy another if needed.

author: H Strauss
title: Just What I Wanted
content: I needed a case to replace the original case I purchased at the time I received my iPad Air as a gift several years ago.  This case was reasonably priced and offered the functionality I wanted.  The case is strong, and all ports on the iPad are easily reachable through openings in the case.  I ordered a black case to prevent my fingers from discoloring the case after lengthy use.

author: Nephalem
title: Great product.
content:
bought this for my GF's ipad air and she loves it. Id say the purple is not as bright as the picture and more dark in a good way (for us at least) maybe you want bright purple. It feels like it added no weight yet you feel like its being protected. The only issue with me is the back. its nice and soft to the touch but man is it a fingerprint and oil magnet. Wiping it does nothing but smudge you have to use a damn wipe.

The sleep/wake works flawlessly the only thing id say is the magnet isn't as strong as i've seen in other cases.

author: Tim Lahey
title: Works Well
content: Fits IPad Air 1 very well. All functions work well. Excellent price.

author: grammieoffive
title: excellent case
content: Arrived right on time.  Fits perfectly.  Exact replacement for previous case that just wore out.  Design has been improved slightly to make edges more "crack proof."  Great idea.

author: Jake the Bear
title: The case works great for my grandson's ipad air
content: The case works great for my grandson's ipad air.  He dropped it at the airport and both the case and ipad are fine.

author: Levo
title: Better than the original
content: Folks, it’s great product. Fit excellent to my Ipad. Color is very vivid.  I’ll buy another color.

author: Lov2read
title: Great case for bargain price
content: Would easily compare to the $60 Apple case

author: M. SHAPIRO
title: Works For Me
content: Apple makes a very similar cover to this for way too much money. Considering that this cover for the iPad Air looks and functions in exactly the same way, it's a great bargain. It's sturdy and solid with a handsome black matte finish. It has the same auto-sleep function when closing the cover as well as identical folding position support for both landscape and portrait configurations as the Apple cover. Too good a deal to pass up. Definitely recommend.

author: Charity S
title: Fits securely and great value.
content: Great value and case holds and protects my iPad securely.  Had a minor issue, but customer service fixed the problem quickly.

author: SAMomof3
title: Nice Case
content: The case is nice, seems to be durable thus far. It has a simply clean design, functions as described and user friendly. Have only had the case for a little over a week so can not comment on long term use but will update should anything detrimental occur.

author: BMS
title: Good value
content: This case was a good value - serves its purpose to protect the screen and back of ipad.  The folding stand could be a little bit more reliable - it's not as good as the stand/cover made by apple.

author: making sense
title: annoying
content: If  you flip the cover all the way to the back, it turns the screen off, which should not happen. This is very annoying. Because of this, I give a 2 stars. The case is OK, but less protective than another brand I purchase because of large cut out.

author: Raghu Padmanabula
title: This iPad Air case is nice and fits perfectly fine for iPad air
content: This iPad Air case is nice and fits perfectly fine for iPad air, but it broken very fast as my son was playing it with all the time, that is the only disappointment but rest all nice.

author: anne4491
title: Happy with Purchase
content: Perfect for what I need. Light weight and protects perfectly. Would recommend

author: E. Sumners
title: Product fit and quality is OK, color doesn't match Amazon image.
content: Fits well, quality seems fine for the price.  The blue protector color in person does not look like the image on Amazon.  On my monitor it looked like a bright blue, but in person is actually a light blue / powder blue.

author: Scott
title: I'd buy it again!
content: Easy to use iPad Air case.  The cover folds so it props the screen up and you can easily type.  Looks pretty good and protects an expensive tablet.  I like and it works well.  I'd buy it again.

author: Shanmugaraj Periyasamy
title: Not for iPad Air 2 - Update: Drains battery when closed
content:
This is a nice cover. How ever  does not fit the iPad Air 2 perfectly. While the iPad does fit in securely, the camera opening is way off covering the camera partially. Microphone is covered. There is a noticeable gap between the iPad back and the cover. Works if you don't care about the camera, mic and the gap. Maybe a new version would come out for iPad Air 2.

UPDATE: This cover drains battery in my iPad Air 2 when the cover is in closed position. I think this has something to do with a mismatch of the smart switch magnet or the magnet is not strong enough to keep the smart switch in off position all the time. What I noticed is the cover doesn't always turn on/off the iPad when the cover is flipped, its intermittent. Secondly, I noticed my battery was draining real fast when not in use. From 100% to 70% in less than half a day, when I hardly use the iPad for less than 2 Hrs, and left it in closed position. When I look at the battery usage, thh most power consumption is by startup screen and touch id screen. This tells me the iPad keeps turning on and off when the over is closed. I noticed the battery loose 1% in 5 mins when nothing is running in background and cover closed. As a test I left the cover open for 4 Hrs, the battery hasn't lost even 1%. Holding steady at 59%. This is major issue for me. This cover is going to trash.

author: I.
title: Great quality for price
content:
I like this case a lot. It’s not very heavy and it’s attractive. For the price, I was really surprised that the materials look so good and seem quite high-quality. The case didn’t have any plastic odor, which I was concerned about. My only criticism would be that the magnetic front cover doesn’t stick to the back when folded over, which can be inconvienent when you’re holding it. However, it does hold its position when folded over. All in all, it’s a great case if you’re looking for something simple and cheap!
Also, the customer service is great!

author: Sabuu44
title: Perfect Case
content: I purchased this because my Zagg Folio did not have enough clearance at the port to plug in my Lightning-to-VGA adapter for presentations. I also own an Apple Leather case. This is by far my favorite case. It's more durable and far less expensive than the Apple case, giving me the confidence to toss it into my briefcase and not worry about anything happening to it. It's covers all the corners and screen appropriately, while still providing larger openings for the port and speakers. I would recommend this to any iPad Air owners. Lastly, the Sleep/Wake feature works perfectly.

author: Ben
title: This cover works great. It's got a nice finish that feels good ...
content: This cover works great.  It's got a nice finish that feels good in the hands and the divided cover allows you to roll it back and create a 'stand' of sorts.  The whole thing fits on the iPad well without adding much to the thickness/weight.  And of course it protects the iPad's screen very well when you shove it in a bag or whatever.

author: Amy Stoessel
title: Nice case
content: Arrived quickly, good quality.

author: romulus
title: Five Stars
content: arrived in fine shape. its perfectly. thank you.

author: Dr. Jay
title: Five Stars
content: Very satisfied

author: lin
title: One Star
content: Security is not easy, it is difficult to come off.

author: Lucretia
title: Great!
content: I previously bought another case as a gift and it didn't fit. This fit perfect and the person it was for loved it.

author: Mr Dove
title: Broken after 1 week
content: I liked this a lot for a week, then it broke.  The plastic at two of the corners cracked and broke.  I attempted to contact the seller but got no response.  Perhaps this review will get their attention.

author: Sales & Marketing Executive
title: Quality materials and excellent fit!
content: Purchased as a gift for a friend who loves it. Nice quality material and a perfect fit.

author: JJ
title: this is a great case but not very durable so plan to rebuy ...
content: this is a great case but not very durable so plan to rebuy in about 6 months if using ipad everyday

author: FireFly
title: a nice sturdy cover to replace my previous tattered cover
content: This is what I wanted, a nice sturdy cover to replace my previous tattered cover.  I really like the color, grey, texture of the material and how you can't see finger prints.  I would purchase this item again.

author: freddie j
title: Not bad.
content: It fits but I wish it has a strong magnet  to stay attach to the back cover.

author: Brenda Deyerle
title: X
content: Was wrong size

author: Kacy
title: Perfect Go Cover
content: Proper fitting, durable, colorful iPad cover to snap on and go! It slips perfectly into bag or purse and you feel confident iPad is off and doesn't use power in bag. The openings are located perfectly  for cords to be plugged in for power or earbuds. All buttons are also easily accessible as well. Great cover for great cost!
